English: We have worked on guidelines to transition our learners from Grade 9 to Grade 10. Starting May 20, we are going to have our learners begin their choices for senior schools
Swahili Translations: Tumefanya kazi juu ya miongozo ya kuhamisha wanafunzi wetu kutoka darasa la 9 hadi darasa la 10. Kuanzia Mei 20, tutawafanya wanafunzi wetu kuanza uchaguzi wao wa shule za sekondari
Luo Translations: Wasebedo ka watiyo gi chike ma tayowa mondo wapuonjre e klas mar 9 nyaka 10. Chakre Mei 20, wabiro miyo jopuonjrewa thuolo mar yiero skul ma ne gidhi dhiye e sekondar.

English: Starting this year, and following extensive stakeholder consultations, I wish to announce that KNEC will introduce a mid-year series of the KCSE examination, to be administered in July every year
Swahili Translations: Kuanzia mwaka huu, na baada ya mashauriano ya kina ya mashirika ya mashirika, nataka kutangaza kwamba KNEC itaanzisha mfululizo wa katikati ya mwaka wa mtihani wa KCSE, ambao utafanywa Julai kila mwaka
Luo Translations: Chakre higani, kendo bang' wuoyo matut gi riwruoge mag riwruoge, daher lando ni KNEC biro chako chenro mar penj mar KCSE e dwe mar Julai higa ka higa

English: The Government has not re-introduced cut-off points for admission to university. The minimum admission requirement to university is the Mean Grade of C+ (plus)
Swahili Translations: Serikali haijaanzisha tena vituo vya kukataliwa kwa ajili ya kuingia chuo kikuu.
Luo Translations: Sirkal ok ochak chungo kuonde ma ji ok nyal donjoe e yunivasiti.

English: The Teachers Service Commission (TSC) will next week advertise a fresh round of recruitment of 20,000 teachers on contract for junior schools
Swahili Translations: Tume ya Huduma ya Walimu (TSC) itachapisha wiki ijayo raundi mpya ya kuajiri walimu 20,000 kwa mikataba kwa shule za msingi
Luo Translations: TSC biro goyo twak e juma mabiro mar tich manyien mar kwayo jopuonj 20,000 mondo oti gi gige tich e skul mag sekondari

English: TSC has also agreed to convert all the 26,000 intern teachers recruited in 2023 to permanent and pensionable terms in January 2025
Swahili Translations: TSC pia imekubali kugeuza walimu wote 26,000 wa ushirika wa kazi waliojitolea mnamo 2023 kuwa wa kudumu na wenye malipo ya pensheni mnamo Januari 2025
Luo Translations: TSC bende oseyie loko jopuonj 26,000 duto ma ne ochiwore e higa mar 2023 obed jopuonj mosiko kendo ma yudo yuto mar yuto e dwe mar Januar 2025

English: The planet-friendly approach to school feeding will be at the heart of the scale up and focus of the coalition
Swahili Translations: Maoni ya mazingira ya chakula cha shule yatakuwa msingi wa kupanua na kuelekeza lengo la muungano
Luo Translations: Paro ma ji nigo e wi chiemo ma yudore e skunde biro konyo e miyo winjruok obed motegno

English: The government has disbursed Sh22.03 billion as capitation for Term 2 of the 2025 academic year
Swahili Translations: Serikali imetoa Sh22.03 bilioni kama mtaji wa muda wa pili wa mwaka wa masomo wa 2025
Luo Translations: Sirkal osechiwo Sh22.03 bilion mar dola mar piny mangima kaka pesa mar somo mar higa mar 2025

English: [Partnership Agreement] Ksh 1.7 billion Intergovernmental Partnership Agreement between Ministry of Education and Nairobi County for school feeding program
Swahili Translations: [Mkataba wa Ushirikiano] Ksh bilioni 1.7 Mkataba wa Ushirikiano wa Serikali Kati ya Wizara ya Elimu na Kaunti ya Nairobi kwa ajili ya programu ya kulisha shule
Luo Translations: [Kondiko mar Riwruok] Ksh 1.7 bilion Singruok mar Riwruok mar Piny e kind Ministry of Education kod Nairobi County kuom chenro mar chiwo chiemo ne skul

English: [4Ts Initiative] Track, Trace, Talk, and reTurn programme launched for school re-entry of vulnerable children, especially girls affected by pregnancy
Swahili Translations: [4Ts Initiative] Programu ya kufuatilia, kufuatilia, kuzungumza, na kurudi ilizinduliwa kwa ajili ya kuingia tena shuleni kwa watoto walioathiriwa, hasa wasichana walioathiriwa na ujauzito
Luo Translations: Ne ochak chenro mar rito, rito, wuoyo, kendo duogo e skul ne nyithindo ma ne oyudo masira mar midekre, to moloyo nyiri ma ne oyudo masira mar ich

English: [KUCCPS Portal] KUCCPS portal will open in March 2025 for university placement and course selection for 2024 KCSE candidates
Swahili Translations: [Ukurasa wa KUCCPS] Ukurasa wa KUCCPS utafunguliwa mnamo Machi 2025 kwa ajili ya nafasi za chuo kikuu na uteuzi wa kozi kwa wagombea wa 2024 wa KCSE
Luo Translations: [KUCCCPS Page] Kot mar KUCCPS ibiro yaw e dwe mar Mach 2025 ne jobura mag yunivasiti kod yiero mag tiegruok ne jogo mabiro dhi e KCSE mar 2024

English: [TSC Recruitment] Advertisement for 46,000 teaching positions across primary, junior secondary, and secondary schools with application deadline October 7, 2024
Swahili Translations: [Kujitolea kwa TSC] Tangazo la nafasi za kufundisha 46,000 katika shule za msingi, za sekondari na za sekondari na tarehe ya mwisho ya maombi Oktoba 7, 2024
Luo Translations: [TSC ochiwore] Oganda mar Joneno mag Jehova lando ni gibiro chiwo thuolo mar puonjo ji 46,000 e skul mag sekondari kod sekondari, kendo ni gibiro yudo thuolo mar kwayo mondo oti e skundno tarik 7 Oktoba, 2024

English: [Exam Results] 2024 KCSE results announced with 246,391 candidates achieving university entry grade C+ and above out of 965,501 total candidates
Swahili Translations: [Matokeo ya mitihani] Matokeo ya 2024 ya KCSE yametangazwa na wagombea 246,391 ambao wamepata alama ya kuingia chuo kikuu C+ na zaidi kutoka kwa wagombea 965,501 wa jumla
Luo Translations: [Misale mag penj] Jogo ma biro yudo nyak mar KCSE mar 2024 kwan - gi romo 246,391 kendo gin joma osedhi e yunivasiti mar C+ kod mokalo kanyo kuom jogo duto ma biro yudo nyak mar KCSE mar 965,501

English: [School Feeding Scale-up] Target to increase school feeding beneficiaries from 1.9 million to over 10 million children by 2030
Swahili Translations: [Kuongeza kiwango cha chakula cha shule] Lengo la kuongeza wafadhili wa chakula cha shule kutoka milioni 1.9 hadi zaidi ya watoto milioni 10 ifikapo 2030
Luo Translations: [Keto chiemo e skul] Chenro mar medo chiwo chiemo e skul, kochakore milion 1.9 nyaka nyithindo mokalo milion 10 e higa mar 2030

English: [Free Education] Government reinforcement of free primary education policy with elimination of all levies and charges in public schools
Swahili Translations: [Elimu ya bure] Serikali kuimarisha sera ya elimu ya msingi ya bure kwa kuondoa ushuru wote na ada katika shule za umma
Luo Translations: [Pwony ma onge chudo] Sirkal jiwo chenro mar somo ma onge chudo kuom golo osuru kod chudo duto e skul mag sirkal

English: Education  CS Ezekiel Machogu says govt will no longer fund public universities and colleges urges them to generate  their own-sourced revenue to fund their operation
Swahili Translations: Elimu CS Ezekiel Machogu anasema serikali haitawafadhili tena vyuo vikuu na vyuo vikuu vya umma anawahimiza wazalishe mapato yao wenyewe ili kufadhili shughuli zao
Luo Translations: Sirkal mar somo mar CS Ezekiel Machogu wacho ni sirkal ok bi chulo pesa ne yunivasiti kod yunivasiti mag sirkal.

English: The Auditor General is raising the alarm over the de-funding of education in Kenya. Nancy Gathungu says it threatens the future of Kenya's human capital. More than 163,000 students have been left without loans.
Swahili Translations: Mkurugenzi Mkuu wa Uchunguzi wa Elimu wa Kenya anaonya kuhusu kufutwa fedha za elimu nchini Kenya. Nancy Gathungu anasema kwamba hiyo inatishia maisha ya baadaye ya Kenya. Wanafunzi zaidi ya 163,000 wamelazimika kukosa mikopo.
Luo Translations: Jatend Kenya mar National Education Survey, Nancy Gathungu, chiwo siem kuom wach golo pesa e somo e piny Kenya, kowacho ni mano nyalo miyo ngima Kenya obed matek.

English: George Magoha, CS, Education: All children will have a place in secondary school. By 2nd Dec, every child who sat KCPE 2019 will know what school they will join. Ksh. 8 Billion has been put to improve infrastructure in high school and primary school
Swahili Translations: George Magoha, CS, Elimu: Watoto wote watakuwa na nafasi katika shule ya sekondari. Kufikia Desemba 2, kila mtoto aliyehudhuria KCPE 2019 atajua ni shule gani atakayojiunga nayo. Ksh. Bilioni 8 zimewekwa kuboresha miundombinu katika shule za upili na za msingi
Luo Translations: George Magoha, CS, Education: Nyithindo duto biro yudo kargi e skul sekondar. E dwe mar Desemba 2, nyathi ka nyathi ma osedhi e KCPE 2019 biro ng'eyo skul ma obiro donjoe. Ksh. bilion 8 oseketi mondo omed tiego chenro mag skul e skul sekondar kod sekondar

English: The Kenya Kwanza Government will bridge the current teacher shortage of 116,000 within two years, allocate sufficient resources to facilitate the implementation of quality education and strength day secondary schools to deepen access to quality education
Swahili Translations: Serikali ya kwanza ya Kenya itafunga upungufu wa walimu wa sasa wa 116,000 ndani ya miaka miwili, na kutenganisha rasilimali za kutosha ili kuwezesha utekelezaji wa elimu ya ubora na nguvu ya shule za sekondari za siku ili kuongeza upatikanaji wa elimu ya ubora
Luo Translations: Sirkal mokwongo mar Kenya biro tieko yuto mar jopuonj 116,000 e higni ariyo, kendo keto chenro mar tiego nyithindo e skul mag sekondar mag odiechieng' kodiechieng' mondo omi ji oyud somo maber

English: President Uhuru Kenyatta has given Government officials until end of February to ensure a 100 percent transition of the 2019 KCPE candidates to secondary school.
Swahili Translations: Rais Uhuru Kenyatta amewapa maafisa wa Serikali muda hadi mwisho wa Februari kuhakikisha kuwa wagombea wa KCPE wa 2019 watahamishwa kwa asilimia 100 kwenda shule ya sekondari.
Luo Translations: Ker Uhuru Kenyatta osemiyo jotelo mag sirkal thuolo mar tieko dwe mar ariyo mondo gine ni jogo mabiro dhi e KCPE 2019 ibiro ket e skul mar sekondar.

English: Gov't releases Sh9.3b to fund the free education program; CS Magoha says Sh2.8b allocated to primary schools & Sh6.5b to secondary schools.
Swahili Translations: Serikali inatoa Sh9.3b ili kufadhili mpango wa elimu ya bure; CS Magoha anasema Sh2.8b imegawiwa shule za msingi na Sh6.5b kwa shule za sekondari.
Luo Translations: Sirkal chiwo Sh9.3b mondo otigo gi pesa e siro chenro mar somo maonge chudo; CS Magoha wacho ni Sh2.8b osemiyo skunde matindo to Sh6.5b osemiyo skunde madongo.

English: The government has directed that junior secondary schools be domiciled in the existing primary schools
Swahili Translations: Serikali imeamuru shule za sekondari za msingi ziwekwe katika shule za msingi zilizopo
Luo Translations: Sirkal osechiko ni skul mag sekondar obed e skul ma ne nitie chon

English: Over 90,000 teacher deficit hampers curriculum implementation.
Swahili Translations: Zaidi ya upungufu wa walimu 90,000 huzuia utekelezaji wa programu za masomo.
Luo Translations: Kwan mar jopuonj mokalo 90,000 ok nyal konyo e chopo chenro mag somo.

English: KSh?26 billion in support to boost CBC infrastructure transition.
Swahili Translations: KSh? bilioni 26 kwa msaada wa kuchochea mabadiliko ya miundombinu ya CBC.
Luo Translations: Owete gi nyimine ma nigi lony e tij lendo biro yudo pesa ma romo bilion 26 mag Amerka.

English: School records full transition to high school, expands vocational training.
Swahili Translations: Shule huweka rekodi kamili ya mabadiliko ya shule ya sekondari, kupanua mafunzo ya kitaaluma.
Luo Translations: Skundego nyiso lokruok mosetim e skul mar sekondar, kendo mano miyo tiegruok bedo mayot.

English: Project documents education struggles and hopes for rural girls.
Swahili Translations: Mradi huo unaonyesha mapambano ya elimu na matumaini ya wasichana wa mashambani.
Luo Translations: Chenrono nyiso kaka nyiri modak e gweng'no kedo mondo gichop somo kendo gik ma gigeno.

English: AustraliaÂs Premier announced a historic agreement to fully fund all WA public schools up to the Schooling Resource Standard by 2026.
Swahili Translations: Waziri Mkuu wa Australia alitangaza makubaliano ya kihistoria ya kufadhili shule zote za umma za WA hadi kiwango cha rasilimali za shule kufikia 2026.
Luo Translations: Jatend piny Australia nolando winjruok moro makende mar chiwo pesa ne skunde duto mag WA nyaka chop higa mar 2026.

English: This is a call for assistance after a mass shooting occurred at Sandy Hook Elementary School in Newtown, Connecticut, United States.
Swahili Translations: Huu ni wito wa msaada baada ya risasi ya wingi kutokea katika Shule ya Msingi ya Sandy Hook huko Newtown, Connecticut, Marekani.
Luo Translations: Mani en kwayo mar konyo bang' ka ne bunde omonjo Sandy Hook Elementary School man Newtown, Connecticut, Amerka.

English: The National AssemblyÂs Budget & Appropriations Committee allocated Sh17.6?billion for converting 46,000 intern teachers into permanent and pensionable roles
Swahili Translations: Bunge la Taifa la Bajeti na Malipo ya Kutoa Sh17.6 bilioni kwa ajili ya kubadilisha walimu wa mafunzo 46,000 katika kazi za kudumu na za kustaafu
Luo Translations: Bura mar Piny owacho mar Budget kod Chudo chiwo Sh17.6 bilion mag Shillings mondo olok jopuonj 46,000 obed tich mapile kendo ma ok giyudo rit

English: An earlier announcement stated that 26,000 intern teachers would have their posts regularized starting July 1, 2024, backed by an Sh8.3?billion allocation.
Swahili Translations: Tangazo la awali lilisema kwamba walimu 26,000 wa mafunzo ya kitaaluma wangeweza kufanya kazi zao kuwa za kawaida kuanzia Julai 1, 2024, kwa msaada wa ugawaji wa Sh8.3 bilioni.
Luo Translations: Oganda mokwongo ne owacho ni jopuonj 26,000 ne dhi bedo gi thuolo mar tiyo tijegi manyien chakre Julai 1, 2024, ka giyudo pesa ma romo dola bilion 8.3.

English: Cabinet Secretary Ezekiel Machogu announced that the government will no longer fully fund public universities and colleges
Swahili Translations: Katibu wa Kabini Ezekiel Machogu alitangaza kwamba serikali haitawapa fedha kabisa vyuo vikuu na vyuo vikuu vya umma
Luo Translations: Ezekiel Machogu, ma en jagoro mar Kabini, nolando ni sirkal ok bi chiwo pesa ne yunivasiti duto

English: Following the Education Reform Task Force report, the government directed that Grade 7Â9 (Junior Secondary) classes are to be accommodated within existing public primary schools, excluding KPSEA as a placement exam.
Swahili Translations: Kufuatia ripoti ya Tume ya Kazi ya Marekebisho ya Elimu, serikali iliamuru kwamba darasa 7Â-9 (Junior Secondary) lazima ziandikishwe katika shule za msingi za umma zilizopo, bila KPSEA kama mtihani wa nafasi.
Luo Translations: Kaluwore gi ripot mar Commission for the Reform of Education, sirkal ne owacho ni klas 7 nyaka 9 (Junior Secondary) ne nyaka ndikre e skunde mag piny mangima, maok ochuno ni nyaka ket penj mar KPSEA.

English: Education Cabinet Secretary (CS) Prof George Magoha confirmed that 20,000+ primary schools have passed infrastructural and enrollment assessments to host Junior Secondary classes. Schools not meeting qualification criteria will act as feeder institutions within 2?km radius.
Swahili Translations: Katibu wa Baraza la Mafunzo (CS) Prof George Magoha alithibitisha kuwa shule 20,000+ za msingi zimepitisha tathmini za miundombinu na uandikishaji ili kukaribisha darasa la sekondari la Junior. Shule ambazo hazipati vigezo vya sifa zitafanya kazi kama taasisi za kulisha ndani ya mduara wa kilomita 2.
Luo Translations: Jatend Bura mar Puonjruok (CS) Prof George Magoha nowacho ni skunde 20,000 mag piny osetieko nono gik ma konyo e tiego skul kod joma dwaro dhi e skunde mamoko mondo girwak skunde matindo.

English: The Kenya Private Schools Association (Bomet chapter) submitted to the Presidential Working Party that hosting Junior Secondary classes in primary schools would minimize infrastructure costs and reduce burden on parents.
Swahili Translations: Chama cha Shule za Kibinafsi za Kenya (Sura ya Bomet) kiliwasilisha kwa Kikundi cha Kazi cha Rais kwamba kuwa na darasa la Junior Secondary katika shule za msingi kungepunguza gharama za miundombinu na kupunguza mzigo kwa wazazi.
Luo Translations: Riwruok mar Kenya Association of Private Schools (Bomet) ne onyiso Riwruok mar Tich mar Jatelo ni bedo gi klas mar Junior Secondary e skunde matindo ne dhi miyo jonyuol kik chul pesa mang'eny e wi gik mochuno e ngima.

English: County Education officials in MurangÂa confirmed that 570 out of 647 primary schools were approved to host JSS following criteria-based assessment
Swahili Translations: Maafisa wa Elimu ya Wilaya ya Murang'a walithibitisha kuwa shule 570 kati ya shule 647 za msingi ziliidhinishwa kukaribisha JSS kufuatia tathmini ya msingi
Luo Translations: Jotelo mag Puonjruok mar Murang'a County ne onyiso ni skul 570 kuom skunde 647 ma ne nie skul mokwongo ne oyie rwako JSS bang ' nono penj mar skul

English: Reduce barriers! Apply for government fee subsidies for low-income families.
Swahili Translations: Punguza vizuizi! Omba msaada wa serikali kwa familia zenye mapato ya chini.
Luo Translations: Kwa sirkal mondo okonyi konyo joot ma nigi pesa matin.

English: Education for all! Enroll in mobile schools in pastoralist regions.
Swahili Translations: Elimu kwa wote! Jiandikishe katika shule za mkononi katika maeneo ya wachungaji.
Luo Translations: Puonj ne Ji Duto!

English: Support inclusion! Ensure schools have ramps and aids for disabled students.
Swahili Translations: Kuunga mkono uingizaji! Hakikisha shule zina mabango na misaada kwa wanafunzi wenye ulemavu.
Luo Translations: Riw lwedo chenro mar rwako nyithindo e skul!

English: Empower girls! Provide scholarships to keep girls in school.
Swahili Translations: Wape wasichana nguvu, wape masomo ya kuwafundisha wasichana.
Luo Translations: Mi nyiri teko, kendo miygi puonj mag puonjo nyiri.

English: Bridge the gap! Build more schools in rural areas like Kitui.
Swahili Translations: Kufunga pengo hilo! Jenga shule zaidi katika maeneo ya mashambani kama Kitui.
Luo Translations: Mondo omi ogeng' chenrono, onego oger skunde momedore e gwenge ma ji odakie kaka Kitui.

English: Welcome refugees! Enroll refugee children in local schools.
Swahili Translations: Karibu wakimbizi! Waandikishe watoto wakimbizi katika shule za mitaa.
Luo Translations: Warwaki e skul mar alwora!

English: Get to school! Apply for transport subsidies for remote students.
Swahili Translations: Nenda shuleni! Omba msaada wa usafiri kwa wanafunzi wa mbali.
Luo Translations: Dhi e skul, kendo ikri mondo iyud kony mar wuoth ne nyithindo man mabor.

English: Enroll now! Free primary education for all Kenyan children.
Swahili Translations: Jiandikishe sasa! Elimu ya msingi ya bure kwa watoto wote wa Kenya.
Luo Translations: Somri sani! Nyithindo duto e piny Kenya yudo somo ma onge chudo.

English: Learn at any age! Join adult literacy classes in your county.
Swahili Translations: Jifunze ukiwa na umri wowote! Jiunge na madarasa ya kusoma na kuandika ya watu wazima katika jimbo lako.
Luo Translations: Puonjri somo ka in jahigni adi!

English: Stay nourished! Enroll in schools with feeding programs.
Swahili Translations: Endelea kula! Jiandikishe katika shule zenye programu za kulisha.
Luo Translations: Dhi nyime gi chiemo!

English: Study from home! Access online education platforms for rural students.
Swahili Translations: Jifunze kutoka nyumbani! Pata fursa za elimu ya mtandaoni kwa wanafunzi wa vijijini.
Luo Translations: Puonjri e ot! Yud thuolo mag somo e Intanet ne jopuonjre modak e gwenge mosokore.

English: Support orphans! Apply for education scholarships in your county.
Swahili Translations: Kuunga mkono yatima! Omba scholarship ya elimu katika jimbo lako.
Luo Translations: Kony nyithi kiye! Kwa mondo iyud thuolo mar dhi e skul e pinyu.

English: Join community schools! Affordable education for low-income families.
Swahili Translations: Jiunge na shule za jamii! Elimu ya bei nafuu kwa familia zenye mapato ya chini.
Luo Translations: Dhi e skul mag sirkal! Puonj ma ok ochuno ne joot ma nigi pesa matin.

English: Read anywhere! Access mobile libraries in rural areas.
Swahili Translations: Soma popote! Fanya kazi kwenye maktaba za mkononi katika maeneo ya mashambani.
Luo Translations: Som kamoro amora midhiye! Ti gi laibrari mag lwedo e gwenge mosokore.

English: Promote equality! Ensure equal access for boys and girls.
Swahili Translations: Kuendeleza usawa, kuhakikisha usawa wa watoto wa kiume na wa kike.
Luo Translations: Timo gik moko e yo makare, kendo miyo nyithindo ma yawuowi gi mon obed maromre.

English: Build better schools! Support infrastructure projects in ASAL regions.
Swahili Translations: Kujenga shule bora! Kuunga mkono miradi ya miundombinu katika mikoa ya ASAL.
Luo Translations: Gero skunde mabeyo! Tiyo gi chenro mag gedo e gwenge mag ASAL.

English: Parents, engage! Attend school meetings to support education access.
Swahili Translations: Wazazi, washiriki! Hudhuria mikutano ya shule ili kutegemeza upatikanaji wa elimu.
Luo Translations: Jonyuol, riwuru lwedo! Dhiuru e chokruoge mag skul mondo omi uyud somo.

English: More teachers! Support hiring in underserved regions.
Swahili Translations: Walimu zaidi! Kuunga mkono kuajiri katika maeneo yasiyo na huduma.
Luo Translations: Puonjruok e wi tije mag lendo e alwora ma ji ok tiye gi Joneno mag Jehova.

English: Dress for success! Apply for uniform subsidies for needy students.
Swahili Translations: Fanya maombi ya msaada wa aina moja kwa wanafunzi wenye uhitaji.
Luo Translations: Lem mondo ikony jopuonjre mari e yo machalo kamano.

English: Open doors! Integrate refugee students into national schools.
Swahili Translations: Fungua milango! Kuunganisha wanafunzi wakimbizi katika shule za kitaifa.
Luo Translations: Oyawuru dhoudi! Golo jopuonjre ma oringo thuchegi e skul mag piny mangima.

English: Fund inclusion! Support bursaries for students with special needs.
Swahili Translations: Ushirikiano wa fedha!
Luo Translations: Riwruok mar pesa!

English: [TSC Registration] Teaching without TSC registration is illegal per Section 23 of TSC Act 2012 - all teachers must be properly registered
Swahili Translations: [Usajili wa TSC] Kufundisha bila usajili wa TSC ni kinyume cha sheria kulingana na Kifungu cha 23 cha Sheria ya TSC 2012 - walimu wote lazima waandikwe vizuri
Luo Translations: [Kwan mar TSC] Puonjo maonge TSC en gima chik okwedo kaluwore gi Chik 23 mar TSC Law 2012 - jopuonj duto nyaka bed joma ondik maber

English: Education Chief Administrative Secretary Zac Kinuthia says journalists seeking to cover schools must seek clearance from the Ministry Of Education. Speaking in Mombasa, Kinuthia said journalists will not be allowed to enter schools freely and cover issues there
Swahili Translations: Katibu Mkuu wa Utawala wa Elimu Zac Kinuthia anasema waandishi wa habari wanaotaka kufunika shule lazima waombe idhini kutoka kwa Wizara ya Elimu. Akizungumza huko Mombasa, Kinuthia alisema waandishi wa habari hawataruhusiwa kuingia shule kwa uhuru na kufunika masuala huko
Luo Translations: Jatend weche somo, Zac Kinuthia wacho ni jotim weche e skul madwaro ndiko weche e skul onego okwa thuolo mar somo e pinyno.

English: Lawmakers warned of underpreparedness for Grade 9 rollout.
Swahili Translations: Wanachama wa sheria walionya kuhusu kutojitayarisha kwa ajili ya kuanzishwa kwa darasa la 9.
Luo Translations: Jotend sirkal nochiwo siem ni kik iketgi ne klas mar ochakore.

English: The Kenya Nationa Examinations Council(KNEC) warns school  heads they will be held liable over inaccurate data on student registration.
Swahili Translations: Baraza la mitihani ya kitaifa ya Kenya (KNEC) linaonya viongozi wa shule kwamba watakuwa na jukumu kwa habari ya data isiyo sahihi juu ya usajili wa wanafunzi.
Luo Translations: Bura mar Kenya mar National Examinations Council (KNEC) chiwo siem ne jotend skul ni gibiro kawo ting ' mar chiwo weche maok kare e wi kwan mar jopuonjre.

English: Summary of recommendations for education reforms in Kenya
Swahili Translations: Muhtasari wa mapendekezo ya mageuzi ya elimu nchini Kenya
Luo Translations: Weche ma ne oler e wi lokruok ma ne dhi timore e somo e piny Kenya

English: TheÂ Maneno YetuÂ study aimed to fill these gaps by providing descriptions of our PSA creation workshop process that was peer-driven from conception to completion.
Swahili Translations: Utafiti wa Maneno Yetu ulikuwa na lengo la kujaza mapengo haya kwa kutoa maelezo ya mchakato wetu wa PSA wa uundaji wa semina ambayo ilikuwa ya peer-drive kutoka utungaji hadi kukamilika.
Luo Translations: Buk mar Wachwa mar Puonjruok ne dwaro tieko ywaruokgo kuom lero kaka PSA ne tiyo gi chenro mar loso seminar ma ne itimo gi ji duto chakre chueyo nyaka tieko.

English: The U.S. Census Bureau today released a series of public service announcements (PSAs) to increase awareness and educate the public on the importance of the 2020 Census.
Swahili Translations: Ofisi ya Idadi ya Watu ya Marekani leo ilitoa taarifa za huduma za umma (PSAs) ili kuongeza ufahamu na kuelimisha umma juu ya umuhimu wa Idadi ya Watu ya 2020.
Luo Translations: Ofis mar U.S. Census Bureau (USC) ne ogolo weche mag sirkal mar sirkal (PSA) mondo okony ji ong'e kendo opuonj ji kuom gimomiyo 2020 en higa makende.

English: This piece speaks to the improvement of education in the USA
Swahili Translations: Hii makala inazungumzia juu ya kuboresha elimu katika Marekani
Luo Translations: Sulani wuoyo kuom dongruok mar somo e piny Amerka

English: This piece speaks to the improvement of education in Kenya
Swahili Translations: Kifungu hiki kinazungumzia kuboresha elimu nchini Kenya
Luo Translations: Sulani wuoyo kuom dongruok mar somo e piny Kenya

English: Advancing education quality to build a sustainable nation in the Maldives
Swahili Translations: Kuendeleza ubora wa elimu ili kujenga taifa lenye uendelevu katika Visiwa vya Maldives
Luo Translations: Dhi nyime gi somo maber e chula mar Maldives mondo omi ogandano odhi nyime bedo gi ngima maber

English: The President of India has underlined the importance of quality education starting from primary to post graduate level and necessity of women education for overall socio economic progress.
Swahili Translations: Rais wa India amesisitiza umuhimu wa elimu ya ubora kuanzia kiwango cha msingi hadi cha baada ya kuhitimu na umuhimu wa elimu ya wanawake kwa maendeleo ya jumla ya kijamii na kiuchumi.
Luo Translations: Jatend piny India osemiyo duong ' mar somo maber chakre e tiegruok nyaka bang ' tieko skul, kendo osemiyo duong ' mar tiegruok mar mon e dongruok mar oganda koda mar ohala.

English: The government launched a Public-Private Partnership (PPP) program enabling universities to collaborate with industry for facility upgrades and co-fund joint research efforts
Swahili Translations: Serikali ilizindua mpango wa Ushirikiano wa Umma na Binafsi (PPP) ambao unawezesha vyuo vikuu kushirikiana na tasnia kwa kuboresha vifaa na kufadhiliana juhudi za utafiti wa pamoja
Luo Translations: Sirkal nochako chenro mar Public and Private Partnership (PPP) ma miyo yunivasiti thuolo mar tiyo kanyachiel gi ohala kuom medo lony e gik ma gitiyogo kendo konyo e chulo pesa e timo nonro kanyachiel

English: Education Chief Administrative Secretary Zac Kinuthia announced that journalists seeking to cover school-related stories must now obtain prior clearance from the Ministry of Education.
Swahili Translations: Katibu Mkuu wa Utawala wa Elimu Zac Kinuthia alitangaza kwamba waandishi wa habari wanaotaka kuchapisha hadithi zinazohusiana na shule lazima sasa wapate idhini ya awali kutoka kwa Wizara ya Elimu.
Luo Translations: Jatend weche somo, Zac Kinuthia, nowacho ni jotim weche e skul ma dwaro goyo weche e skul nyaka yud rusa mar tiegruok mar tiegruok.

English: Fight corruption! Teach students to report graft in education.
Swahili Translations: Wapigie ufisadi! Wafundishe wanafunzi kuripoti ufisadi katika elimu.
Luo Translations: Puonj jopuonjre mondo oket ketho e skul.

English: Get involved! Join school clubs to learn about governance.
Swahili Translations: Jiunge na vilabu vya shule ili ujifunze kuhusu utawala.
Luo Translations: Bed achiel kuom riwruoge mag skul mondo ipuonjri weche mag sirkal.

English: Your vote counts! Learn about elections in school programs.
Swahili Translations: Soma kuhusu uchaguzi katika programu za shule.
Luo Translations: Som weche motudore gi yiero e program mag skul.

English: Promote peace! Join school peace clubs in conflict zones.
Swahili Translations: Shirikiana na vilabu vya amani katika shule katika maeneo ya migogoro.
Luo Translations: Bed e riwruok mar riwruok mar joma ohero kuwe e skul.

English: Say no to bribes! Report corrupt practices to EACC.
Swahili Translations: Amri kuhusu mazoea ya ufisadi kwa EACC.
Luo Translations: Chik ma ne ochiwo ne EACC e wi timbe mag mibadhi.

English: Lead the way! Participate in school leadership elections.
Swahili Translations: Tangu wakati huo, ni lazima ushiriki katika uchaguzi wa viongozi wa shule.
Luo Translations: Chakre kindeno, nyaka ibed gi thuolo mar yiero jotelo mag skul.

English: Give back! Join community service programs in schools.
Swahili Translations: Shiriki katika programu za utumishi wa jamii katika shule.
Luo Translations: Tim chenro mag konyo ji e skul.

English: Know your rights! Learn about the Kenyan Constitution in school.
Swahili Translations: Jifunze kuhusu Katiba ya Kenya shuleni.
Luo Translations: Puonjri e wi Chik mar Kenya e skul.

English: Be vigilant! Report school fee fraud to authorities.
Swahili Translations: Kuwa macho, ripoti udanganyifu wa ada za shule kwa mamlaka.
Luo Translations: Bed motang', kendo nyis sirkal ni isando skul.

English: Protect our planet! Join school environmental clubs.
Swahili Translations: Linda sayari yetu!
Luo Translations: Rit pinywani!

English: Shape your future! Engage in youth civic forums.
Swahili Translations: Fanya maendeleo ya wakati ujao!
Luo Translations: Dhi nyime timo dongruok e kinde mabiro!

English: Have a voice! Join school boards to influence policies.
Swahili Translations: Jiunge na bodi za shule ili kuathiri sera.
Luo Translations: Bed achiel kuom jotelo mag skul mondo ikonygi ng'eyo kaka ginyalo chiko weche siasa.

English: Learn ethics! Include anti-corruption in school curricula.
Swahili Translations: Jifunze maadili!
Luo Translations: Puonjri bedo gi timbe mabeyo!

English: Resolve disputes! Train students in peer mediation.
Swahili Translations: Suluhisha mizozo!
Luo Translations: Losuru ywaruok manie kindu!

English: Do your part! Teach students about civic responsibilities.
Swahili Translations: Wafundishe wanafunzi wajibu wa kiraia.
Luo Translations: Puonj jopuonjre mondo obed gi timbe manyiso luor.

English: Demand accountability! Ensure transparent school fund management.
Swahili Translations: Tumia uwazi wa usimamizi wa fedha za shule.
Luo Translations: Ti gi weche duto ma isomo e skul e yo makare.

English: IEBC rolls out a campaign to boost voter registration in all counties.
Swahili Translations: IEBC inazindua kampeni ya kuongeza usajili wa wapiga kura katika wilaya zote.
Luo Translations: IEBC chako kampen mar medo kwan mar joma biro yiero e gwenge duto.

English: EACC sensitizes citizens on reporting corruption through county forums.
Swahili Translations: EACC inawajulisha raia kuhusu kuripoti ufisadi kupitia vikao vya wilaya.
Luo Translations: EACC nyiso raia ni kik ginyis ji mibadhi kokalo kuom chokruoge mag distrikt.

English: KNCHR conducts outreach to educate the public on constitutional rights.
Swahili Translations: KNCHR huendeleza ufahamu wa elimu ya umma juu ya haki za kikatiba.
Luo Translations: KNCHR jiwo ji mondo ong'e chike mag sirkal.

English: NCIC introduces peace programs to prevent electoral violence.
Swahili Translations: NCIC huanzisha mipango ya amani ili kuzuia vurugu za uchaguzi.
Luo Translations: NCIC loso chenro mag kuwe mondo kik tim koko e yiero.

English: Council of Governors hosts sensitization sessions on devolved services.
Swahili Translations: Baraza la Waziri hufanya mikutano ya ufahamu juu ya huduma za kuhamishwa.
Luo Translations: Bura mar Jo-Minister timo romo mar chiwo paro e wi tije mag loko ji.

English: National Treasury launches budget literacy training to promote transparency.
Swahili Translations: Wizara ya Fedha ya Taifa inazindua mafunzo ya kusoma na kuandika kwa bajeti ili kuendeleza uwazi.
Luo Translations: Ofis mar weche pesa chako tiego ji mondo ging'e somo kod ndiko e yo maber.

English: Youth Agenda launches a program to enhance youth participation in governance.
Swahili Translations: Agenda ya Vijana inazindua mpango wa kuongeza ushiriki wa vijana katika utawala.
Luo Translations: Chenro mar Rowere chako chenro mar medo riwo rowere lwedo e weche mag loch.

English: NGEC promotes public dialogue on gender equality and anti-discrimination laws.
Swahili Translations: NGEC inakuza mazungumzo ya umma juu ya usawa wa jinsia na sheria za kupambana na ubaguzi.
Luo Translations: NGEC jiwo ji mondo owuo e wi wach bedo gi winjruok e kind chwo gi mon kod monjo ji.

English: Katiba Institute runs a civic education campaign on citizen rights and freedoms.
Swahili Translations: Katiba Institute inaendesha kampeni ya elimu ya raia juu ya haki na uhuru wa raia.
Luo Translations: Ka en kamano, to kare, riwruok mar Charter Institute timo kampen mar puonjo ji e wi ratiro kod thuolo mag dhano.

English: IEBC develops digital platforms for educating new voters.
Swahili Translations: IEBC inaendeleza majukwaa ya dijiti ya kuelimisha wapiga kura wapya.
Luo Translations: IEBC loso chenro mag tiego joma biro yiero manyien.

English: EACC campaigns to encourage anonymous reporting of corruption cases.
Swahili Translations: EACC inashiriki katika kampeni za kuchochea kuripoti kwa jina la mtu kuhusu kesi za ufisadi.
Luo Translations: EACC tiyo gi yore mopogore opogore e jiwo ji mondo ochiw ripot e lo jomoko e wi weche mag mibadhi.

English: KNCHR educates citizens on inclusion of marginalized communities.
Swahili Translations: KNCHR huwaelimisha raia kuhusu kuingiza jamii zilizoachwa kando.
Luo Translations: KNCHR puonjo raia mondo okony joma ogonygi.

English: NCIC hosts peacebuilding forums through inter-community cultural events.
Swahili Translations: NCIC huandaa vikao vya kujenga amani kupitia hafla za kitamaduni za jamii.
Luo Translations: NCIC chano chenro mag loso kuwe kokalo kuom gik ma timore e alwora.

English: Council of Governors rolls out civic education on how county budgets work.
Swahili Translations: Baraza la Waziri Mkuu huanzisha elimu ya raia juu ya jinsi bajeti za wilaya zinavyofanya kazi.
Luo Translations: Bura mar Prime Minister chako puonjo ji kaka bajet mag alwora tiyo.

English: National Treasury organizes awareness programs on tax and compliance.
Swahili Translations: Wizara ya Fedha ya Taifa huandaa mipango ya ufahamu kuhusu kodi na kufuata.
Luo Translations: Ofis mar National Finance loso chenro mag chiwo paro e wi wach chulo osuru kendo luwo chikego.

English: Youth Agenda equips young leaders with civic education skills.
Swahili Translations: Agenda ya Vijana huandaa viongozi vijana na ujuzi wa elimu ya kiraia.
Luo Translations: Chenro mar Rowere chiwo jotelo ma rowere gi lony e somo mar sirkal.

English: NGEC advocates for equal representation of women in elective posts.
Swahili Translations: NGEC inawasaidia wanawake kupata nafasi sawa katika nafasi za uchaguzi.
Luo Translations: NGEC konyo mon yudo thuolo maromre e yiero.

English: Katiba Institute educates citizens on their role in public participation.
Swahili Translations: Katiba Institute huwaelimisha raia juu ya jukumu lao katika ushiriki wa umma.
Luo Translations: Charter Institute puonjo raia kuom migawo ma gin-go e konyo oganda.

English: IEBC organizes forums on election integrity and preparedness for 2025.
Swahili Translations: IEBC inaandaa vikao juu ya uadilifu wa uchaguzi na maandalizi ya 2025.
Luo Translations: IEBC chano chokruoge mag paro e wi wach yiero kod ikruok ne yiero mar 2025.

English: EACC builds local watchdog groups to fight bribery in counties.
Swahili Translations: EACC hujenga vikundi vya ulinzi wa ndani ili kupambana na rushwa katika kaunti.
Luo Translations: EACC loso riwruoge mag rito sirkal mondo oked gi mibadhi e gweng'no.

English: KNCHR starts clubs to teach students their constitutional rights.
Swahili Translations: KNCHR huanzisha klabu za kufundisha wanafunzi haki zao za kikatiba.
Luo Translations: KNCHR chako riwruoge mag puonjo nyithindo chike mag sirkal.

English: NCIC uses peace caravans to spread unity messages ahead of elections.
Swahili Translations: NCIC hutumia magari ya amani kueneza ujumbe wa umoja kabla ya uchaguzi.
Luo Translations: NCIC tiyo gi mtokni mag kuwe mondo oland ote mar winjruok e kinde mag yiero.

English: Council of Governors launches an app for devolution awareness.
Swahili Translations: Baraza la Waziri Mkuu laanza programu ya ufahamu wa uhamisho.
Luo Translations: Bura mar Prime Minister chako chenro mar chiwo paro e wi kaka ibiro ter ji e pinje mamoko.

English: National Treasury uses interactive tools to explain budgeting.
Swahili Translations: Wizara ya Fedha ya Kitaifa hutumia zana za maingiliano kueleza bajeti.
Luo Translations: Ofis mar National Finance tiyo gi yore mag goyo mbaka mondo oler pesa ma itiyogo e loso bajet.

English: Youth Agenda introduces hackathons to design youth policies.
Swahili Translations: Agenda Youth inaanzisha hackathons ili kubuni sera za vijana.
Luo Translations: Agenda Youth chako chenro mar timo chenro mag tiyo gi yore mag manyo mor e ngima rowere.

English: NGEC supports women through mentorship in political processes.
Swahili Translations: NGEC huwasaidia wanawake kupitia ushauri katika michakato ya kisiasa.
Luo Translations: NGEC konyo mon kokalo kuom chiwo paro e weche siasa.

English: Katiba Institute produces podcasts to spread constitutional awareness.
Swahili Translations: Katiba Institute huzalisha podcast ili kueneza ufahamu wa kikatiba.
Luo Translations: Ka en kamano, to kare, riwruok mar Charter Institute loso podcast mondo okony ji ong'e chik.

English: IEBC partners with broadcasters to air voter awareness content.
Swahili Translations: IEBC inashirikiana na waangalizi wa matangazo ili kutoa habari za ufahamu wa wapiga kura.
Luo Translations: IEBC tiyo kanyachiel gi joma nono weche mag redio mondo omi ji ong'e weche ma biro timore ne joma biro yiero.

English: EACC introduces multiple reporting channels for whistleblowers.
Swahili Translations: EACC inaanzisha njia nyingi za kuripoti kwa wafanyabiashara wa habari.
Luo Translations: EACC chako yore mang'eny mag chiwo ripot ne jo ohala mag weche.

English: KNCHR promotes civic education for people with disabilities.
Swahili Translations: KNCHR inakuza elimu ya kiraia kwa watu wenye ulemavu.
Luo Translations: KNCHR jiwo somo mar ji duto ma nigi midekre.

English: NCIC forms new peace committees to address local conflicts.
Swahili Translations: NCIC inaunda halmashauri mpya za amani kushughulikia migogoro ya ndani.
Luo Translations: NCIC loso komiti manyien mag loso kuwe mondo otiek ywaruok manie kindgi.

English: Council of Governors tests local centers for devolution learning.
Swahili Translations: Baraza la Waziri wa Serikali hujaribu vituo vya ndani vya kujifunza kwa ajili ya utoaji.
Luo Translations: Bura mar Ministri mar Piny owacho nono kuonde ma ji puonjoree weche Muma mondo omi ji ochiw chiwo.

English: National Treasury answers citizen queries on budget allocations.
Swahili Translations: Wizara ya Fedha ya Taifa hujibu maswali ya raia kuhusu bajeti.
Luo Translations: Ofis mar weche pesa mar pinyno chiwo dwoko mag penjo ma ji nigo e wi pesa ma gitiyogo.

English: Youth Agenda leverages TikTok to teach civic responsibility.
Swahili Translations: Agenda ya Vijana hutumia TikTok kufundisha uwajibikaji wa kiraia.
Luo Translations: Riwruok mar Riwruok mar Rowere tiyo gi TikTok e puonjo ji bedo gi ting ' mar bedo raia.

English: NGEC advocates for equal allocation in national and county budgets.
Swahili Translations: NGEC inawasaidia kwa ajili ya usambazaji sawa katika bajeti ya kitaifa na wilaya.
Luo Translations: NGEC konyo ji mondo obed gi pesa ma romre e piny mangima kod e alwora.

English: Katiba Institute provides booklets on rights and responsibilities.
Swahili Translations: Katiba Institute hutoa vijitabu kuhusu haki na wajibu.
Luo Translations: Constitution Institute chiwo buge moting'o weche motudore gi ratiro koda ting' mag ng'ato.

English: IEBC uses boda boda networks to spread voter registration info.
Swahili Translations: IEBC hutumia mitandao ya boda boda kusambaza habari za usajili wa wapiga kura.
Luo Translations: IEBC tiyo gi intanet mar boda boda mondo oland weche mag joma ne dhi yiero.

English: EACC works with civil society to enforce anti-corruption norms.
Swahili Translations: EACC inafanya kazi na jamii ya kiraia ili kutekeleza kanuni za kupambana na ufisadi.
Luo Translations: EACC tiyo gi riwruok mar oganda dhano e siro chenro mag kedo gi mibadhi.

English: KNCHR launches legal help desks for marginalized communities.
Swahili Translations: KNCHR inazindua ofisi za msaada wa kisheria kwa jamii zilizoachwa kando.
Luo Translations: KNCHR chako tije mag konyo joma odong' chien.

English: NCIC integrates peace lessons into school programs.
Swahili Translations: NCIC huingiza masomo ya amani katika programu za shule.
Luo Translations: NCIC keto puonj mag kuwe e program mag skul.

English: Council of Governors runs roadshows on devolution awareness.
Swahili Translations: Baraza la Waziri hufanya maonyesho ya barabara juu ya ufahamu wa uhamisho.
Luo Translations: Bura mar Jo-Minister timo ranyisi mar ng'eyo kaka inyalo ng'ad bura.

English: Treasury creates an app to teach citizens about public finance.
Swahili Translations: Wizara ya Hazina imeunda programu ya kuwafundisha raia kuhusu fedha za umma.
Luo Translations: Ofis mar pesa osechako chenro mar puonjo raia e wi pesa mag sirkal.

English: Youth Agenda trains youth leaders on governance principles.
Swahili Translations: Agenda ya Vijana inawafundisha viongozi wa vijana kanuni za utawala.
Luo Translations: Chenro mar Rowere puonjo jotend rowere chike mag loch.

English: NGEC organizes county-level events on gender inclusivity.
Swahili Translations: NGEC huandaa matukio ya kiwango cha wilaya juu ya ujumuishaji wa jinsia.
Luo Translations: NGEC chano weche moko e wi weche nindruok.

English: Katiba Institute introduces e-learning for civic knowledge.
Swahili Translations: Katiba Institute inaanzisha e-kujifunza kwa ajili ya ujuzi wa raia.
Luo Translations: Charter Institute chako somo e-somo mondo okony ji obed gi lony.

English: IEBC educates public on new reforms in electoral systems.
Swahili Translations: IEBC huwaelimisha umma kuhusu mageuzi mapya katika mifumo ya uchaguzi.
Luo Translations: IEBC puonjo ji e wi lokruok manyien ma timore e chenro mag yiero.

English: EACC forms school clubs to nurture anti-corruption values.
Swahili Translations: EACC huunda vilabu vya shule ili kusitawisha maadili ya kupambana na ufisadi.
Luo Translations: EACC loso riwruoge mag skul mondo okony e kedo gi mibadhi.

English: KNCHR hosts county dialogues on justice and equity.
Swahili Translations: KNCHR huandaa mazungumzo ya wilaya juu ya haki na usawa.
Luo Translations: KNCHR chano mondo otim chokruoge mag alwora e wi wach bedo gi winjruok maber gi jomoko.

English: NCIC uses media to discourage hate speech in elections.
Swahili Translations: NCIC hutumia vyombo vya habari kuharibu hotuba za chuki katika uchaguzi.
Luo Translations: NCIC tiyo gi weche miwacho e redio kod e redio mondo oketh weche mag sigu e yiero.

English: Council of Governors creates audio series on devolution matters.
Swahili Translations: Baraza la Waziri huandaa mfululizo wa sauti kuhusu masuala ya uhamisho.
Luo Translations: Bura mar Jo-Minister chiwo weche mang'eny ma wuoyo e wi wach golo ji e pinje mamoko.

English: National Treasury organizes webinars on public finance accountability.
Swahili Translations: Wizara ya Fedha ya Taifa inaandaa webinars juu ya uwajibikaji wa fedha za umma.
Luo Translations: Ofis mar National Finance Office loso webinars e wi wach ting ' mar pesa mag sirkal.

English: Youth Agenda trains youth to use tech for civic engagement.
Swahili Translations: Agenda ya Vijana inawafundisha vijana kutumia teknolojia kwa ajili ya ushiriki wa kiraia.
Luo Translations: Chenro mar Rowere puonjo rowere kaka ginyalo tiyo gi teknoloji e konyo oganda.

English: NGEC engages lawmakers on gender-sensitive laws.
Swahili Translations: NGEC hujiunga na wabunge kuhusu sheria zinazohusiana na jinsia.
Luo Translations: NGEC tiyo gi chike ma tayo weche nindruok e kot.

English: Katiba Institute creates animations for civic education outreach.
Swahili Translations: Katiba Institute huunda uhuishaji kwa ajili ya elimu ya raia.
Luo Translations: Charter Institute loso chenro mar puonjo ji.

English: IEBC launches initiatives for diaspora voter registration.
Swahili Translations: IEBC inazindua mipango ya usajili wa wapiga kura wa diaspora.
Luo Translations: IEBC chako chenro mar ndiko joma biro yiero e pinje mamoko.

English: EACC introduces a mobile app for easy reporting of corruption.
Swahili Translations: EACC inaanzisha programu ya simu kwa ajili ya kuripoti kwa urahisi ufisadi.
Luo Translations: EACC chako tiyo gi simo mondo okony e chiwo ripot mayot kuom mibadhi.

English: KNCHR trains paralegals to support communities on legal rights.
Swahili Translations: KNCHR inawazoeza wanasheria kusaidia jamii katika haki za kisheria.
Luo Translations: KNCHR tiego josiasa mondo okony oganda e weche mag chike.

English: NCIC partners with religious groups to promote peace.
Swahili Translations: NCIC inashirikiana na vikundi vya kidini ili kuendeleza amani.
Luo Translations: NCIC tiyo kanyachiel gi dinde mamoko mondo gikony e loso kuwe.

English: Council of Governors opens civic education hubs in rural areas.
Swahili Translations: Baraza la Waziri wa Habari linafungua vituo vya elimu ya raia katika maeneo ya vijijini.
Luo Translations: Ministim mar Weche Manie Piny owacho chako somo e gwenge mosokore.

English: Treasury introduces online tools for public finance monitoring.
Swahili Translations: Wizara ya Hazina inaanzisha zana za mtandaoni za kufuatilia fedha za umma.
Luo Translations: Ofis mar pesa e piny mangima chako tiyo gi intanet mondo onon weche mag pesa.

English: Youth Agenda mentors youth on governance and civic duty.
Swahili Translations: Agenda ya Vijana huwapa vijana mafunzo kuhusu utawala na wajibu wa kiraia.
Luo Translations: Chenro mar Rowere konyo rowere mondo ong'e kaka ginyalo tiyo gi sirkal e yo maber.

English: NGEC educates public on GBV reporting and legal remedies.
Swahili Translations: NGEC inaelimisha umma kuhusu taarifa za GBV na njia za kisheria za kuondoa makosa.
Luo Translations: NGEC puonjo ji weche mag GBV kod kaka inyalo tiek ketho mag joma ok kare.

English: Katiba Institute produces documentaries on citizen rights.
Swahili Translations: Katiba Institute huzalisha filamu za maandishi kuhusu haki za raia.
Luo Translations: Kanise mag Constitution Institute loso sinema ma wuoyo e wi ratiro mag raia.

English: IEBC collaborates with universities on voter education research.
Swahili Translations: IEBC inashirikiana na vyuo vikuu katika utafiti wa elimu ya wapiga kura.
Luo Translations: IEBC tiyo kanyachiel gi yunivasiti e timo nonro e wi somo mar josiasa.

English: EACC equips media practitioners with skills for reporting corruption.
Swahili Translations: EACC huwapa wataalamu wa vyombo vya habari ujuzi wa kuripoti ufisadi.
Luo Translations: EACC miyo joma olony e weche mag mbaka lony mar chiwo ripot e wi mibadhi.

English: KNCHR provides free legal aid during public forums.
Swahili Translations: KNCHR hutoa msaada wa kisheria bure wakati wa vikao vya umma.
Luo Translations: KNCHR chiwo kony mar chik maonge chudo e seche mag chokruoge mag oganda.

English: NCIC trains local mediators for conflict resolution.
Swahili Translations: NCIC inawazoeza wasuluhishi wa ndani kwa ajili ya kutatua migogoro.
Luo Translations: NCIC tiego joma loso weche e kindgi giwegi mondo okonygi e tieko ywaruok.

English: Council of Governors releases e-learning content on devolution.
Swahili Translations: Baraza la Waziri wa Habari linatoa habari kuhusu utoaji wa fedha kupitia e-learning.
Luo Translations: Bura mar Joote mag Piny owacho chiwo ripot e wi kaka inyalo gony ji kokalo kuom somo e yor intanet.

English: Treasury trains citizens on using open budget data.
Swahili Translations: Wizara ya Hazina inawafundisha raia kutumia data za bajeti wazi.
Luo Translations: Ofis mar pesa puonjo raia mondo oti gi weche mag pesa e yo maler.

English: Youth Agenda challenges youth to create civic tech solutions.
Swahili Translations: Agenda ya Vijana inawashambulia vijana kuunda suluhisho za teknolojia ya raia.
Luo Translations: Chenro mar Rowere dwaro ni rowere otim dongruok e loso yore mag teknoloji.

English: NGEC campaigns for womenâs representation in county assemblies.
Swahili Translations: NGEC inashiriki kampeni za kuwakilisha wanawake katika makusanyiko ya wilaya.
Luo Translations: NGEC timo kampen mar konyo mon e chokruoge mag distrikt.

English: Katiba Institute improves its app for civic education.
Swahili Translations: Taasisi ya Katiba inaboresha programu yake ya elimu ya raia.
Luo Translations: Kanise mar Chik medo timo dongruok e chenro mar somo mar oganda.

English: IEBC uses social media influencers to reach young voters.
Swahili Translations: IEBC hutumia washawishi wa media ya kijamii kufikia wapiga kura vijana.
Luo Translations: IEBC tiyo gi joma nigi teko e weche mag social media mondo oyud joma tindo ma biro yiero.

English: EACC supports local offices to prevent misuse of public funds.
Swahili Translations: EACC inasaidia ofisi za mitaa kuzuia matumizi mabaya ya fedha za umma.
Luo Translations: EACC konyo tije mag sirkal mondo kik giti marach gi pesa mag sirkal.

English: KNCHR uses theatre to teach human rights principles.
Swahili Translations: KNCHR hutumia theatre kufundisha kanuni za haki za binadamu.
Luo Translations: KNCHR tiyo gi sinema e puonjo ji chike motudore gi ratiro mag dhano.

English: NCIC sends peace ambassadors to conflict-prone counties.
Swahili Translations: NCIC hutuma balozi wa amani katika nchi zenye mzozo.
Luo Translations: NCIC oro jomisonari mag kuwe e pinje ma ywaruok nitie.

English: Council of Governors uses podcasts for public awareness.
Swahili Translations: Baraza la Waziri hutumia podcast ili kuongeza ufahamu wa umma.
Luo Translations: Bura mar Jo-Minister tiyo gi podcast mondo okony ji ong'e wachno.

English: Treasury gamifies budget learning for young audiences.
Swahili Translations: Wizara ya Hazina hufanya kujifunza bajeti kuwa rahisi kwa vijana.
Luo Translations: Ofis mar pesa konyo rowere mondo ong'e kaka ginyalo tiyo gi pesagi e yo mayot.

English: Youth Agenda empowers counties with active youth councils.
Swahili Translations: Agenda Youth inawezesha wilaya na baraza za vijana kazi.
Luo Translations: Agenda Youth konyo joma tindo e alwora kod e tije mamoko.

English: NGEC organizes national summits for inclusive governance.
Swahili Translations: NGEC huandaa mikutano ya kitaifa ya utawala wa pamoja.
Luo Translations: NGEC chano chokruoge mag piny mangima mag locho e kind ji ariyo.

English: Katiba Institute builds quiz tools to make learning interactive.
Swahili Translations: Katiba Institute hujenga zana za maswali ili kufanya kujifunza kuwa kwa maingiliano.
Luo Translations: Charter Institute loso penjo ma nyalo konyo ng'ato puonjore e yo matut.

English: IEBC recruits young volunteers for civic outreach.
Swahili Translations: IEBC huajiri vijana wa kujitolea kwa ajili ya kutoa habari za kiraia.
Luo Translations: IEBC tiyo gi rowere ma ochiwore chiwo ripot e wi weche mag sirkal.

English: EACC introduces rewards for reporting corruption.
Swahili Translations: EACC huanzisha malipo kwa kuripoti ufisadi.
Luo Translations: EACC chulo pesa kuom chiwo ripot mar mibadhi.

English: KNCHR broadcasts legal advice and civic topics on radio.
Swahili Translations: KNCHR inatangaza ushauri wa kisheria na mada za kiraia kwenye redio.
Luo Translations: KNCHR landoga weche mag chike kod weche mag sirkal e redio.

English: NCIC uses art to promote national cohesion messages.
Swahili Translations: NCIC hutumia sanaa ili kukuza ujumbe wa umoja wa kitaifa.
Luo Translations: NCIC tiyo gi lony mar loso gik moko mondo okony ji obed gi winjruok maber e kindgi.

English: Council of Governors partners with journalists for devolution news.
Swahili Translations: Baraza la Waziri wa Habari linafanya kazi na waandishi wa habari kwa habari za utoaji.
Luo Translations: Bura mar Joote tiyo gi joote mondo oland weche.

English: Treasury launches AI-powered chatbot for budget queries.
Swahili Translations: Wizara ya Hazina inazindua chatbot inayoendeshwa na AI kwa maswali ya bajeti.
Luo Translations: Ofis mar pesa chako tiyo gi chatbot mar AI e manyo pesa.

English: Youth Agenda organizes marathon events for voter awareness.
Swahili Translations: Agenda Youth inaandaa matukio ya marathon kwa ajili ya ufahamu wa wapiga kura.

English: NGEC creates social media campaigns for gender equality.
Swahili Translations: NGEC huunda kampeni za media ya kijamii kwa ajili ya usawa wa kijinsia.

English: Katiba Institute combats misinformation with fact-check content.
Swahili Translations: Katiba Institute inapambana na habari zisizo sahihi kwa kuangalia ukweli.

English: IEBC designs interactive games to teach electoral processes.
Swahili Translations: IEBC kubuni michezo ya maingiliano ya kufundisha michakato ya uchaguzi.
Luo Translations: IEBC ne ochako loso tuke mag goyo tuke mondo opuonj ji e wi yiero.

English: EACC takes anti-corruption message to all counties.
Swahili Translations: EACC inatoa ujumbe wa kupambana na ufisadi kwa wilaya zote.
Luo Translations: EACC chiwo ote mar kedo gi mibadhi ne distrikt duto.

Swahili Translations: KNCHR inazindua vituo vya mtandaoni vya elimu ya haki za binadamu.

Swahili Translations: NCIC inaunda nafasi za mtandaoni kwa mazungumzo ya kutatua migogoro.
Luo Translations: NCIC loso kuonde ma ji nyalo tudoree e Intanet mondo gikony e tieko ywaruok.

English: Council of Governors rewards counties excelling in citizen education.
Swahili Translations: Baraza la Waziri Mkuu linapongeza wilaya zinazofanya kazi bora katika elimu ya raia.
Luo Translations: Bura mar Prime Minister pako alwora ma osetiyo maber e tiego ji.

English: Treasury trains journalists on analyzing budget data.
Swahili Translations: Wizara ya Hazina inawazoeza waandishi wa habari kuchambua takwimu za bajeti.
Luo Translations: Ofis mar pesa tayo jondik gasede mondo onon weche ma gin - go e wi pesa.

English: Youth Agenda simulates legislative sessions for youth learning.
Swahili Translations: Agenda Youth inafanya vipindi vya sheria kwa ajili ya kujifunza kwa vijana.

Swahili Translations: NGEC hupima maendeleo ya usawa wa kijinsia katika vitengo vilivyohamishwa.

English: IEBC uses door-to-door campaigns for remote voter awareness.
Swahili Translations: IEBC hutumia kampeni za mlango kwa mlango kwa ajili ya ufahamu wa wapiga kura wa mbali.

Luo Translations: Kama inyalo puonjorego

English: Legal experts explain impact
Swahili Translations: Wataalamu wa Sheria Waeleza Athari
Luo Translations: Jotim Chik Nyiso Kaka Timno Nyalo Kelo Hinyruok

English: Features stories on county spending
Swahili Translations: Ina makala hadithi juu ya matumizi ya wilaya
Luo Translations: Oting'o sigendni e wi tiyo gi alwora

English: Distributed through kiosks and WhatsApp
Swahili Translations: Inasambazwa kupitia kioski na WhatsApp
Luo Translations: Otenore kuom kiosk kod WhatsApp

English: Focus on daily acts of integrity
Swahili Translations: Kazia fikira matendo ya utimilifu ya kila siku
Luo Translations: Ket pachi kuom timbe mapile mag chung' motegno

English: Participants trained on conflict resolution
Swahili Translations: Washiriki waliozoezwa kutatua migogoro
Luo Translations: Jogo ma ne otieg mondo otiek ywaruok

English: Songs submitted via Instagram
Swahili Translations: Nyimbo zilizotumwa kupitia Instagram
Luo Translations: Wende ma ne oor e Instagram

English: Live performance shared nationally
Swahili Translations: Maonyesho ya moja kwa moja ya kitaifa
Luo Translations: Nyasi mar piny mangima

English: Artists depict stories of civic justice
Swahili Translations: Wasanii huonyesha hadithi za haki ya raia
Luo Translations: Jotich molony nyiso kaka dhano nigi ratiro mar dak e ngima maber

English: KICD publishes new digital teaching aids specifically designed for Early Childhood Development Education.
Swahili Translations: KICD huchapisha vifaa vipya vya kufundisha vya digital vilivyoundwa hasa kwa ajili ya Elimu ya Maendeleo ya Utoto wa Mapema.
Luo Translations: KICD goyo gik manyien mag puonjo e digital ma olos ahinya ne tiegruok mar nyithindo ma tindo.

English: Ministry of Education, in partnership with industry leaders, launches online STEM mentorship for high school students.
Swahili Translations: Wizara ya Elimu, kwa kushirikiana na viongozi wa sekta, inazindua mafunzo ya STEM kwa wanafunzi wa shule za sekondari.
Luo Translations: E kindeno, Ministry of Education, kaachiel gi jotelo mag pinyno, chako tiego nyithindo ma nie skunde sekondari e yore mag STEM.

English: Ministry of ICT rolls out certification exams to validate digital literacy competencies among youth nationwide.
Swahili Translations: Wizara ya ICT inazindua mitihani ya vyeti ili kuthibitisha uwezo wa kusoma na kuandika digital miongoni mwa vijana kote nchini.
Luo Translations: Ministry of ICT chako penj mar yudo weche mag somo kod ndiko e piny mangima.

English: Ministry of Education launches mobile application to improve reporting and monitoring of inclusive education programs.
Swahili Translations: Wizara ya Elimu yatangaza programu ya simu ili kuboresha taarifa na ufuatiliaji wa mipango ya elimu ya pamoja.
Luo Translations: Ofis mar Puonjruok mar piny owacho ogolo chenro mar simo mondo okony e miyo ji ong'e kendo luwo chenro mag somo.

English: Teachers Service Commission organizes interactive digital literacy workshops for teachers in underserved areas.
Swahili Translations: Tume ya Huduma ya Walimu inaandaa semina za maingiliano za uandishi wa dijiti kwa walimu katika maeneo yasiyo na huduma.
Luo Translations: Komiti mar Tij Jopuonj timo chenro mar timo seminari mag somo e alwora ma ji ok tiye.

English: Ministry of Education curates digital literature libraries available for all secondary school students.
Swahili Translations: Wizara ya Elimu huandaa maktaba za fasihi za digital ambazo zinapatikana kwa wanafunzi wote wa shule za sekondari.
Luo Translations: Ofis mar Puonjruok chiwo buge mag digital ma yudore ne nyithindo duto manie skunde sekondari.

English: Ministry of ICT updates the national digital competency framework for learners, teachers, and administrators.
Swahili Translations: Wizara ya ICT inasasisha mfumo wa kitaifa wa ujuzi wa digital kwa wanafunzi, walimu, na wasimamizi.
Luo Translations: Ministry of ICT medo timo chenro mar piny mangima mar yudo ng'eyo mar digital ne jopuonjre, jopuonjre, kod jotelo.

English: We will have the STEM pathways taking pure maths, and the other two pathways having a form of maths, so that we have maths in all three pathways in senior school
Swahili Translations: Tutapata njia za STEM kuchukua hisabati safi, na njia nyingine mbili kuwa na aina ya hisabati, hivyo kuwa na hisabati katika njia zote tatu katika shule ya sekondari
Luo Translations: Wabiro yudo yore mag STEM mag kawo somo mar pimo maler, kendo yore ariyo mamoko mag bedo gi kit pimo, omiyo bed gi pimo e yore adekgo e sekondar

English: I will lead the team that will ensure that the recommendations are implemented for the benefit of children and society
Swahili Translations: Mimi nitaongoza timu ambayo itahakikisha kwamba mapendekezo hayo yanapatikana kwa manufaa ya watoto na jamii
Luo Translations: Abiro tayo grup mabiro neno ni paro ma kamago yudore e yo maber ne nyithindo koda ne oganda.

English: The Kenya Institute of Curriculum Development (KICD) has reduced the number of subjects under the Competence-Based Curriculum in line with the recommendations by the Presidential Working Party on Education Reform (PWPER)
Swahili Translations: Taasisi ya Kenya ya Maendeleo ya Mafunzo (KICD) imepunguza idadi ya masomo katika Mafunzo ya Msingi wa Uwezo kulingana na mapendekezo ya Kikundi cha Kazi cha Rais cha Marekebisho ya Elimu (PWPER)
Luo Translations: Kenya Institute for the Advancement of Education (KICD) osedoko chien kwan mar somo e tiegruok mar tiegruok kaluwore gi paro mar President's Working Group on Education Reform (PWPER)

English: Learners sitting for Kenya Primary School Education Assessment (KPSEA) and Kenya Junior School Education Assessment (KJSEA) will now be required to shade their answers using Optical Mark Recognition (OMR) sheets
Swahili Translations: Wanafunzi wanaohudhuria Tathmini ya Elimu ya Shule za Msingi nchini Kenya (KPSEA) na Tathmini ya Elimu ya Shule za Kijana nchini Kenya (KJSEA) sasa watahitajika kutoa majibu yao kwa kutumia karatasi za Utambuzi wa Alama za Macho (OMR).
Luo Translations: Nyithindo ma dhi e Kenya Primary School Education Assessment (KPSEA) kod Kenya Junior School Education Assessment (KJSEA) koro ibiro chuno ni gichiw dwoko maggi ka gitiyo gi kalatese mag Opich (OMR).

English: [Digital Learning Initiative] Government rollout of 1.2 million digital devices including laptops for teachers and tablets for students to all 22,000 public primary schools
Swahili Translations: [ Digital Learning Initiative] Serikali ya kuanzishwa kwa vifaa milioni 1.2 digital ikiwa ni pamoja na kompyuta ndogo kwa walimu na vidonge kwa wanafunzi kwa wote 22,000 shule za msingi za umma
Luo Translations: [ Digital Learning Initiative] Sirkal chako tiyo gi masinde milion 1.2 moriwo nyaka kompyuta moting'o kompyuta mag jopuonjre kod tablet mag jopuonjre e skunde 22,000 mag piny

English: [Training Achievement] Over 91,000 teachers trained to deliver digital learning content as part of Digital Literacy Programme implementation
Swahili Translations: [Mafanikio ya Mafunzo] Walimu zaidi ya 91,000 wamezoezwa kutoa maudhui ya kujifunza ya digital kama sehemu ya utekelezaji wa Mpango wa Digital Literacy
Luo Translations: [Mano e Puonjruok] Jopuonj mokalo 91,000 osepuonjore chiwo gik ma ginyalo puonjore e yor digital kaka achiel kuom chenro mag Digital Literacy Program

English: [Kenya Education Cloud] Digital learning platform providing free educational content during COVID-19 pandemic for remote learning continuity
Swahili Translations: [Kenya Education Cloud] Jukwaa la kujifunza la dijiti ambalo hutoa maudhui ya bure ya elimu wakati wa janga la COVID-19 kwa kuendelea kujifunza kwa mbali
Luo Translations: [Kenya Education Cloud] Puonjruok mar digital ma chiwo puonj maonge chudo e kinde mar tuoche mag COVID-19 kokalo kuom puonjruok mabor

English: [CBC Implementation] Official implementation of Grades 4, 5, and 6 under Competency-Based Curriculum starting January 2020
Swahili Translations: [Utekelezaji wa CBC] Utekelezaji rasmi wa Darasa la 4, 5 na 6 chini ya Mpangilio wa Elimu wa Msingi wa Uwezo kuanzia Januari 2020
Luo Translations: [CBC] Tiyo gi Klas mar 4, 5 kod 6 e bwo Chenro mar Puonjruok e Wi Gik ma Nyalo Chando Ji Chakre Januar 2020

English: KICD: CBC Subjects to be Dropped and Replaced in 2024. The Kenya Institute of Curriculum Development (KICD) plans to lower the number of learning areas for learners within the Competency-Based Curriculum (CBC) beginning in January 2024.
Swahili Translations: KICD: Vitu vya CBC vitatolewa na kubadilishwa mnamo 2024. Taasisi ya Kenya ya Maendeleo ya Mafunzo (KICD) ina mpango wa kupunguza idadi ya maeneo ya kujifunza kwa wanafunzi ndani ya Mafunzo ya Msingi wa Uwezo (CBC) kuanzia Januari 2024.
Luo Translations: KICD: Ibiro golo kendo loko gik ma yudore e CBC e higa mar 2024. Kenya Institute for Training Development (KICD) dwaro dwoko chien kwan mar kuonde ma jopuonjre puonjoree e CBC kochakore Januar 2024.

English: Kenya rebranded CBC to CBE to expand focus beyond curriculum into infrastructure and school systems.
Swahili Translations: Kenya ilibadilisha jina la CBC kuwa CBE ili kupanua lengo zaidi ya programu ya masomo katika miundombinu na mifumo ya shule.
Luo Translations: Kenya noloko nying CBC obed CBE mondo omed jiwo chenro mar somo e ute koda chenro mag skul.

English: Schools lack labs, classrooms, and digital resources to support the reforms.
Swahili Translations: Shule hazina maabara, darasa, na rasilimali za dijiti za kusaidia mageuzi.
Luo Translations: Skunde ok nigi laboratori, klase, kata gik mamoko ma nyalo konyo ji mondo otim lokruok.

English: Project builds English-to-KSL dataset for deaf learners using AI.
Swahili Translations: Mradi huu hujenga seti ya data ya Kiingereza hadi KSL kwa wanafunzi viziwi kwa kutumia AI.
Luo Translations: Chenrono loso chenro mar somo dho Kisungu nyaka KSL ne nyithindo ma itgi odino kotiyo gi rieko mar ng'eyo tiend weche.

English: Mekaela built a digital studio for online learning called Shule Pepe.
Swahili Translations: Mekaela alijenga studio ya digital ya kujifunza mtandaoni inayoitwa Shule Pepe.
Luo Translations: Mekaela nogero studio mar puonjruok e Intanet miluongo ni Shule Pepe.

English: AI tools being tested in Nairobi digital learning centres.
Swahili Translations: Vifaa vya AI vinavyojaribiwa katika vituo vya kujifunza vya digital vya Nairobi.
Luo Translations: Masinde mag AI ma itiyogo e timo nonro e digital learning centers man Nairobi.

English: Literacy platform expands into Kenyan public schools.
Swahili Translations: Jukwaa la kusoma na kuandika linaenea katika shule za umma nchini Kenya.
Luo Translations: E piny Kenya, somo gi ndiko en gima onya ahinya e skunde duto.

English: Project helps Nairobi schools access teacher training and learning tools.
Swahili Translations: Mradi huu husaidia shule za Nairobi kupata vifaa vya mafunzo na kujifunza kwa walimu.
Luo Translations: Chenrono konyo skunde mag Nairobi yudo gige tiego jopuonj.

English: Rural schools receiving tablets and connectivity to boost digital learning.
Swahili Translations: Shule za mashambani zinapata vidonge na uhusiano ili kuongeza kujifunza kwa digital.
Luo Translations: Skunde mag gweng' yudoga mbeseni kod tudruok mondo omi ji opuonjre e yo mar digital.

English: In a joint initiative between KCB Foundation and the Ministry of Education, solar-powered tablets and internet connectivity were delivered to several rural Kenyan schools.
Swahili Translations: Katika mpango wa pamoja kati ya KCB Foundation na Wizara ya Elimu, vidonge vya jua na uhusiano wa mtandao viliwasilishwa kwa shule kadhaa za vijijini Kenya.
Luo Translations: E chenro ma KCB Foundation kod Ministry of Education oriwo, sunscreens kod intanet ne ochiw e skunde moko man Kenya.

English: The DigiSchool pilot, managed by UNESCO, Huawei Kenya, and the Ministry of Education, connected 13 rural and peri-urban schools to high-speed internet using national fiber and wireless solutions.
Swahili Translations: Mradi wa majaribio wa DigiSchool, unaosimamiwa na UNESCO, Huawei Kenya, na Wizara ya Elimu, uliunganisha shule 13 za vijijini na za mijini na mtandao wa kasi kwa kutumia suluhisho za kitaifa za nyuzi na wireless.
Luo Translations: Chenro mar DigiSchool, ma ne itimo gi UNESCO, Huawei Kenya, kod Ministry of Education, noriwo skunde 13 mag gweng' kod mag taon gi intanet ma nigi piche mag ot ka ot kitiyo gi yore mag loso simo kod mag wireless.

English: Huawei inaugurated a new ICT computer lab with 30 desktops and smart teaching screens at St. Stephens Namasoli Secondary School, Kakamega County.
Swahili Translations: Huawei ilifungua maabara mpya ya kompyuta ya ICT na kompyuta 30 na skrini za kufundisha smart katika Shule ya Upili ya St. Stephens Namasoli, Kaunti ya Kakamega.
Luo Translations: Huawei oseyawo laboratori manyien mar ICT kod kompyuta 30 kod piche mag puonjo mariek e St. Stephens Namasoli High School, Kakamega County.

English: At Muhomo Primary School in Lugari, World Vision and government stakeholders provided educational tablets preloaded with literacy and numeracy software (ABRA).
Swahili Translations: Katika Shule ya Msingi ya Muhomo mjini Lugari, World Vision na mashirika ya serikali yalitoa vidonge vya elimu vilivyojaa programu ya kusoma na kuandika (ABRA).
Luo Translations: E skul maduong ' mar piny Lugari, World Vision kod riwruoge mag sirkal ne ochiwo buge moting'o buge ma lero somo kod ndiko (ABRA).

English: Introduces a multimodal AI pipeline that processes spoken English through speech-to-text, converts it into American Sign Language (ASL) gloss, and generates lifelike 3D sign language animations.
Swahili Translations: Inaanzisha bomba la AI la multimodal ambalo hutumia Kiingereza kinachosemwa kupitia hotuba hadi maandishi, huibadilisha kuwa gloss ya Lugha ya Ishara ya Amerika (ASL), na hutoa picha za lugha ya ishara ya 3D kama ya maisha.
Luo Translations: Oketonwa tiyo mar AI ma tiyo gi dho Kisungu ma ji wacho e dhok ma ji ndiko, oloke mondo obed yo ma ji wuoyogo gi dho Amerika mar Kisungu, kendo ochiwo piche mag 3D mag dho momni kaka ngima.

English: Introduces a real-time, non-intrusive AI system for ASL learning.
Swahili Translations: Inaanzisha wakati halisi, yasiyo ya uvamizi AI mfumo kwa kujifunza ASL.
Luo Translations: Oting'o chenro mar puonjruok ASL e yo ma ok kal tong'.

English: Read to succeed! Ensure every student has textbooks.
Swahili Translations: Soma ili ufanikiwe! Hakikisha kila mwanafunzi ana vitabu vya masomo.
Luo Translations: Som mondo iti maber! Tem neno ni japuonjre ka japuonjre nigi buge ma nyalo konye somo.

English: Go digital! Equip schools with computers and internet.
Swahili Translations: Fanya shule ziwe na kompyuta na Intaneti.
Luo Translations: Timuru gik moko duto mondo skunde obed gi kompyuta kod Intanet.

English: Empower teachers! Provide training for modern teaching methods.
Swahili Translations: Wafundishe walimu! Wafundishe njia za kisasa za kufundisha.
Luo Translations: Puonjgi puonjo e yo mong'ith.

English: Build knowledge! Establish libraries in every school.
Swahili Translations: Jenga maarifa! Ianzisha maktaba katika kila shule.
Luo Translations: Gie sani, oseloso buge e skul ka skul.

English: Experiment and learn! Equip schools with science laboratories.
Swahili Translations: Jaribu na ujifunze!
Luo Translations: Tem ane puonjori!

English: Access free resources! Distribute free textbooks to rural schools.
Swahili Translations: Pata rasilimali za bure!
Luo Translations: Yud gige tich ma onge chudo!

English: Support teachers! Provide teaching aids and lesson plans.
Swahili Translations: Wasaidie walimu!
Luo Translations: Kony jopuonj!

English: Build better schools! Invest in classrooms and facilities.
Swahili Translations: Jenga shule bora, uwekeze katika madarasa na vifaa.
Luo Translations: Gero skul mabeyo, kendo iket pesa e klas kod e gige tich.

English: Learn farming! Include agricultural education in schools.
Swahili Translations: Jifunze kilimo!
Luo Translations: Puonjri timo pur!

English: Modernize learning! Install smart boards in classrooms.
Swahili Translations: Weka bodi za akili katika madarasa.
Luo Translations: Ket tong' mag somo e klas.

English: Boost STEM! Promote science and technology in schools.
Swahili Translations: Kuendeleza STEM! Kuendeleza sayansi na teknolojia katika shule.
Luo Translations: Timo dongruok e weche mag sayans kod teknoloji e skul.

English: Learn comfortably! Provide desks and chairs for students.
Swahili Translations: Jifunze kwa raha! Wape wanafunzi dawati na viti.
Luo Translations: Bed mamor sama ipuonjo kendo iket jopuonjre obed e mesa kod kombe.

English: Motivate teachers! Offer bonuses for rural school postings.
Swahili Translations: Wafundishe walimu! Toa bonasi kwa ajili ya kazi za shule za mashambani.
Luo Translations: Chiw pesa ma inyalo chiw ne jopuonj mondo otigo e skul.

English: Expand minds! Stock school libraries with diverse books.
Swahili Translations: Ongeza akili zako!
Luo Translations: Med paro!

English: Connect to learn! Provide free Wi-Fi in schools.
Swahili Translations: Kuunganisha ili kujifunza! Kutoa bure Wi-Fi katika shule.
Luo Translations: Riwruok mar puonjruok! Chiw Wi-Fi maonge chudo e skul.

English: Grow skills! Equip schools with agricultural training labs.
Swahili Translations: Ongeza ustadi!
Luo Translations: Med lony mari!

English: Government to expand the Digital Literacy Programme (DLP) to all primary schools, providing tablets and content for learners
Swahili Translations: Serikali kupanua Mpango wa Kujifunza Kusoma na Kujifunza Digital (DLP) kwa shule zote za msingi, kutoa vidonge na maudhui kwa wanafunzi
Luo Translations: Sirkal medo chenro mar Puonjruok somo kod puonjruok digital (DLP) e skunde duto mag sekondari, ka chiwo tablet kod gik ma yudore e iye ne jopuonjre

English: Government announces ongoing free textbook distribution program to primary and secondary schools nationwide for improved learning.
Swahili Translations: Serikali yatangaza mpango wa kusambaza vitabu vya shule za msingi na sekondari kwa bure kote nchini kwa ajili ya kuboresha elimu.
Luo Translations: Sirkal lando chenro mar pogo buge mag skul e piny mangima maonge chudo mondo okony ji yudo somo maber.

English: Government launches a nationwide campaign to promote Science, Technology, Engineering, and Mathematics (STEM) education
Swahili Translations: Serikali yaanza kampeni ya kuimarisha elimu ya Sayansi, Teknolojia, Uhandisi, na Hisabati (STEM)
Luo Translations: Sirkal chako kampen mar jiwo somo mar Sayans, Teknoloji, Injinia, kod Kwan

English: TSC emphasizes the importance of Information and Communication Technology (ICT) integration in teaching and learning processes
Swahili Translations: TSC inasisitiza umuhimu wa kuunganisha Teknolojia ya Habari na Mawasiliano (ICT) katika mchakato wa kufundisha na kujifunza
Luo Translations: TSC jiwo gimomiyo dwarore ni oti gi Information and Communication Technology (ICT) e puonjo kod puonjruok

English: KICD calls for development of relevant e-learning content to support remote learning and digital education initiatives
Swahili Translations: KICD inataka maendeleo ya yaliyomo kwenye e-learning ili kusaidia mipango ya kujifunza kwa mbali na elimu ya digital
Luo Translations: KICD dwaro ni e-learning obed gi dongruok e konyo chenro mag puonjruok mabor kod somo mar digital

English: Technical and Vocational Education and Training Authority (TVETA) emphasizes the importance of TVET for youth employment.
Swahili Translations: Tume ya Elimu na Mafunzo ya Ufundi na Ufundi (TVETA) inasisitiza umuhimu wa TVET kwa ajira ya vijana.
Luo Translations: Komiti mar Puonjruok e Weche Tiego gi Tiego (TVETA) jiwo ahinya gimomiyo tiyo gi TVET konyo rowere.

English: Teachers receive training on effective use of digital learning tools and platforms in classrooms
Swahili Translations: Walimu wanapewa mafunzo ya kutumia kwa ufanisi zana na majukwaa ya kujifunza digital katika madarasa
Luo Translations: Jopuonj tiego mondo oti gi gige puonjruok mar digital e yo maber e klas

English: Kenya National Library Service (KNLS) announces program to equip school libraries with more resources.
Swahili Translations: Huduma ya Maktaba ya Kitaifa ya Kenya (KNLS) yatangaza mpango wa kuandaa maktaba za shule na rasilimali zaidi.
Luo Translations: Kenya National Library Service (KNLS) lando chenro mar chiwo buge momedore e skunde kod gik mamoko.

English: Government to provide science laboratory equipment to secondary schools to boost practical learning.
Swahili Translations: Serikali kutoa vifaa vya maabara ya sayansi kwa shule za sekondari ili kuongeza kujifunza kwa vitendo.
Luo Translations: Sirkal chiwo gik ma konyo e puonjo ji weche sayans e skunde madongo mondo omi gimed puonjore e yo maber.

English: Government aims to enhance internet connectivity in schools to facilitate digital learning.
Swahili Translations: Serikali inakusudia kuboresha uhusiano wa mtandao katika shule ili kuwezesha kujifunza kwa njia ya digital.
Luo Translations: Sirkal dwaro ni oti gi intanet e tiego skul mondo okony ji opuonjre e yo ma nyiso rieko.

English: Teachers Service Commission (TSC) to enhance teacher resource centres for continuous professional development.
Swahili Translations: Tume ya Huduma ya Walimu (TSC) ili kuongeza vituo vya rasilimali za walimu kwa ajili ya maendeleo ya kitaaluma ya kuendelea.
Luo Translations: Komiti mar Tij Jopuonj (TSC) mondo omed konyo jopuonj obed gi chenro mar timo dongruok e weche mag tiegruok.

English: KICD develops specialized digital content and learning materials for learners with special needs.
Swahili Translations: KICD huendeleza maudhui ya digital na vifaa vya kujifunza kwa wanafunzi wenye mahitaji maalum.
Luo Translations: KICD loso gik ma yudore e digital kod gik ma konyo e puonjruok ne jopuonjre ma nigi dwaro makende.

English: Universities encouraged to develop and utilize Open Educational Resources (OER) for wider access to learning materials.
Swahili Translations: Vyuo vikuu vilihimizwa kuendeleza na kutumia rasilimali za elimu wazi (OER) kwa upatikanaji mpana wa vifaa vya kujifunza.
Luo Translations: Ne ojiw yunivasiti mondo oti gi yore mag somo ma yudore e piny mangima.

English: Government allocates funds for upgrading infrastructure in Technical and Vocational Education and Training (TVET) institutions.
Swahili Translations: Serikali hutoa fedha kwa ajili ya kuboresha miundombinu katika taasisi za elimu na mafunzo ya kiufundi na kitaaluma (TVET).
Luo Translations: Sirkal chiwo pesa mondo okony e loso chenro mag tiegruok mag tiegruok kod tiegruok mag teknoloji (TVET).

English: Universities encouraged to develop and utilize Open Educational Resources (OER) for wider access to learning materials.
Swahili Translations: Vyuo vikuu vilihimizwa kuendeleza na kutumia rasilimali za elimu wazi (OER) kwa upatikanaji mpana wa vifaa vya kujifunza.
Luo Translations: Ne ojiw yunivasiti mondo oti gi yore mag somo ma yudore e piny mangima.

English: Government allocates funds for upgrading infrastructure in Technical and Vocational Education and Training (TVET) institutions.
Swahili Translations: Serikali hutoa fedha kwa ajili ya kuboresha miundombinu katika taasisi za elimu na mafunzo ya kiufundi na kitaaluma (TVET).
Luo Translations: Sirkal chiwo pesa mondo okony e loso chenro mag tiegruok mag tiegruok kod tiegruok mag teknoloji (TVET).

English: Ministry of Education to equip more school laboratories to improve practical teaching and learning of sciences.
Swahili Translations: Wizara ya Elimu kuandaa maabara zaidi ya shule ili kuboresha mafundisho ya sayansi.
Luo Translations: Ofis mar Puonjruok biro chiwo laboratori mamoko mag somo mondo otiek tiegruok mag sayans.

English: KNEC to conduct training for teachers on new e-assessment tools for continuous assessment.
Swahili Translations: KNEC kufanya mafunzo kwa walimu juu ya zana mpya za e-utathmini kwa ajili ya tathmini ya kuendelea.
Luo Translations: KNEC timo tiegruok ne jopuonj e wi gik manyien ma nyalo konyo e timo nonro.

English: KICD provides guidelines and resources for continued home learning during the extended school closures.
Swahili Translations: KICD hutoa miongozo na rasilimali za kuendelea kujifunza nyumbani wakati wa kufungwa kwa shule kwa muda mrefu.
Luo Translations: KICD chiwo puonj koda gik ma konyo ji mondo odhi nyime puonjore e ot sama skul ogurore kuom kinde malach.

English: Government rolls out initiative to provide affordable internet access to all public schools.
