Swahili Translations: Serikali inaanzisha mpango wa kutoa ufikiaji wa mtandao kwa bei rahisi kwa shule zote za umma.
Luo Translations: Sirkal chako chenro mar miyo skunde duto mag sirkal thuolo mar tiyo gi Intanet e yo mayot.

English: KICD develops specialized digital learning content for visually impaired learners to enhance inclusivity.
Swahili Translations: KICD huendeleza maudhui maalum ya kujifunza digital kwa wanafunzi wenye ulemavu wa kuona ili kuongeza uingiliaji.
Luo Translations: KICD loso gik moko mag digital mag puonjruok ne nyithindo ma nigi tuoche mag neno mondo omed konyo ji.

English: Government procures and distributes modern technical equipment to TVET institutions to boost practical skills.
Swahili Translations: Serikali inachukua na kusambaza vifaa vya kisasa vya kiufundi kwa taasisi za Elimu ya Televisheni ili kuongeza ujuzi wa vitendo.
Luo Translations: Sirkal kawo kendo chiwo gik manyien mag teknoloji ne kuonde tiego ji e televison mondo omi gibed gi lony e weche mag somo.

English: Ministry of ICT and KICD launch program to enhance digital literacy skills among parents to support home learning.
Swahili Translations: Wizara ya Habari na Habari (ICT) na KICD yaanza mpango wa kuongeza ujuzi wa kusoma na kuandika digital kati ya wazazi ili kusaidia kujifunza nyumbani.
Luo Translations: Ministry of Information and Information (ICT) kod KICD chako chenro mar medo lony e somo kod ndiko e kind jonyuol mondo okony jopuonjre puonjore e ot.

English: Ministry of Education partners with private sector to provide digital learning devices to more schools.
Swahili Translations: Wizara ya Elimu inashirikiana na sekta binafsi kutoa vifaa vya kujifunza digital kwa shule zaidi.
Luo Translations: Ministry of Education tiyo kanyachiel gi sirkal mondo gichiw gik ma nyalo konyo e puonjo e yor digital e skunde mamoko.

English: TVETA oversees the development of new training manuals for vocational courses to meet industry demands.
Swahili Translations: TVETA inaangazia maendeleo ya vitabu vipya vya mafunzo kwa ajili ya kozi za kitaaluma ili kukidhi mahitaji ya sekta.
Luo Translations: TVETA chiwo ripot mar loso buge manyien mag tiego ji e tiegruok mag somo mondo omi gikony e chopo dwaro mag tijno.

English: The government plans to roll out more digital learning devices to primary schools to enhance technology integration.
Swahili Translations: Serikali inatarajia kuanzisha vifaa zaidi vya kujifunza digital katika shule za msingi ili kuongeza ushirikiano wa teknolojia.
Luo Translations: Sirkal dwaro ni mondo oti gi masinde mag digital e puonjo nyithindo e skunde matindo mondo okony e medo tudruok e kindgi gi teknoloji.

English: National Research Fund (NRF) calls for proposals to enhance research and innovation in Kenyan universities.
Swahili Translations: Mfuko wa Kitaifa wa Utafiti (NRF) unaomba mapendekezo ya kuongeza utafiti na uvumbuzi katika vyuo vikuu vya Kenya.
Luo Translations: Riwruok mar National Research Fund (NRF) kwayo mondo omi josomo mamoko e yunivasiti mag Kenya thuolo mar timo nonro kendo timo gik manyien.

English: New policy on standardized school infrastructure development to ensure quality learning environments.
Swahili Translations: Sera mpya ya maendeleo ya miundombinu ya shule ili kuhakikisha mazingira ya elimu yenye ubora.
Luo Translations: Chenro manyien mar loso chenro mag skul mondo omi omi ji opuonjre e yo maber.

English: TSC launches comprehensive digital literacy training program for all teachers to improve ICT integration.
Swahili Translations: TSC inazindua programu ya mafunzo ya jumla ya uandishi wa dijiti kwa walimu wote ili kuboresha ushirikiano wa ICT.
Luo Translations: TSC chako chenro mar tiego jopuonj duto e wi ndiko weche mag digital mondo okony e medo tudruok e kind ICT.

English: KICD to ensure all learning materials, including digital, are accessible to learners with various disabilities.
Swahili Translations: KICD kuhakikisha vifaa vyote vya kujifunza, ikiwa ni pamoja na digital, vinaweza kupatikana kwa wanafunzi wenye ulemavu mbalimbali.
Luo Translations: KICD miyo jopuonjre ma nigi midekre duto thuolo mar puonjore, moriwo nyaka gik ma yudore e Intanet.

English: Kenya National Library Service (KNLS) partners with donors to establish and stock more school libraries.
Swahili Translations: Huduma ya Maktaba ya Kitaifa ya Kenya (KNLS) inashirikiana na wafadhili kuanzisha na kuhifadhi maktaba zaidi za shule.
Luo Translations: Ofis mar Kenya National Library Service (KNLS) tiyo gi joma chiwo chiwo mondo ochak kendo orit buge mamoko mag skul.

English: Universities urged to offer training on emerging technologies to prepare students for future job markets.
Swahili Translations: Vyuo vikuu viliombwa kutoa mafunzo juu ya teknolojia zinazoibuka ili kuwaandalia wanafunzi masoko ya ajira ya baadaye.
Luo Translations: Ne okwayo yunivasiti mondo otieg ji e wi teknoloji manyien mondo omi jopuonjre obed gi thuolo mag yudo tich e kinde mabiro.

English: KICD announces plans to accelerate the development of digital learning content for primary school learners.
Swahili Translations: KICD inatangaza mipango ya kuharakisha maendeleo ya maudhui ya kujifunza digital kwa wanafunzi wa shule za msingi.
Luo Translations: KICD lando chenro mar medo dongruok e weche mag digital e kind jopuonjre mag skul.

English: Kenya National Library Service (KNLS) launches initiatives to promote a reading culture among students nationwide.
Swahili Translations: Huduma ya Maktaba ya Kitaifa ya Kenya (KNLS) inazindua mipango ya kukuza utamaduni wa kusoma kati ya wanafunzi kote nchini.
Luo Translations: Ofis mar Kenya National Library Service (KNLS) chako chenro mar jiwo kit somo e kind jopuonjre e pinyno duto.

English: Teachers Service Commission (TSC) announces new STEM teacher training programs to address skill gaps.
Swahili Translations: Tume ya Huduma ya Walimu (TSC) yatangaza mipango mipya ya mafunzo ya walimu wa STEM ili kutatua mapungufu ya ujuzi.
Luo Translations: Kanyakla mar Teacher Services Commission (TSC) lando chenro manyien mag tiego jopuonj mag STEM mondo gitiek yuto mar ng'eyo.

English: Government to invest in infrastructure for digital learning hubs in communities to broaden access.
Swahili Translations: Serikali yawekeza katika miundombinu ya kujifunza digital katika jamii ili kupanua upatikanaji.
Luo Translations: Sirkal medo keto pesa e chenro mag puonjruok digital e oganda mondo omi ji obed gi thuolo mar puonjore.

English: Ministry of Energy and Education promote the adoption of green energy solutions in schools.
Swahili Translations: Wizara ya Nishati na Elimu inasaidia kupitishwa kwa suluhisho za nishati ya kijani katika shule.
Luo Translations: Ofis mar Siro Tekogo kod Puonjruok konyo e loso yore mag tiyo gi teko mar lowo e skul.

English: Kenya National Archives and Documentation Service digitizes educational records for easier access.
Swahili Translations: Huduma ya Arkibu na Nyaraka ya Kitaifa ya Kenya huhifadhi rekodi za elimu kwa njia ya dijiti ili iwe rahisi kupata rekodi hizo.
Luo Translations: Ofis mar Kenya's National Archives kod Archives of Kenya, tiyo gi kompyuta mondo okony ji yudo weche duto ma yudore e skundno.

English: KICD endorses various online learning platforms to supplement classroom instruction for students.
Swahili Translations: KICD inakubaliana na majukwaa mbalimbali ya kujifunza mtandaoni ili kuongeza mafunzo ya darasa kwa wanafunzi.
Luo Translations: KICD tiyo gi chenro mopogore opogore mag puonjruok e Intanet mondo okony jopuonjre yudo tiegruok momedore.

English: National Research Fund (NRF) invites applications for funding academic research in Kenyan universities.
Swahili Translations: Mfuko wa Kitaifa wa Utafiti (NRF) unaalika maombi ya fedha kwa ajili ya utafiti wa kitaaluma katika vyuo vikuu vya Kenya.
Luo Translations: Riwruok mar National Research Fund (NRF) golo kwayo mar yudo pesa mar timo nonro e yunivasiti mag Kenya.

English: KICD announces increased availability of digital textbooks for CBC learners through various platforms.
Swahili Translations: KICD inatangaza upatikanaji mkubwa wa vitabu vya kusoma vya dijiti kwa wanafunzi wa CBC kupitia majukwaa mbalimbali.
Luo Translations: KICD lando ni jopuonjre mag CBC nyalo yudo buge mag somo e yor digital e yore mopogore opogore.

English: KICD and NGOs collaborate to develop inclusive learning aids for diverse learners including those with special needs.
Swahili Translations: KICD na mashirika yasiyo ya kiserikali hushirikiana kutengeneza misaada ya kujifunza ya pamoja kwa wanafunzi mbalimbali, ikiwa ni pamoja na wale walio na mahitaji maalum.
Luo Translations: KICD kaachiel gi riwruoge mamoko ma ok mag sirkal tiyo kanyachiel mondo gichiw kony ma konyo jopuonjre mopogore opogore, moriwo nyaka jogo ma nigi dwaro makende.

English: Government announces significant investment in upgrading and expanding school infrastructure nationwide.
Swahili Translations: Serikali yatangaza uwekezaji mkubwa katika kuboresha na kupanua miundombinu ya shule kote nchini.
Luo Translations: Sirkal lando ni gibiro medo tiego skul e piny mangima.

English: Ministry of Education and Ministry of Labour develop new career guidance tools for students.
Swahili Translations: Wizara ya Elimu na Wizara ya Kazi huandaa zana mpya za mwongozo wa kazi kwa wanafunzi.
Luo Translations: Ofise mag somo kod mag tich chiwo buge manyien ma tayo jopuonjre.

English: Teachers Service Commission (TSC) launches a program to equip primary school teachers with advanced digital skills.
Swahili Translations: Tume ya Huduma ya Walimu (TSC) inazindua mpango wa kuwapa walimu wa shule za msingi ujuzi wa juu wa dijiti.
Luo Translations: TSC chako chenro mar konyo jopuonj e skul mag sekondar obed gi lony e weche mag digital.

English: Ministry of Education distributes science kits to primary schools to enhance practical learning.
Swahili Translations: Wizara ya Elimu hutoa vifaa vya sayansi kwa shule za msingi ili kuongeza kujifunza kwa njia ya vitendo.
Luo Translations: Ofis mar Puonjruok chiwo gik ma konyo e puonjo nyithindo e skunde matindo mondo omi gimed puonjore e yo maber.

English: KICD seeks collaboration with private publishers to develop more digital learning content.
Swahili Translations: KICD inatafuta ushirikiano na wachapishaji binafsi ili kuendeleza maudhui zaidi ya kujifunza digital.
Luo Translations: KICD manyo yore mag tiyo kanyachiel gi jorit mag digital mondo gichop e weche mag puonjruok.

English: TVETA secures funding for modernization and equipping of workshops in TVET institutions.
Swahili Translations: TVETA huandaa fedha za kuboresha na kuandaa semina katika taasisi za Elimu ya Televisheni.
Luo Translations: TVETA chiwo pesa mondo otigo e loso kendo chano chokruoge mag tiego ji e televison.

English: Teachers Service Commission (TSC) develops new professional development modules for teachers under CBC.
Swahili Translations: Tume ya Huduma ya Walimu (TSC) inaendeleza moduli mpya za maendeleo ya kitaaluma kwa walimu chini ya CBC.
Luo Translations: Teacher Services Commission (TSC) loso modules manyien mag dongruok mar jopuonj e bwo CBC.

English: Government announces a phased provision of modern science equipment to all secondary schools.
Swahili Translations: Serikali yatangaza kutoa vifaa vya kisasa vya kisayansi kwa shule zote za sekondari.
Luo Translations: Sirkal lando ni ibiro mi skunde duto mag sekondari gik manyien mag sayans.

English: KICD is accelerating the development of digital learning content to support the Competency-Based Curriculum (CBC) implementation.
Swahili Translations: KICD inaharakisha maendeleo ya maudhui ya kujifunza digital kusaidia utekelezaji wa Curriculum-Based-Competence (CBC).
Luo Translations: KICD medo timo dongruok e weche mag puonjruok mag digital mondo okony tich mar Curriculum-Based-Competence (CBC).

English: Government allocates funds for equipping TVET institutions with modern machinery and tools for practical training.
Swahili Translations: Serikali hutoa fedha za kuwapa taasisi za Elimu ya Televisheni mashine na zana za kisasa za mafunzo ya kitendo.
Luo Translations: Sirkal chiwo pesa mondo omi riwruoge mag tiego ji oti gi masinde kod gige tiego ji.

English: Ministry of Energy and Education promote education on renewable energy technologies in schools and TVETs.
Swahili Translations: Wizara ya Nishati na Elimu kuhamasisha elimu juu ya teknolojia za nishati mbadala katika shule na katika Elimu ya Elimu ya Televisheni.
Luo Translations: Ofis mar Siro Teknoloji mag Siro Teknoloji mag Siro Teknoloji mag Siro Teknoloji mag Siro Teknoloji mag Siro Teknoloji mag Siro Teknoloji mag Siro Teknoloji mag Siro Teknoloji mag Siro Teknoloji mag Siro Teknoloji mag Siro Teknoloji mag Siro Teknoloji mag Siro Teknoloji mag Siro Teknoloji mag Siro Teknoloji mag Siro Teknoloji mag Siro Teknoloji mag Siro Teknoloji mag Siro Teknoloji mag Siro Teknoloji mag Siro Teknoloji mag Siro Teknoloji mag Siro Tekni Tekni mag Siro Tekni mag Siro Tekni mag Siro Tekni mag Siro Tekni mag Siro Tekni mag Siro Tekni mag Siro Tekni mag Siro Tekni mag Siro Tekni mag Siro Tekni mag Siro Tekni mag Siro Tekni mag Siro Tekni mag Siro Tekni mag Siro Tek

English: Ministry of ICT seeks partnerships to expand digital infrastructure and connectivity to all schools.
Swahili Translations: Wizara ya ICT inatafuta ushirikiano ili kupanua miundombinu ya dijiti na uhusiano kwa shule zote.
Luo Translations: Ministry of ICT dwaro tiyo kanyachiel mondo omed bedo gi chenro mag digital kod tudruok e kind skul duto.

English: Teachers Service Commission (TSC) to provide specialized training and resources for Special Needs Education (SNE) teachers.
Swahili Translations: Tume ya Huduma ya Walimu (TSC) kutoa mafunzo maalum na rasilimali kwa walimu wa Elimu ya Mahitaji Maalum (SNE).
Luo Translations: TSC chiwo tiegruok kod gik mamoko mag tiego jopuonj ma nigi dwaro makende.

English: Kenya National Library Service (KNLS) announces expansion of e-library services to more schools nationwide.
Swahili Translations: Huduma ya Maktaba ya Kitaifa ya Kenya (KNLS) inatangaza kupanua huduma za maktaba ya elektroniki kwa shule zaidi kote nchini.
Luo Translations: Kenya National Library Service (KNLS) lando ni ibiro mede chenro mar tiyo gi kompyuta e tiegruok mag skul e pinyno duto.

English: Ministry of Agriculture and Education promote school agricultural programs for food security and skills development.
Swahili Translations: Wizara ya Kilimo na Elimu huendeleza mipango ya kilimo ya shule kwa ajili ya usalama wa chakula na maendeleo ya ujuzi.
Luo Translations: Ofis mar Puonjruok kod Puonjo e Piny owacho timo chenro mag puodho e skul mondo omi ji obed gi chiemo moromo kendo gibed gi lony.

English: KICD explores ways to integrate indigenous knowledge and practices into the school curriculum.
Swahili Translations: KICD inatafuta njia za kuingiza maarifa na mazoea ya wenyeji katika programu ya masomo ya shule.
Luo Translations: KICD manyo yore mag keto ng'eyo kod timbe mag jopinyno e program mar somo.

English: Kenya National Examinations Council (KNEC) funds research on factors influencing learning outcomes in schools.
Swahili Translations: Baraza la Kitaifa la Mafunzo ya Kenya (KNEC) linafadhili utafiti juu ya sababu zinazoathiri matokeo ya kujifunza katika shule.
Luo Translations: Riwruok mar Kenya National Council of Education (KNEC) chiwo pesa mondo otiek nonro ma timore e wi gik ma miyo nyithindo puonjore e skul.

English: Government to equip community learning centers with resources to support out-of-school youth.
Swahili Translations: Serikali kuwapa vituo vya elimu vya jamii rasilimali za kusaidia vijana nje ya shule.
Luo Translations: Sirkal chiwo ne riwruoge mag tiegruok mag oganda gik ma konyo rowere ma ok dhi e skul.

English: University of Nairobi to make more course materials available as Open Educational Resources (OER).
Swahili Translations: Chuo Kikuu cha Nairobi kutoa vifaa zaidi vya kozi kama Open Educational Resources (OER).
Luo Translations: Yunivasiti mar Nairobi chiwo gik mamoko mag tiegruok kaka Open Educational Resources (OER).

English: National Research Fund (NRF) announces new calls for research proposals in the education sector.
Swahili Translations: Mfuko wa Kitaifa wa Utafiti (NRF) unatangaza wito mpya wa mapendekezo ya utafiti katika sekta ya elimu.
Luo Translations: Riwruok mar National Research Fund (NRF) lando chenro manyien mar timo nonro e weche mag somo.

English: KICD prioritizes the development of inclusive digital learning resources for all learners.
Swahili Translations: KICD inaweka kipaumbele maendeleo ya rasilimali za kujifunza za dijiti kwa wanafunzi wote.
Luo Translations: KICD keto dongruok e yore mag puonjruok mag digital e nyim jopuonjre duto obed motelo.

English: KICD urges schools to embrace e-learning platforms to ensure continuity of learning during unforeseen emergencies.
Swahili Translations: KICD inawasihi shule ziingilie majukwaa ya e-learning ili kuhakikisha kuendelea kwa kujifunza wakati wa dharura zisizotarajiwa.
Luo Translations: KICD jiwo skul mondo oti gi e-learning mondo omi jopuonjre odhi nyime puonjore e kinde mag chandruok.

English: Ministry of ICT pushes for universal digital literacy across all levels of education in Kenya.
Swahili Translations: Wizara ya ICT inasisitiza elimu ya digital kwa kiwango chote nchini Kenya.
Luo Translations: Ministry of ICT jiwo somo mar digital e piny Kenya.

English: KICD commits to increasing the availability of braille and large print textbooks for visually impaired learners.
Swahili Translations: KICD inajitolea kuongeza upatikanaji wa vitabu vya kusoma vya maandishi ya vipofu na vitabu vya kusoma vya kuchapishwa kwa wingi kwa wanafunzi wenye matatizo ya kuona.
Luo Translations: KICD ochiwore mondo otiek somo buge ma konyo joma muofni, kendo otiek somo buge ma yudore e dhok mamoko ne jopuonjre ma nigi chandruok mar neno.

English: Ministry of Education launches nationwide campaigns to inspire students to pursue careers in Science, Technology, Engineering, and Mathematics.
Swahili Translations: Wizara ya Elimu inazindua kampeni za kitaifa za kuwachochea wanafunzi kufuatilia kazi katika Sayansi, Teknolojia, Uhandisi, na Hisabati.
Luo Translations: Ofis mar Puonjruok chako kampen e piny mangima mar jiwo jopuonjre mondo odhi nyime tiyo ne Nyasaye e weche mag Sayans, Teknoloji, Injinia, kod Kwan.

English: Ministry of Education explores deployment of mobile science laboratories to enhance practical learning in rural schools.
Swahili Translations: Wizara ya Elimu inatafuta kutekeleza maabara ya sayansi ya mkononi ili kuongeza ujifunzaji wa vitendo katika shule za vijijini.
Luo Translations: Ofis mar Puonjruok dwaro tiyo gi masin mag sayans e siro puonjruok e skul mag gweng'.

English: Kenya National Library Service (KNLS) announces new initiatives to invest in stocking and modernizing school libraries.
Swahili Translations: Huduma ya Maktaba ya Kitaifa ya Kenya (KNLS) inatangaza mipango mipya ya kuwekeza katika kuhifadhi na kuboresha maktaba za shule.
Luo Translations: Ofis mar Kenya National Library Service (KNLS) lando chenro manyien mag keto pesa e rito koda medo bero ute mag somo.

English: KICD develops new digital learning content specifically tailored for Early Childhood Development Education (ECDE).
Swahili Translations: KICD huendeleza maudhui mapya ya kujifunza digital ambayo yameboreshwa hasa kwa Elimu ya Maendeleo ya Utoto wa Mapema (ECDE).
Luo Translations: KICD loso gik manyien mag puonjruok e digital ma olos ahinya ne Puonjruok e Wi Wach Timo Dongruok mar Nyithindo (ECDE).

English: Government commits to a phased provision of modern science laboratory equipment to all public secondary schools.
Swahili Translations: Serikali inajitolea kutoa vifaa vya kisasa vya maabara ya sayansi kwa shule zote za sekondari za umma.
Luo Translations: Sirkal ochiwore chiwo gik manyien mag sayans ne skunde duto mag sekondar.

English: KICD announces partnerships with publishers for the development and distribution of digital textbooks for CBC.
Swahili Translations: KICD inatangaza ushirikiano na wachapishaji kwa ajili ya maendeleo na usambazaji wa vitabu vya digital kwa ajili ya CBC.
Luo Translations: KICD lando riwruok mar tich gi jo moloso buge mondo olos kendo ogol buge mag digital ne CBC.

English: Ministry of ICT and KICD conduct training for teachers on effective utilization of e-learning tools and platforms.
Swahili Translations: Wizara ya Habari na Ufahamu wa Habari (ICT) na KICD huandaa mafunzo kwa walimu kuhusu matumizi bora ya zana na majukwaa ya e-learning.
Luo Translations: Ministry of Information and Information (ICT) kod KICD chiwo tiegruok ne jopuonj e wi tiyo gi e-learning e yo maber.

English: Ministry of Education to strengthen career guidance and counseling services in secondary schools.
Swahili Translations: Wizara ya Elimu kuimarisha huduma za mwongozo wa kazi na ushauri katika shule za sekondari.
Luo Translations: Ofis mar Puonjruok biro jiwo chenro mar somo kod chiwo paro e skunde madongo.

English: TVETA announces establishment of digital resource centers in TVET institutions to support e-learning.
Swahili Translations: TVETA yatangaza kuanzishwa kwa vituo vya rasilimali za dijiti katika taasisi za TVET kusaidia e-kujifunza.
Luo Translations: TVETA lando ni ibiro chungi kuonde ma ji yudoe gik ma digital e ute mag TVET mondo okony e puonjruok.

English: The Ministry of Education announces a new initiative to equip all public secondary schools with modern science laboratories.
Swahili Translations: Wizara ya Elimu yatangaza mpango mpya wa kuwapa wanafunzi wote wa shule za sekondari vifaa vya kisasa vya sayansi.
Luo Translations: Ofis mar Puonjruok e Piny owacho, lando chenro manyien mar chiwo gik manyien mag sayans ne nyithindo duto manie skunde sekondari.

English: The government confirms continued distribution of free laptops to Grade 1 learners under the Digital Literacy Programme.
Swahili Translations: Serikali inathibitisha kuendelea kusambaza kompyuta ndogo za bure kwa wanafunzi wa darasa la 1 chini ya Mpango wa Kujifunza Kusoma na Kujifunza Digital.
Luo Translations: Sirkal osenyiso ni gidhi nyime chiwo kompyuta matindo maonge chudo ne nyithindo manie klas 1 e bwo chenro mar Puonjruok somo kod puonjruok digital.

English: The Kenya National Library Service (KNLS) launches a nationwide campaign to promote reading habits among students.
Swahili Translations: Shirika la Maktaba la Kitaifa la Kenya (KNLS) linazindua kampeni ya kuimarisha tabia ya kusoma miongoni mwa wanafunzi.
Luo Translations: Kenya National Library System (KNLS) chako kampen mar jiwo jopuonjre mondo obed gi timbe mabeyo mag somo.

English: The Ministry of ICT and Education collaborate to provide digital learning solutions for schools in Arid and Semi-Arid Lands.
Swahili Translations: Wizara ya ICT na Elimu inashirikiana kutoa suluhisho za kujifunza za dijiti kwa shule katika nchi kavu na semi- kavu.
Luo Translations: Ministry of ICT and Education tiyo kanyachiel mondo gichiw yore mag puonjruok e yor digital ne skunde manie pinje maboyo kod maboyo.

English: KICD publishes guidelines on accessing and utilizing approved online educational resources for learners.
Swahili Translations: KICD huchapisha miongozo juu ya kupata na kutumia rasilimali za elimu ya mtandaoni zilizokubaliwa kwa wanafunzi.
Luo Translations: KICD goyo chike ma tayo kaka inyalo yudo kendo tiyo gi gik ma yudore e Intanet ma nyalo konyo jopuonjre.

English: TSC offers training programs for teachers on effective digital pedagogies for modern classrooms.
Swahili Translations: TSC hutoa programu za mafunzo kwa walimu juu ya pedagogies digital ufanisi kwa darasa za kisasa.
Luo Translations: TSC chiwo chenro mar tiego jopuonj e wi puonjo ji e yor digital e klas ma kindegi.

English: Government to establish more STEM resource centers in various regions to boost science education.
Swahili Translations: Serikali kuanzisha vituo zaidi vya rasilimali za STEM katika mikoa mbalimbali ili kuongeza elimu ya sayansi.
Luo Translations: Sirkande biro chako loso kuonde mamoko mag somo mag STEM e gwenge mopogore opogore mondo omi ji ong'e weche sayans.

English: Commission for University Education (CUE) encourages universities to adopt Open Educational Resources (OER).
Swahili Translations: Tume ya Elimu ya Chuo Kikuu (CUE) inawatia moyo vyuo vikuu kupitisha rasilimali za elimu wazi (OER).
Luo Translations: Komiti mar Puonjruok e Yunivasiti (CUE) jiwo yunivasiti mondo oti gi yore mag somo ma yudore e dhok mopogore opogore.

English: KICD develops new engaging digital content tailored for early childhood education (ECDE).
Swahili Translations: KICD huendeleza maudhui mapya ya kuvutia ya digital yaliyotengenezwa kwa ajili ya elimu ya utotoni (ECDE).
Luo Translations: KICD loso gik manyien ma ji ohero ahinya ma yudore e digital ma olos ne nyithindo ma tindo (ECDE).

English: KICD ensures that accessible textbooks and learning materials are available for learners with disabilities.
Swahili Translations: KICD inahakikisha kuwa vitabu vya kusoma na vifaa vya kujifunza vinaweza kupatikana kwa wanafunzi wenye ulemavu.
Luo Translations: KICD neno ni jopuonjre ma nigi midekre nyalo yudo buge koda gik mamoko ma ginyalo puonjorego.

English: National Research Fund (NRF) calls for proposals to enhance research infrastructure in universities.
Swahili Translations: Mfuko wa Kitaifa wa Utafiti (NRF) unaomba mapendekezo ya kuboresha miundombinu ya utafiti katika vyuo vikuu.
Luo Translations: Riwruok mar National Research Fund (NRF) kwayo mondo otim dongruok e chenro mag timo nonro e yunivasiti.

English: KICD develops new e-learning content specifically designed for secondary school learners.
Swahili Translations: KICD huendeleza maudhui mapya ya e-learning yaliyotengenezwa hasa kwa wanafunzi wa shule ya sekondari.
Luo Translations: KICD loso gik manyien mag e-learning ma olos ahinya ne nyithindo manie sekondar.

English: Ministry of ICT allocates funds for developing robust digital infrastructure to support e-learning nationwide.
Swahili Translations: Wizara ya ICT hutoa fedha za kuendeleza miundombinu yenye nguvu ya dijiti kusaidia e-kujifunza kote nchini.
Luo Translations: Ministry of ICT chiwo pesa mondo otigo e loso chenro mag digital mondo okony e puonjo ji e piny mangima.

English: Government announces plan to roll out free Wi-Fi connectivity to all public universities and TVET institutions.
Swahili Translations: Serikali yatangaza mpango wa kuanzisha uhusiano wa bure wa Wi-Fi kwa vyuo vikuu vyote vya umma na taasisi za elimu ya juu ya televisheni.
Luo Translations: Sirkal lando chenro mar keto Wi-Fi maonge chudo e yunivasiti duto mag sirkal kod kuonde tiegruok mag televison.

English: Government funds expansion of Early Childhood Development centers to increase access to foundational education.
Swahili Translations: Serikali inafadhili upanuzi wa vituo vya Maendeleo ya Utoto wa Mapema ili kuongeza upatikanaji wa elimu ya msingi.
Luo Translations: Sirkal chiwo pesa mondo omed gero kuonde mitiegoe nyithindo motelo mondo omi ji oyud somo mapile.

English: Ministry of Education rolls out program to equip secondary schools with ICT labs and train teachers on usage.
Swahili Translations: Wizara ya Elimu inazindua mpango wa kuwapa shule za sekondari maabara ya ICT na kuwazoeza walimu kuhusu matumizi.
Luo Translations: Ofis mar Puonjruok chako chenro mar chiwo ICT laboratories ne skunde madongo kendo tiego jopuonj e wi kaka ginyalo tiyo gi teknoloji.

English: KNEC develops assessment tools adapted for learners with disabilities to ensure fair evaluation.
Swahili Translations: KNEC huendeleza zana za tathmini zinazofaa kwa wanafunzi wenye ulemavu ili kuhakikisha tathmini ya haki.
Luo Translations: KNEC loso gik ma konyo nyithindo ma nigi midekre mondo omi ging'e ni gik moko duto okethore e yo makare.

English: Teachers Service Commission launches mentorship program pairing experienced teachers with new recruits for skills transfer.
Swahili Translations: Tume ya Huduma ya Walimu inazindua mpango wa kuongoza wa kuunganisha walimu wenye uzoefu na waajiriwa wapya kwa ajili ya uhamisho wa ujuzi.
Luo Translations: Komiti mar Tij Jopuonj chako chenro mar konyo jopuonj molony gi joma nyien e tijno mondo oland lony.

English: Ministry of Education launches mobile learning units to reach out-of-school children in remote rural locations.
Swahili Translations: Wizara ya Elimu inazindua vituo vya kujifunza vya simu ili kuwafikia watoto walio nje ya shule katika maeneo ya vijijini.
Luo Translations: Ofis mar Puonjruok chako chenro mar somo kokalo kuom simo mondo okony nyithindo ma ok dhi e skul e gwenge mosokore.

English: TVETA conducts specialized training workshops for instructors to update skills and curriculum delivery methods.
Swahili Translations: TVETA huendesha semina za mafunzo maalum kwa walimu ili kuboresha ujuzi na njia za utoaji wa programu.
Luo Translations: TVETA tayo seminari mag tiego jopuonj mondo omed lony e puonjo kendo konyo e chiwo program.

English: National Research Fund collaborates with universities to set up a digital repository of theses and research papers.
Swahili Translations: National Research Fund inashirikiana na vyuo vikuu kuanzisha hifadhi ya digital ya maandishi na karatasi za utafiti.
Luo Translations: National Research Fund tiyo kanyachiel gi yunivasiti mondo gichakgo kano buge kod buge mag nonro e yo digital.

English: Ministry of Education and Agriculture partner to improve school feeding programs to boost student attendance and learning.
Swahili Translations: Wizara ya Elimu na Kilimo inashirikiana kuboresha mipango ya kulisha shule ili kuongeza kuhudhuria na kujifunza kwa wanafunzi.
Luo Translations: Ofis mar Puonjruok kod Puonjo Ji Tiyo Kanyachiel e Timo Dongruok e Chenro mar Chiwo Chiemb Odhiambo e Skul Mondo Osemiyo Jopuonjre Odhi Nyime Puonjore.

English: Ministry of Education organizes nationwide career fairs to expose students to diverse career pathways.
Swahili Translations: Wizara ya Elimu huandaa maonyesho ya kazi ya kitaifa ili kuwaonyesha wanafunzi njia mbalimbali za kazi.
Luo Translations: Ofis mar Puonjruok chano tije mopogore opogore mag puonjo e piny mangima mondo ginyisgo jopuonjre yore mopogore opogore mag tich.

English: We will have the STEM pathways taking pure maths, and the other two pathways having a form of maths, so that we have maths in all three pathways in senior school
Swahili Translations: Tutapata njia za STEM kuchukua hisabati safi, na njia nyingine mbili kuwa na aina ya hisabati, hivyo kuwa na hisabati katika njia zote tatu katika shule ya sekondari
Luo Translations: Wabiro yudo yore mag STEM mag kawo somo mar pimo maler, kendo yore ariyo mamoko mag bedo gi kit pimo, omiyo bed gi pimo e yore adekgo e sekondar

English: I will lead the team that will ensure that the recommendations are implemented for the benefit of children and society
Swahili Translations: Mimi nitaongoza timu ambayo itahakikisha kwamba mapendekezo hayo yanapatikana kwa manufaa ya watoto na jamii
Luo Translations: Abiro tayo grup mabiro neno ni paro ma kamago yudore e yo maber ne nyithindo koda ne oganda.

English: The Kenya Institute of Curriculum Development (KICD) has reduced the number of subjects under the Competence-Based Curriculum in line with the recommendations by the Presidential Working Party on Education Reform (PWPER)
Swahili Translations: Taasisi ya Kenya ya Maendeleo ya Mafunzo (KICD) imepunguza idadi ya masomo katika Mafunzo ya Msingi wa Uwezo kulingana na mapendekezo ya Kikundi cha Kazi cha Rais cha Marekebisho ya Elimu (PWPER)
Luo Translations: Kenya Institute for the Advancement of Education (KICD) osedoko chien kwan mar somo e tiegruok mar tiegruok kaluwore gi paro mar President's Working Group on Education Reform (PWPER)

English: Learners sitting for Kenya Primary School Education Assessment (KPSEA) and Kenya Junior School Education Assessment (KJSEA) will now be required to shade their answers using Optical Mark Recognition (OMR) sheets
Swahili Translations: Wanafunzi wanaohudhuria Tathmini ya Elimu ya Shule za Msingi nchini Kenya (KPSEA) na Tathmini ya Elimu ya Shule za Kijana nchini Kenya (KJSEA) sasa watahitajika kutoa majibu yao kwa kutumia karatasi za Utambuzi wa Alama za Macho (OMR).
Luo Translations: Nyithindo ma dhi e Kenya Primary School Education Assessment (KPSEA) kod Kenya Junior School Education Assessment (KJSEA) koro ibiro chuno ni gichiw dwoko maggi ka gitiyo gi kalatese mag Opich (OMR).

English: [Digital Learning Initiative] Government rollout of 1.2 million digital devices including laptops for teachers and tablets for students to all 22,000 public primary schools
Swahili Translations: [ Digital Learning Initiative] Serikali ya kuanzishwa kwa vifaa milioni 1.2 digital ikiwa ni pamoja na kompyuta ndogo kwa walimu na vidonge kwa wanafunzi kwa wote 22,000 shule za msingi za umma
Luo Translations: [ Digital Learning Initiative] Sirkal chako tiyo gi masinde milion 1.2 moriwo nyaka kompyuta moting'o kompyuta mag jopuonjre kod tablet mag jopuonjre e skunde 22,000 mag piny

English: [Training Achievement] Over 91,000 teachers trained to deliver digital learning content as part of Digital Literacy Programme implementation
Swahili Translations: [Mafanikio ya Mafunzo] Walimu zaidi ya 91,000 wamezoezwa kutoa maudhui ya kujifunza ya digital kama sehemu ya utekelezaji wa Mpango wa Digital Literacy
Luo Translations: [Mano e Puonjruok] Jopuonj mokalo 91,000 osepuonjore chiwo gik ma ginyalo puonjore e yor digital kaka achiel kuom chenro mag Digital Literacy Program

English: [Kenya Education Cloud] Digital learning platform providing free educational content during COVID-19 pandemic for remote learning continuity
Swahili Translations: [Kenya Education Cloud] Jukwaa la kujifunza la dijiti ambalo hutoa maudhui ya bure ya elimu wakati wa janga la COVID-19 kwa kuendelea kujifunza kwa mbali
Luo Translations: [Kenya Education Cloud] Puonjruok mar digital ma chiwo puonj maonge chudo e kinde mar tuoche mag COVID-19 kokalo kuom puonjruok mabor

English: [CBC Implementation] Official implementation of Grades 4, 5, and 6 under Competency-Based Curriculum starting January 2020
Swahili Translations: [Utekelezaji wa CBC] Utekelezaji rasmi wa Darasa la 4, 5 na 6 chini ya Mpangilio wa Elimu wa Msingi wa Uwezo kuanzia Januari 2020
Luo Translations: [CBC] Tiyo gi Klas mar 4, 5 kod 6 e bwo Chenro mar Puonjruok e Wi Gik ma Nyalo Chando Ji Chakre Januar 2020

English: KICD: CBC Subjects to be Dropped and Replaced in 2024. The Kenya Institute of Curriculum Development (KICD) plans to lower the number of learning areas for learners within the Competency-Based Curriculum (CBC) beginning in January 2024.
Swahili Translations: KICD: Vitu vya CBC vitatolewa na kubadilishwa mnamo 2024. Taasisi ya Kenya ya Maendeleo ya Mafunzo (KICD) ina mpango wa kupunguza idadi ya maeneo ya kujifunza kwa wanafunzi ndani ya Mafunzo ya Msingi wa Uwezo (CBC) kuanzia Januari 2024.
Luo Translations: KICD: Ibiro golo kendo loko gik ma yudore e CBC e higa mar 2024. Kenya Institute for Training Development (KICD) dwaro dwoko chien kwan mar kuonde ma jopuonjre puonjoree e CBC kochakore Januar 2024.

English: Kenya rebranded CBC to CBE to expand focus beyond curriculum into infrastructure and school systems.
Swahili Translations: Kenya ilibadilisha jina la CBC kuwa CBE ili kupanua lengo zaidi ya programu ya masomo katika miundombinu na mifumo ya shule.
Luo Translations: Kenya noloko nying CBC obed CBE mondo omed jiwo chenro mar somo e ute koda chenro mag skul.

English: Schools lack labs, classrooms, and digital resources to support the reforms.
Swahili Translations: Shule hazina maabara, darasa, na rasilimali za dijiti za kusaidia mageuzi.
Luo Translations: Skunde ok nigi laboratori, klase, kata gik mamoko ma nyalo konyo ji mondo otim lokruok.

English: Project builds English-to-KSL dataset for deaf learners using AI.
Swahili Translations: Mradi huu hujenga seti ya data ya Kiingereza hadi KSL kwa wanafunzi viziwi kwa kutumia AI.
Luo Translations: Chenrono loso chenro mar somo dho Kisungu nyaka KSL ne nyithindo ma itgi odino kotiyo gi rieko mar ng'eyo tiend weche.

English: Mekaela built a digital studio for online learning called Shule Pepe.
Swahili Translations: Mekaela alijenga studio ya digital ya kujifunza mtandaoni inayoitwa Shule Pepe.
Luo Translations: Mekaela nogero studio mar puonjruok e Intanet miluongo ni Shule Pepe.

English: AI tools being tested in Nairobi digital learning centres.
Swahili Translations: Vifaa vya AI vinavyojaribiwa katika vituo vya kujifunza vya digital vya Nairobi.
Luo Translations: Masinde mag AI ma itiyogo e timo nonro e digital learning centers man Nairobi.

English: Literacy platform expands into Kenyan public schools.
Swahili Translations: Jukwaa la kusoma na kuandika linaenea katika shule za umma nchini Kenya.
Luo Translations: E piny Kenya, somo gi ndiko en gima onya ahinya e skunde duto.

English: Project helps Nairobi schools access teacher training and learning tools.
Swahili Translations: Mradi huu husaidia shule za Nairobi kupata vifaa vya mafunzo na kujifunza kwa walimu.
Luo Translations: Chenrono konyo skunde mag Nairobi yudo gige tiego jopuonj.

English: Rural schools receiving tablets and connectivity to boost digital learning.
Swahili Translations: Shule za mashambani zinapata vidonge na uhusiano ili kuongeza kujifunza kwa digital.
Luo Translations: Skunde mag gweng' yudoga mbeseni kod tudruok mondo omi ji opuonjre e yo mar digital.

English: In a joint initiative between KCB Foundation and the Ministry of Education, solar-powered tablets and internet connectivity were delivered to several rural Kenyan schools.
Swahili Translations: Katika mpango wa pamoja kati ya KCB Foundation na Wizara ya Elimu, vidonge vya jua na uhusiano wa mtandao viliwasilishwa kwa shule kadhaa za vijijini Kenya.
Luo Translations: E chenro ma KCB Foundation kod Ministry of Education oriwo, sunscreens kod intanet ne ochiw e skunde moko man Kenya.

English: The DigiSchool pilot, managed by UNESCO, Huawei Kenya, and the Ministry of Education, connected 13 rural and peri-urban schools to high-speed internet using national fiber and wireless solutions.
Swahili Translations: Mradi wa majaribio wa DigiSchool, unaosimamiwa na UNESCO, Huawei Kenya, na Wizara ya Elimu, uliunganisha shule 13 za vijijini na za mijini na mtandao wa kasi kwa kutumia suluhisho za kitaifa za nyuzi na wireless.
Luo Translations: Chenro mar DigiSchool, ma ne itimo gi UNESCO, Huawei Kenya, kod Ministry of Education, noriwo skunde 13 mag gweng' kod mag taon gi intanet ma nigi piche mag ot ka ot kitiyo gi yore mag loso simo kod mag wireless.

English: Huawei inaugurated a new ICT computer lab with 30 desktops and smart teaching screens at St. Stephens Namasoli Secondary School, Kakamega County.
Swahili Translations: Huawei ilifungua maabara mpya ya kompyuta ya ICT na kompyuta 30 na skrini za kufundisha smart katika Shule ya Upili ya St. Stephens Namasoli, Kaunti ya Kakamega.
Luo Translations: Huawei oseyawo laboratori manyien mar ICT kod kompyuta 30 kod piche mag puonjo mariek e St. Stephens Namasoli High School, Kakamega County.

English: At Muhomo Primary School in Lugari, World Vision and government stakeholders provided educational tablets preloaded with literacy and numeracy software (ABRA).
Swahili Translations: Katika Shule ya Msingi ya Muhomo mjini Lugari, World Vision na mashirika ya serikali yalitoa vidonge vya elimu vilivyojaa programu ya kusoma na kuandika (ABRA).
Luo Translations: E skul maduong ' mar piny Lugari, World Vision kod riwruoge mag sirkal ne ochiwo buge moting'o buge ma lero somo kod ndiko (ABRA).

English: Introduces a multimodal AI pipeline that processes spoken English through speech-to-text, converts it into American Sign Language (ASL) gloss, and generates lifelike 3D sign language animations.
Swahili Translations: Inaanzisha bomba la AI la multimodal ambalo hutumia Kiingereza kinachosemwa kupitia hotuba hadi maandishi, huibadilisha kuwa gloss ya Lugha ya Ishara ya Amerika (ASL), na hutoa picha za lugha ya ishara ya 3D kama ya maisha.
Luo Translations: Oketonwa tiyo mar AI ma tiyo gi dho Kisungu ma ji wacho e dhok ma ji ndiko, oloke mondo obed yo ma ji wuoyogo gi dho Amerika mar Kisungu, kendo ochiwo piche mag 3D mag dho momni kaka ngima.

English: Introduces a real-time, non-intrusive AI system for ASL learning.
Swahili Translations: Inaanzisha wakati halisi, yasiyo ya uvamizi AI mfumo kwa kujifunza ASL.
Luo Translations: Oting'o chenro mar puonjruok ASL e yo ma ok kal tong'.

English: Government launches pilot project introducing virtual reality (VR) tools in select secondary schools to enhance interactive learning.
Swahili Translations: Serikali inazindua mradi wa majaribio wa kuanzisha zana za ukweli wa kweli (VR) katika shule za sekondari zilizochaguliwa ili kuongeza ujifunzaji wa maingiliano.
Luo Translations: Sirkal chako chenro mar temo tiyo gi gik ma nyiso adiera e skul mag sekondar mondo okony ji opuonjre e yo ma mulo winjruokgi.

English: Ministry of Education initiates mass distribution of e-books to complement paper-based textbooks for secondary learners.
Swahili Translations: Wizara ya Elimu inaanzisha usambazaji wa vitabu vya elektroniki ili kuongeza vitabu vya mafunzo vya karatasi kwa wanafunzi wa sekondari.
Luo Translations: Ofis mar Puonjruok chako chiwo buge mag kompyuta mondo omedgo buge mag somo e skul.

English: Ministry of ICT partners with NGOs to provide free online coding bootcamps targeting youth in underserved communities.
Swahili Translations: Wizara ya ICT inashirikiana na mashirika yasiyo ya kiserikali kutoa kambi za bure za mafunzo za mtandaoni kwa vijana katika jamii zisizo na huduma.
Luo Translations: Ministry of ICT tiyo kanyachiel gi riwruoge maok mag sirkal mondo gichiw tiegruok maonge chudo e intanet ne rowere manie alwora ma onge gi chenro mar yudo kony.

English: Ministry of Education implements a formal policy supporting distance learning across all education levels during COVID-19.
Swahili Translations: Wizara ya Elimu inatekeleza sera rasmi ya kusaidia elimu ya mbali katika ngazi zote za elimu wakati wa COVID-19.
Luo Translations: Ministry of Education tiyo gi chenro mar tiego ji e yore duto e kinde mar COVID-19.

English: Government plans deployment of solar-powered computer labs to increase ICT access in remote rural schools.
Swahili Translations: Serikali ina mipango ya kutekeleza maabara ya kompyuta ya jua ili kuongeza upatikanaji wa ICT katika shule za vijijini za mbali.
Luo Translations: Sirkal nigi chenro mar tiyo gi kompyuta mag chieng ' mondo omi skunde mag gwenge mosokore obed gi teknoloji mag teknoloji.

English: Ministry of ICT provides training for over 500 teachers on the use of Learning Management Systems (LMS) for blended learning.
Swahili Translations: Wizara ya ICT hutoa mafunzo kwa walimu zaidi ya 500 juu ya matumizi ya Mfumo wa Usimamizi wa Ujifunzaji (LMS) kwa kujifunza kuchanganywa.
Luo Translations: Ministry of ICT tiego jopuonj mokalo 500 e tiyo gi LMS e puonjo ji gik moko e yo moriwo koda puonjo ji.

English: Ministry of Education partners with universities to sponsor national math olympiads for gifted students in secondary schools.
Swahili Translations: Wizara ya Elimu inashirikiana na vyuo vikuu kuandaa misaada ya kitaifa ya michezo ya hesabu kwa wanafunzi wenye vipaji katika shule za sekondari.
Luo Translations: Ofis mar Puonjruok tiyo kanyachiel gi yunivasiti mondo okony jopuonjre ma nigi lony e sekondari.

English: Teachers Service Commission launches digital skills bootcamp targeted at in-service teachers with limited ICT knowledge.
Swahili Translations: Tume ya Huduma ya Walimu inazindua kambi ya mafunzo ya ujuzi wa digital iliyoelekezwa kwa walimu wanaofanya kazi na wenye ujuzi mdogo wa ICT.
Luo Translations: Kanyakla mar Teacher Services Commission chako kambi mar tiego jopuonj ma nigi lony matin e weche mag ICT.

English: Kenya Institute of Curriculum Development launches a mobile app with interactive learning content for CBC learners.
Swahili Translations: Taasisi ya Kenya ya Maendeleo ya Mafunzo inazindua programu ya simu na yaliyomo kwenye mafunzo ya maingiliano kwa wanafunzi wa CBC.
Luo Translations: Kenya Institute for Education Development chako chenro mar goyo simo kod tiegruok ma konyo jopuonjre mag CBC.

English: Ministry of Education sponsors regional science innovation competitions to encourage student creativity and problem-solving.
Swahili Translations: Wizara ya Elimu inasaidia mashindano ya kisayansi ya ubunifu wa kikanda ili kuhamasisha ubunifu wa wanafunzi na kutatua matatizo.
Luo Translations: Ofis mar Puonjruok konyo piem mag sayans e alwora mondo ojiw jopuonjre obed gi lony kendo giti gi rieko e tieko chandruoge.

English: Ministry of Education promotes inclusive sports programs encouraging participation of learners with disabilities.
Swahili Translations: Wizara ya Elimu inakuza mipango ya michezo ya pamoja ambayo inawasaidia wanafunzi wenye ulemavu kushiriki.
Luo Translations: Ofis mar Puonjruok jiwo chenro mag tuke ma konyo nyithindo ma nigi midekre mondo oriwre.

English: Kenya National Library Service upgrades selected libraries with ICT infrastructure for digital literacy promotion.
Swahili Translations: Huduma ya Maktaba ya Kitaifa ya Kenya inaongeza maktaba zilizochaguliwa na miundombinu ya ICT kwa ajili ya kukuza uandishi wa dijiti.
Luo Translations: National Library Service of Kenya medo buge mag intanet kod ICT mondo okony ji ong'e weche manie Intanet.

English: Ministry of Education implements virtual mentorship platform connecting students with industry experts.
Swahili Translations: Wizara ya Elimu inatekeleza jukwaa la ushauri wa virtual linalounganisha wanafunzi na wataalamu wa sekta hiyo.
Luo Translations: Ofis mar Puonjruok chako tiyo gi chenro mar chiwo paro e yor kompyuta, ma riwo jopuonjre gi joma olony e weche mag somo.

English: TVETA expands access to digital libraries for TVET students to improve research capacity and learning.
Swahili Translations: TVETA inaongeza upatikanaji wa maktaba za digital kwa wanafunzi wa TVET ili kuboresha uwezo wa utafiti na kujifunza.
Luo Translations: TVETA medo miyo jopuonjre mag TVET yudo buge mag digital mondo omed timo nonro kendo puonjore.

English: Ministry of ICT partners with NGOs to provide digital skills training in informal urban settlements.
Swahili Translations: Wizara ya ICT inashirikiana na mashirika yasiyo ya kiserikali kutoa mafunzo ya ujuzi wa dijiti katika makazi yasiyo rasmi ya mijini.
Luo Translations: Ministry of ICT tiyo kanyachiel gi riwruoge maok mag sirkal mondo gipuonj ji e wi digital skills e mier madongo.

English: Ministry of Education organizes training for school principals in leadership and management.
Swahili Translations: Wizara ya Elimu huandaa mafunzo kwa wakuu wa shule katika uongozi na usimamizi.
Luo Translations: Ofis mar Puonjruok chiwo tiegruok ne jotend skul e wi tayo koda tayo.

English: Kenya Institute of Curriculum Development develops customized learning materials for arid and semi-arid lands.
Swahili Translations: Taasisi ya Kenya ya Maendeleo ya Mafunzo huendeleza vifaa vya kujifunza vilivyoboreshwa kwa ajili ya nchi kavu na semi- kavu.
Luo Translations: Kenya Institute for the Advancement of Education loso gik ma konyo ji puonjore e piny ma lowo otwo kod ma piny otwo.

English: Ministry of Education launches STEM scholarships targeting girls to boost gender parity in science fields.
Swahili Translations: Wizara ya Elimu inazindua masomo ya STEM kwa wasichana ili kuongeza usawa wa kijinsia katika nyanja za sayansi.
Luo Translations: Ofis mar Puonjruok chako somo mag STEM ne nyiri mondo okony ji obed gi winjruok maber e kind chwo gi mon e weche sayans.

English: Teachers Service Commission establishes online forums for continuous professional support and resource sharing.
Swahili Translations: Tume ya Huduma ya Walimu inaanzisha vikao vya mtandaoni kwa ajili ya msaada wa kitaaluma wa kuendelea na ushiriki wa rasilimali.
Luo Translations: Kanyakla mar Teacher Services Commission chako chenro mar tiego ji e Intanet mondo giyud kony ma dwarore kuom josomo kod joma nigi lony.

English: Ministry of Education encourages local community involvement in school management committees for better governance.
Swahili Translations: Wizara ya Elimu inatia moyo ushiriki wa jumuiya za mitaa katika halmashauri za usimamizi wa shule kwa ajili ya utawala bora.
Luo Translations: Ofis mar Puonjruok jiwo ji duto mondo oriwre e bura mag skul mondo gibed gi loch maber.

English: KNEC begins pilot rollout of e-assessment systems in selected primary schools to improve evaluation methods.
Swahili Translations: KNEC huanza kutekeleza programu ya majaribio ya mifumo ya tathmini ya elektroniki katika shule za msingi zilizochaguliwa ili kuboresha njia za tathmini.
Luo Translations: KNEC chako tiyo gi chenro mar temo yore mag nono weche e yor kompyuta e skunde ma ne oyier mondo otiek yore mag nono weche.

English: Ministry of Energy collaborates with Ministry of Education to install renewable energy labs in secondary schools.
Swahili Translations: Wizara ya Nishati inashirikiana na Wizara ya Elimu kuanzisha maabara ya nishati mbadala katika shule za sekondari.
Luo Translations: Ofis mar Energy Office tiyo kanyachiel gi Ofis mar Puonjruok mondo ochak laboratori mag tiyo gi teko manyien e skunde madongo.

English: Ministry of Education introduces digital platforms to enhance communication between parents and teachers.
Swahili Translations: Wizara ya Elimu inaanzisha majukwaa ya dijiti ili kuboresha mawasiliano kati ya wazazi na walimu.
Luo Translations: Ofis mar Puonjruok chako tiyo gi teknoloji mar digital mondo okony jonyuol gi jopuonj obed gi winjruok maber.

English: National Research Fund promotes cross-university research collaboration with shared funding and facilities.
Swahili Translations: National Research Fund inakuza ushirikiano wa utafiti wa kati ya vyuo vikuu na fedha pamoja na vifaa.
Luo Translations: National Research Fund jiwo riwruok mar riwruok mar riwruok mar riwruok mar riwruok mar riwruok mar riwruok mar riwruok mar riwruok mar riwruok mar riwruok mar riwruok mar riwruok mar riwruok mar riwruok mar riwruok mar riwruok mar riwruok mar riwruok mar riwruok mar riwruok mar riwruok mar riwruok mar riwruok mar riwruok mar riwruok mar riwruok mar riwruok mar riwruok mar riwruok mar riwruok mar riwruok mar riwruok mar riwruok mar riwruok mar riwruok mar riwruok mar riwruok mar riwruok mar riwruok mar riwruok mar riwruok mar riwruok mar riwruok mar riwruok mar riwruok mar riwruok mar riwruok mar riwruok mar riwruok mar riwruok mar riwruok mar riwruok mar riwruok mar riwruok mar riwruok mar riwruok mar riwruok mar riwruok mar riwruok mar riwruok mar riwruok mar riwruok mar riwruok mar riwruok

English: Kenya National Library Service digitizes historical books and resources making them accessible online nationwide.
Swahili Translations: Huduma ya Maktaba ya Kitaifa ya Kenya huhifadhi vitabu na rasilimali za kihistoria kwa njia ya dijiti na kuzifanya ziwe za kupatikana mtandaoni kote nchini.
Luo Translations: Ofis mar Kenya National Library, ma en ofis ma tayo tij loso buge kod gik machon, tiyo gi kompyuta mondo okony ji yudo buge kod gik mamoko ma yudore e Intanet e pinyno duto.

English: Ministry of Education trains coordinators at county levels on management of special needs education to improve service delivery.
Swahili Translations: Wizara ya Elimu inawazoeza wataalamu wa elimu katika maeneo ya wilaya kuhusu usimamizi wa elimu ya mahitaji maalum ili kuboresha huduma.
Luo Translations: Ofis mar Puonjruok puonjo joma olony e weche somo e gwenge mag gwenge mag gwenge mag gwenge mag gwenge mag gwengego kaka ginyalo tayo somo ma nigi dwaro makende mondo omi tij lendo omed bedo maber.

English: Kenya Institute of Curriculum Development develops e-learning modules for adult literacy programs across the country.
Swahili Translations: Taasisi ya Kenya ya Maendeleo ya Mafunzo ya Elimu huendeleza moduli za e-kujifunza kwa ajili ya mipango ya uandishi wa watu wazima kote nchini.
Luo Translations: Kenya Institute for the Advancement of Educational Training loso modules mag puonjruok e-kitigo ne program mag somo mag joma dongo e pinyno duto.

English: Ministry of Education organizes workshops on nutrition for school feeding program managers to enhance food quality and safety.
Swahili Translations: Wizara ya Elimu inaandaa semina za lishe kwa wasimamizi wa programu za kulisha shule ili kuongeza ubora na usalama wa chakula.
Luo Translations: Ofis mar Puonjruok chiwo somo e wi chiemo ma nyalo konyo jopuonjre e skul mondo obed gi chiemo maber kendo ma nigi ritruok.

English: Pilot project introduces AI-powered tutoring systems for personalized learning in selected schools.
Swahili Translations: Mradi wa majaribio huanzisha mifumo ya mafunzo ya AI kwa kujifunza kwa kibinafsi katika shule zilizochaguliwa.
Luo Translations: Chenro mar timo nonrono miyo ji bedo gi chenro mar tiego ji e yor rieko kokalo kuom puonjruok ma gin giwegi e skunde ma giyiero.

English: Ministry of Education partners with Data Science Institutes to train university lecturers on data analytics applications.
Swahili Translations: Wizara ya Elimu inashirikiana na Taasisi za Sayansi ya Takwimu kuwazoeza wasomi wa chuo kikuu juu ya matumizi ya uchambuzi wa data.
Luo Translations: Ofis mar Puonjruok tiyo kanyachiel gi riwruok mar sayans mar weche ng'eyo weche e wi kwan mag dhano mondo otieg jopuonjre mag yunivasiti e weche mag nono weche.

English: Ministry of ICT runs national digital literacy awareness campaigns targeting parents and caregivers.
Swahili Translations: Wizara ya ICT inaendesha kampeni za kitaifa za ufahamu wa uandishi wa dijiti kwa wazazi na walezi.
Luo Translations: Ministry of ICT tiyo gi kampen mag piny mangima mar konyo jonyuol gi joma rito nyithindgi mondo ong'e weche manie digital writing.

English: National Research Fund expands grant opportunities focusing on interdisciplinary education research projects.
Swahili Translations: Mfuko wa Kitaifa wa Utafiti unaongeza fursa za misaada kwa kuzingatia miradi ya utafiti wa elimu ya kimataifa.
Luo Translations: Riwruok mar National Research Fund medo chiwo kony ne tije ma itimo e piny mangima.

English: KICD develops digital e-books with sign language videos embedded for deaf learners in primary schools.
Swahili Translations: KICD huendeleza vitabu vya elektroniki vya digital na video za lugha ya ishara zilizowekwa kwa ajili ya wanafunzi viziwi katika shule za msingi.
Luo Translations: KICD loso buge mag digital kod vidio mag dho momni ne nyithindo ma itgi odino e skunde matindo.

English: Government sets up innovation hubs with maker spaces in selected secondary schools to promote STEM learning.
Swahili Translations: Serikali inaanzisha vituo vya uvumbuzi na nafasi za wafanyabiashara katika shule za sekondari zilizochaguliwa ili kukuza kujifunza kwa njia ya STEM.
Luo Translations: Sirkal chako kuonde ma ji timoe dongruok kod kuonde ma josayans nyalo yudoe thuolo mag timo dongruok e skul mag sekondar mondo gijiw puonj mag STEM.

English: Ministry of Education provides digital tools and training for PTAs to enhance communication and management.
Swahili Translations: Wizara ya Elimu hutoa zana za dijiti na mafunzo kwa PTA ili kuboresha mawasiliano na usimamizi.
Luo Translations: Ministry of Education chiwo gige tiegruok kod gige tiegruok ne PTA mondo okony e loso weche mag tudruok kod tayo weche.

English: KICD introduces curricula content supporting teaching in local indigenous languages in primary and secondary schools.
Swahili Translations: KICD huanzisha maudhui ya masomo yanayounga mkono kufundisha katika lugha za wenyeji wa ndani katika shule za msingi na sekondari.
Luo Translations: KICD loso buge ma konyo puonjo e dhok mag joma odak e skul mag sekondari kod sekondari.

English: Ministry of ICT launches digital skills training programs aimed at young entrepreneurs to foster innovation and startups.
Swahili Translations: Wizara ya ICT inazindua mipango ya mafunzo ya ujuzi wa dijiti kwa ajili ya wajasiriamali vijana ili kuchochea uvumbuzi na kuanza.
Luo Translations: Ministry of ICT chako chenro mag tiego rowere e weche mag digital mondo okonygi bedo gi lony kod lony e weche mag digital.

English: TVETA undertakes review of TVET curricula to integrate skills for Industry 4.0 including robotics and automation.
Swahili Translations: TVETA huchukua mapendekezo ya masomo ya TVET ili kuunganisha ujuzi wa Viwanda 4.0 ikiwa ni pamoja na robotics na automatisering.
Luo Translations: TVETA kawo paro mag puonjruok mag TVET mondo otigo e loso winjruok e kind weche mag Industry 4.0 moriwo koda robotics kod automation.

English: Ministry of Youth Affairs partners with NGOs to deliver digital literacy workshops for youth in informal settlements.
Swahili Translations: Wizara ya Mambo ya Vijana inashirikiana na mashirika yasiyo ya kiserikali kutoa semina za uandishi wa dijiti kwa vijana katika makazi yasiyo rasmi.
Luo Translations: Ofis mar Rapar mar Rowere tiyo kanyachiel gi riwruoge ma ok riw lwedo mondo gichiw somo e wi weche mag digital ne rowere ma odak e ute maok nie bwo sirkal.

English: Ministry of Education procures and distributes Braille learning devices to schools catering to visually impaired learners.
Swahili Translations: Wizara ya Elimu inachukua na kusambaza vifaa vya kujifunza Braille kwa shule zinazohudumia wanafunzi wenye ulemavu wa kuona.
Luo Translations: Ofis mar Puonjruok e Piny mangima, ma en ofis ma tayo tije mag Joneno mag Jehova, kawoga buge kod gige puonjruok mag Braille mondo otigo e skunde ma konyo nyithindo ma nigi tuoche mag wengegi.

English: Ministry of Education releases national guidelines for standardizing school infrastructure development.
Swahili Translations: Wizara ya Elimu yatangaza miongozo ya kitaifa ya kuimarisha maendeleo ya miundombinu ya shule.
Luo Translations: Ofis mar Puonjruok e Piny mangima, oselando chike ma tayo dongruok e chenro mag skul.

English: Teachers Service Commission launches digital portfolio system enabling teachers to document professional development progress.
Swahili Translations: Tume ya Huduma ya Walimu inazindua mfumo wa digital portfolio ambao utawezesha walimu kurekodi maendeleo ya maendeleo ya kitaaluma.
Luo Translations: Kanyakla mar Teacher Services Commission chako chenro mar digital portfolio ma biro miyo jopuonj thuolo mar ndiko dongruok ma gitimo e somo.

English: Kenya National Examinations Council publishes the report of pilot evaluation for new e-assessment tools.
Swahili Translations: Baraza la Kitaifa la Majaribio ya Kenya huchapisha ripoti ya tathmini ya majaribio ya zana mpya za tathmini ya elektroniki.
Luo Translations: National Testing Council of Kenya goyo ripot mar nono gik ma ne otim e bwo teko mar tiyo gi gik manyien mag kompyuta.

English: Ministry of ICT and Teachers Service Commission organize national ICT conference for teachers.
Swahili Translations: Wizara ya ICT na Tume ya Huduma ya Walimu huandaa mkutano wa kitaifa wa ICT kwa walimu.
Luo Translations: Ministry of ICT kod Teacher Services Commission chano romo mar ICT mar piny mangima ne jopuonj.

English: KICD develops specialized e-learning materials using sign language for deaf students.
Swahili Translations: KICD huendeleza vifaa vya e-kujifunza kwa kutumia lugha ya ishara kwa wanafunzi viziwi.
Luo Translations: KICD loso gik ma konyo nyithindo ma itgi odino puonjore gi dho momni.

English: Ministry of Education increases funding for national and regional science olympiads to enhance student participation.
Swahili Translations: Wizara ya Elimu inaongeza fedha za michezo ya kisayansi ya kitaifa na ya kikanda ili kuongeza ushiriki wa wanafunzi.
Luo Translations: Ofis mar Puonjruok medo pesa ma itiyogo e tuke mag sayans e piny mangima kod e pinje mamoko mondo okony jopuonjre obed gi thuolo mar timo kamano.

English: KICD launches an online portal providing guidance and learning tips for parents to support childrenâs education at home.
Swahili Translations: KICD inazindua portal ya mtandaoni ambayo hutoa mwongozo na vidokezo vya kujifunza kwa wazazi kusaidia elimu ya watoto nyumbani.
Luo Translations: KICD chako chenro mar somo e intanet ma chiwo puonj kod puonj mag jonyuol mondo okony nyithindo opuonjre e ot.

English: Ministry of ICT commits funds for upgrading digital infrastructure across public universities to support research and learning.
Swahili Translations: Wizara ya ICT inaahidi fedha za kuboresha miundombinu ya dijiti katika vyuo vikuu vya umma kusaidia utafiti na kujifunza.
Luo Translations: Ministry of ICT osesingore ni obiro chiwo pesa mondo okony e loso gik ma nyalo konyo e tiego ji e yunivasiti mag sirkal.

English: Ministry of Education expands educational radio and TV broadcasts to cover more curriculum topics and regions.
Swahili Translations: Wizara ya Elimu inaongeza matangazo ya redio na TV ya elimu ili kufunika mada zaidi ya mtaala na mikoa.
Luo Translations: Ofis mar Puonjruok medo lando weche mag tiegruok e redio koda e televison mondo omed lero weche momedore e wi program kod alwora.

English: Ministry of Education publishes new career guidance textbooks for use in secondary schools nationwide.
Swahili Translations: Wizara ya Elimu inatangaza vitabu vipya vya mwongozo wa kazi kwa ajili ya matumizi katika shule za sekondari kote nchini.
Luo Translations: Ofis mar Puonjruok e Piny mangima ogolo buk manyien mag somo ma nyalo konyo nyithindo e skunde madongo.

English: Ministry of ICT and Ministry of Education develop digital tools to improve home-based learning efficiency.
Swahili Translations: Wizara ya ICT na Wizara ya Elimu huendeleza zana za dijiti ili kuboresha ufanisi wa kujifunza nyumbani.
Luo Translations: Ministry of ICT kod Ministry of Education loso gik ma konyo ji mondo opuonjre e ot e yo maber.

English: TVETA commences digitalization of TVET curricula to support e-learning modalities and wider access.
Swahili Translations: TVETA huanza kubadilisha programu za masomo ya TVET kusaidia njia za e-kujifunza na upatikanaji mpana.
Luo Translations: TVETA chako loko chenro mag somo mag TVET mondo okony ji opuonjre e yor e-somo kendo gibed gi thuolo mar yudo gik ma gipuonjore.

English: National Research Fund launches digital portal to streamline scholarship application and awards processing.
Swahili Translations: Mfuko wa Kitaifa wa Utafiti unazindua portal ya dijiti ili kuboresha maombi ya udhamini na usindikaji wa tuzo.
Luo Translations: National Research Fund chako tiyo gi digital portal mondo okony e loso kwayo mag gweth kod loso mich.

English: Ministry of Education organizes a national STEM entrepreneurship week with workshops and innovation showcases.
Swahili Translations: Wizara ya Elimu inaandaa wiki ya kitaifa ya ujasiriamali ya STEM na maonyesho ya ubunifu.
Luo Translations: Ofis mar Puonjruok e piny mangima chano juma mar STEM mar bedo ja ohala kod nyasi mag timo dongruok.

English: Ministry of ICT launches training programs on digital safety and privacy targeted at secondary school students.
Swahili Translations: Wizara ya ICT inazindua mipango ya mafunzo juu ya usalama wa dijiti na faragha ambayo inalenga wanafunzi wa shule za sekondari.
Luo Translations: Ministry of ICT chako chenro mar tiego nyithindo e weche mag digital security kod weche mag kend.

English: KICD leads review of curricula to better integrate inclusive education principles for learners with disabilities.
Swahili Translations: KICD huongoza ukaguzi wa programu za masomo ili kuunganisha vizuri kanuni za elimu ya pamoja kwa wanafunzi wenye ulemavu.
Luo Translations: KICD tayo chenro mag somo mondo omi jopuonjre ma nigi midekre obed gi winjruok maber gi puonj mag somo kanyachiel.

English: Ministry of Education provides tablets loaded with offline digital libraries to schools in Arid and Semi-Arid Lands.
Swahili Translations: Wizara ya Elimu hutoa vidonge vilivyojaa maktaba za dijiti nje ya mtandao kwa shule katika nchi kavu na semi-nchi kavu.
Luo Translations: Ofis mar Puonjruok chiwo buge moting'o buge mag digital e intanet ne skunde manie pinje maboyo kod maboyo.

English: TVETA develops and distributes new e-learning content aligned to TVET training requirements.
Swahili Translations: TVETA huendeleza na kusambaza maudhui mapya ya e-learning yanayolingana na mahitaji ya mafunzo ya TVET.
Luo Translations: TVETA loso kendo pogo gik manyien mag e-learning kaluwore gi dwaro mag tiegruok mag TVET.

English: Teachers Service Commission launches a digital mentorship platform for teacher-to-teacher support and collaboration.
Swahili Translations: Tume ya Huduma ya Walimu inazindua jukwaa la ushauri wa dijiti kwa ajili ya msaada na ushirikiano kati ya walimu na walimu.
Luo Translations: Komiti mar Tij Jopuonj chako chenro mar chiwo kony e yore mag digital mondo jopuonj gi jopuonj oti kanyachiel.

English: Ministry of Education promotes partnerships between universities and industry for practical research and innovations.
Swahili Translations: Wizara ya Elimu inakuza ushirikiano kati ya vyuo vikuu na sekta kwa ajili ya utafiti wa vitendo na uvumbuzi.
Luo Translations: Ofis mar Puonjruok jiwo riwruok mar josomo e kind yunivasiti kod riwruoge mamoko mondo otim nonro kendo otim dongruok.

English: KICD accelerates development and distribution of digital textbooks tailored for the Competency-Based Curriculum (CBC).
Swahili Translations: KICD huongeza kasi ya maendeleo na usambazaji wa vitabu vya masomo vya digital vilivyoundwa kwa ajili ya programu ya masomo ya msingi ya ujuzi (CBC).
Luo Translations: KICD medo timo dongruok kendo chiwo buge mag somo mag digital ma olos mondo otigo e puonjo ji gik ma nyiso ng'eyo.

English: Ministry of Education collaborates with stakeholders to produce interactive digital content targeting home-based learners.
Swahili Translations: Wizara ya Elimu inashirikiana na mashirika ya kushirikiana ili kuzalisha maudhui ya digital yanayolenga wanafunzi wa nyumbani.
Luo Translations: Ofis mar Puonjruok tiyo gi riwruoge ma tiyo kanyachiel mondo gilos gik ma yudore e Intanet ma konyo jopuonjre modak e pinje mamoko.

English: Kenya National Examinations Council starts collecting public feedback on the e-assessment system pilot phase.
Swahili Translations: Baraza la Kitaifa la Majaribio ya Kenya linaanza kukusanya maoni ya umma juu ya awamu ya majaribio ya mfumo wa tathmini ya elektroniki.
Luo Translations: National Council of Experiments of Kenya chako choko paro mag ji e wi chenro mar timo nonro mar kompyuta.

English: Ministry of Education initiates campaigns promoting STEM careers targeting rural secondary school students.
Swahili Translations: Wizara ya Elimu inaanzisha kampeni za kukuza kazi za STEM kwa wanafunzi wa shule za sekondari za vijijini.
Luo Translations: Ofis mar Puonjruok chako kampen mar jiwo tije mag STEM ne nyithindo manie skunde madongo mag gweng'no.

English: Kenya Institute of Curriculum Development releases new interactive digital learning packages for Early Childhood Education.
Swahili Translations: Taasisi ya Kenya ya Maendeleo ya Mafunzo ya Mafunzo inatoa vifurushi vipya vya kujifunza digital kwa Elimu ya Utoto wa Mapema.
Luo Translations: Kenya Institute for the Advancement of Early Childhood Education chiwo chenro manyien mag puonjruok e yor digital e tiego nyithindo motelo.

English: Ministry of Education develops the National Digital Education Framework to guide digital transformation in education.
Swahili Translations: Wizara ya Elimu inaandaa Mfumo wa Kitaifa wa Elimu ya Dijiti ili kuongoza mabadiliko ya dijiti katika elimu.
Luo Translations: Ofis mar Puonjruok e Piny owacho loso chenro mar somo e yor digital mondo okony e kelo lokruok e somo.

English: Ministry of Education procures assistive technology devices to increase e-learning accessibility for students with disabilities.
Swahili Translations: Wizara ya Elimu inachukua vifaa vya teknolojia ya kusaidia ili kuongeza upatikanaji wa e-kujifunza kwa wanafunzi wenye ulemavu.
Luo Translations: Ofis mar Puonjruok tiyo gi teknoloji mondo okony nyithindo ma nigi midekre obed gi nyalo mar puonjore e yor intanet.

English: Teachers Service Commission launches a digital resource bank with lesson plans and teaching aids for all subjects.
Swahili Translations: Tume ya Huduma ya Walimu inazindua benki ya rasilimali za dijiti na mipango ya masomo na misaada ya kufundisha kwa masomo yote.
Luo Translations: Kanyakla mar Teacher Services Commission chako tiyo gi yore mag digital kod chenro mag somo kod kony mag puonjo e skul duto.

English: TVETA upgrades the national online learning platform for TVET to include virtual labs and interactive assessments.
Swahili Translations: TVETA inaongeza jukwaa la kitaifa la kujifunza mtandaoni kwa ajili ya TVET ili kuingiza maabara ya virtual na tathmini za maingiliano.
Luo Translations: TVETA medo chenro mar somo e intanet e piny mangima ne TVET mondo oriw laboratori mag virtual kod nonro mag tudruok.

English: Ministry of ICT launches targeted digital literacy programs for women entrepreneurs to enhance economic empowerment.
Swahili Translations: Wizara ya ICT inazindua mipango ya kuimarisha ujasiriamali wa wanawake kwa kuimarisha uwezo wa kiuchumi.
Luo Translations: Ministry of ICT chako chenro mag jiwo mon mondo obed jomisonari kuom jiwo nyalo mar weche mag ohala.

English: National Research Fund supports creation of an online mentorship network linking students and researchers with mentors.
Swahili Translations: Mfuko wa Kitaifa wa Utafiti unasaidia kuunda mtandao wa ushauri wa mtandaoni unaohusisha wanafunzi na watafiti na washauri.
Luo Translations: Riwruok mar National Research Fund konyo e loso chenro mar chiwo paro e Intanet ne jopuonjre, josomo, kod jong'ad rieko.

English: Ministry of Education initiates review of ICT integration policies to align with new education technology trends.
Swahili Translations: Wizara ya Elimu inaanza kupitia sera za ushirikiano wa ICT ili kuendana na mwenendo mpya wa teknolojia ya elimu.
Luo Translations: Ofis mar Puonjruok chako tiyo gi chenro mag tiyo gi yore mag ICT mondo omany lokruok e yore mag teknoloji.

English: Teachers Service Commission introduces formal certification for STEM teachers to improve quality of instruction.
Swahili Translations: Tume ya Huduma ya Walimu inaanzisha vyeti rasmi kwa walimu wa STEM ili kuboresha ubora wa mafundisho.
Luo Translations: Komiti mar Tij Jopuonj chako loso weche mag tiegruok ne jopuonj mag STEM mondo omi gibed gi lony e puonjo.

English: Ministry of Education develops a digital tool for monitoring e-learning progress and challenges in schools.
Swahili Translations: Wizara ya Elimu inaandaa chombo cha dijiti cha kufuatilia maendeleo ya e-kujifunza na changamoto katika shule.
Luo Translations: Ofis mar Puonjruok e Piny owacho chiwo chenro mar nono dongruok mar somo e yor intanet kod pek ma yudo ji e skul.

English: Ministry of Education holds awareness workshops on inclusive education targeting school managers and community leaders.
Swahili Translations: Wizara ya Elimu inafanya semina za ufahamu juu ya elimu ya pamoja kwa ajili ya wasimamizi wa shule na viongozi wa jamii.
Luo Translations: Ofis mar Puonjruok timo chenro mar puonjo jorit skul kod jotelo mag oganda.

English: Kenya National Library Service (KNLS) expands e-library services to 50 more public primary and secondary schools.
Swahili Translations: Huduma ya Maktaba ya Kitaifa ya Kenya (KNLS) inaongeza huduma za maktaba ya elektroniki kwa shule 50 zaidi za msingi na sekondari za umma.
Luo Translations: Kenya National Library Service (KNLS) medo chiwo buge mag intanet ne skunde 50 mamoko mag sekondari kod sekondari.

English: Ministry of Education organizes online continuous professional development training for teachers on CBC curriculum.
Swahili Translations: Wizara ya Elimu inaandaa mafunzo ya kuendelea ya kitaaluma kwa walimu kwenye programu ya CBC.
Luo Translations: Ofis mar Puonjruok chiwo tiegruok ma dhi nyime ne jopuonj e program mar CBC.

English: Ministry of Youth Affairs, Education partners implement digital literacy programs targeted at out-of-school youth.
Swahili Translations: Wizara ya Mambo ya Vijana, washirika wa elimu huanzisha mipango ya elimu ya digital kwa ajili ya vijana walio nje ya shule.
Luo Translations: E kindeno, riwruok mar Joneno mag Jehova ma tiyo gi teknoloji mar digital e puonjo rowere ma ok dhi e skul.

English: Government invests in ICT infrastructure upgrades in national polytechnic institutes to support modern learning.
Swahili Translations: Serikali huwekeza katika kuboresha miundombinu ya ICT katika taasisi za kitaifa za polytechnic kusaidia kujifunza kisasa.
Luo Translations: Sirkande timo dongruok e yore mag ICT e ute mag tiego ji e yore mopogore opogore mondo okony e puonjruok.

English: Kenya Institute of Curriculum Development forms committee for review and approval of new digital textbooks.
Swahili Translations: Taasisi ya Kenya ya Maendeleo ya Mafunzo huunda kamati ya kukagua na kupitisha vitabu vipya vya masomo vya digital.
Luo Translations: Kenya Institute for Education Development loso komiti mar nono kendo rwako buge manyien mag somo mag digital.

English: TVETA launches a mobile learning app providing access to tutorials and assessments for TVET students on the go.
Swahili Translations: TVETA inazindua programu ya kujifunza kwa simu ambayo hutoa upatikanaji wa mafunzo na tathmini kwa wanafunzi wa TVET wanaosafiri.
Luo Translations: TVETA chako tiyo gi simo e puonjruok ma miyo jopuonjre ma dhi e skundno yudo tiegruok kod nonro.

English: KICD partners with NGOs to train Early Childhood Development educators on inclusive teaching methods.
Swahili Translations: KICD inashirikiana na mashirika yasiyo ya kiserikali kuwazoeza walimu wa Maendeleo ya Utoto wa Mapema juu ya njia za kufundisha zinazojumuisha.
Luo Translations: KICD tiyo kanyachiel gi riwruoge maok mag sirkal mondo otieg jopuonj mag weche mag tiego nyithindo e yore mopogore opogore.

English: Ministry of Education conducts training for teachers on digital formative and summative assessment techniques.
Swahili Translations: Wizara ya Elimu huandaa mafunzo kwa walimu juu ya mbinu za digital za malezi na upimaji wa jumla.
Luo Translations: Ofis mar Puonjruok chiwo tiegruok ne jopuonj e wi yore mag digital mag tiego nyithindo kod nonro.

English: Ministry of ICT and County Governments partner to establish ICT resource centers in rural areas to support digital literacy.
Swahili Translations: Wizara ya ICT na serikali za wilaya zinafanya kazi pamoja ili kuanzisha vituo vya rasilimali za ICT katika maeneo ya vijijini kusaidia uandishi wa dijiti.
Luo Translations: Ministry of ICT kod sirkande mag alwora tiyo kanyachiel mondo gichak kuonde ma ji yudoe gik ma yudore e yore mag ICT e gwenge mosokore mondo gikony e loso weche mag digital.

English: Ministry of Education hosts annual stakeholders forum to discuss progress and challenges in digital education.
Swahili Translations: Wizara ya Elimu inaandaa mkutano wa kila mwaka wa wanaohusika ili kujadili maendeleo na changamoto katika elimu ya dijiti.
Luo Translations: Ofis mar Puonjruok mar Piny owacho chano romo mar higa ka higa mar joma nie tijno mondo giwuo kuom dongruok kod pek ma yudo ji e somo mar digital.

English: Ministry of Education issues new guidelines on effective and ethical ICT use in schools across all levels.
Swahili Translations: Wizara ya Elimu imetoa miongozo mpya juu ya matumizi yenye ufanisi na ya maadili ya ICT katika shule katika ngazi zote.
Luo Translations: Ofis mar Puonjruok osechiwo chike manyien e wi tiyo gi yore mag teknoloji e yo maber kendo e yo maber e skunde duto.

English: TVETA initiates development of comprehensive digital literacy modules tailored for TVET learners.
Swahili Translations: TVETA huanzisha maendeleo ya moduli za jumla za uandishi wa digital zilizoundwa kwa ajili ya wanafunzi wa TVET.
Luo Translations: TVETA chako timo modules mag digital writing ma olos ne jopuonjre mag TVET.

English: Ministry of Education launches interactive portal providing digital lessons and assessments for primary learners.
Swahili Translations: Wizara ya Elimu inazindua portal ya maingiliano ya kutoa masomo na tathmini za digital kwa wanafunzi wa msingi.
Luo Translations: Ofis mar Puonjruok chako chenro mar chiwo somo kod nonro mag digital ne nyithindo matindo.

English: Ministry of ICT collaborates with NGOs to hold nationwide workshops educating parents on digital tools and child online safety.
Swahili Translations: Wizara ya ICT inashirikiana na mashirika yasiyo ya kiserikali kufanya semina za kitaifa kuwaelimisha wazazi juu ya zana za dijiti na usalama wa watoto mtandaoni.
Luo Translations: Ministry of ICT tiyo kanyachiel gi riwruoge maok mag sirkal mondo otim chokruok mag puonjo jonyuol e wi gik ma nyalo konyo nyithindo obed gi nyalo mar tiyo gi teknoloji kod weche mag rito nyithindgi e Intanet.

English: National Research Fund conducts training and awareness campaigns to strengthen ethical practices in academic research.
Swahili Translations: National Research Fund huendesha mafunzo na kampeni za ufahamu ili kuimarisha mazoea ya maadili katika utafiti wa kitaaluma.
Luo Translations: National Research Fund timo tiegruok kod kampen mar chiwo paro mondo okony ji obed gi timbe mabeyo e timo nonro.

English: Ministry of Education pilots mobile science labs to enhance STEM education in arid and semi-arid lands.
Swahili Translations: Wizara ya Elimu inachukua hatua za kusafirisha maabara ya sayansi ili kuongeza elimu ya STEM katika maeneo ya majangwa ya mvua na ya mvua.
Luo Translations: Ofis mar Puonjruok kawo okang ' mar oro laboratori mag sayans mondo omed puonjo ji weche mag STEM e gwenge ma nigi thim kod kuonde ma koth chwe.

English: Ministry of Education partners with NGOs to provide digital learning devices and internet access for orphans and vulnerable children.
Swahili Translations: Wizara ya Elimu inashirikiana na mashirika yasiyo ya kiserikali kutoa vifaa vya kujifunza digital na upatikanaji wa mtandao kwa watoto yatima na watoto walio hatarini.
Luo Translations: Ofis mar Puonjruok tiyo gi riwruoge maok mag sirkal mondo okony nyithindo ma nyithind kiye kod nyithindo ma chandore yudo gik ma ginyalo puonjore e Intanet.

English: KICD signs agreements with private ed-tech firms for co-development and distribution of digital learning content.
Swahili Translations: KICD inasaini makubaliano na kampuni binafsi za teknolojia ya elimu kwa ajili ya ushirikiano wa maendeleo na usambazaji wa maudhui ya kujifunza digital.
Luo Translations: KICD timo singruok gi kambi mag tiegruok mag teknoloji mag tiegruok mondo giti kanyachiel e timo koda pogo gik ma yudore e digital learning.

English: TVETA implements a digital skills certification program to validate practical digital competencies for TVET graduates.
Swahili Translations: TVETA inatekeleza programu ya udhibitisho wa ujuzi wa digital ili kuthibitisha uwezo wa digital wa vitendo kwa wahitimu wa TVET.
Luo Translations: TVETA tiyo gi program mar digital skills certification mondo onyisgo nyalo mar digital mar tiyo ne joma otieko e TVET.

English: Ministry of Education develops tailored e-learning content for refugee learners in designated camps and resettlement areas.
Swahili Translations: Wizara ya Elimu huendeleza yaliyomo kwenye e-learning kwa wanafunzi wa wakimbizi katika kambi zilizowekwa na maeneo ya kuhamisha.
Luo Translations: Ofis mar Puonjruok e Piny owacho timo chenro mar konyo jopuonjre ma oringo thuchegi e kambi kod kuonde ma ji dhiyoe thuchegi.

English: KICD launches a mobile app providing specialized educational resources for learners with special needs.
