Swahili Translations: KICD inazindua programu ya simu ambayo hutoa rasilimali maalum za elimu kwa wanafunzi wenye mahitaji maalum.
Luo Translations: KICD chako tiyo gi simo ma chiwo gik moko makende mag tiego nyithindo ma nigi dwaro makende.

English: Ministry of Education establishes a quality assurance framework to monitor digital learning content standards.
Swahili Translations: Wizara ya Elimu inaanzisha mfumo wa kuhakikisha ubora ili kufuatilia viwango vya maudhui ya kujifunza digital.
Luo Translations: Ofis mar Puonjruok chako chenro mar neno ni tiegruok mar digital ok nyal geng'o gimoro amora.

English: Ministry of Education conducts VR-based teacher training workshops to familiarize educators with immersive teaching tools.
Swahili Translations: Wizara ya Elimu inafanya semina za mafunzo ya walimu kwa msingi wa VR ili kuwajulisha walimu zana za kufundisha za kuvutia.
Luo Translations: Ofis mar Puonjruok timo chenro mar tiego jopuonj e yor VR mondo opuonjgi gik mabeyo ma ginyalo puonjo.

English: Ministry of Education collaborates with partners to provide digital learning support for children displaced by conflicts.
Swahili Translations: Wizara ya Elimu inashirikiana na washirika kutoa msaada wa kujifunza digital kwa watoto waliofukuzwa kutokana na migogoro.
Luo Translations: Ofis mar Puonjruok tiyo gi riwruoge mamoko mondo okony nyithindo ma chandruok omako nikech lweny.

English: Ministry of Education expands online platforms offering STEM career counseling and resources for secondary school students.
Swahili Translations: Wizara ya Elimu inaongeza majukwaa ya mtandaoni ambayo hutoa ushauri wa kazi ya STEM na rasilimali kwa wanafunzi wa shule ya sekondari.
Luo Translations: Ofis mar Puonjruok medo chenro mag intanet ma chiwo puonj kod gik ma konyo jopuonjre mag sekondar.

English: Ministry of Education implements remedial classes via digital platforms supporting students in marginalized regions.
Swahili Translations: Wizara ya Elimu inatekeleza madarasa ya kurekebisha kupitia majukwaa ya dijiti kusaidia wanafunzi katika maeneo yaliyoharibiwa.
Luo Translations: Ofis mar Puonjruok tiyo gi teknoloji mar digital e konyo jopuonjre ma odak e alwora ma masira maduong'no osetimie.

English: Ministry of Education unveils mobile application with interactive science experiments and tutorials for secondary learners.
Swahili Translations: Wizara ya Elimu inazindua programu ya simu na majaribio ya sayansi ya maingiliano na mafunzo kwa wanafunzi wa sekondari.
Luo Translations: Ofis mar Puonjruok chako tiyo gi simo kod timo nonro e wi sayans mar tudruok kod tiegruok ne nyithindo ma nie sekondar.

English: Ministry of ICT organizes nationwide ICT week with focus on education technology innovations and digital skills training.
Swahili Translations: Wizara ya ICT inaandaa wiki ya ICT ya kitaifa kwa kuzingatia uvumbuzi wa teknolojia ya elimu na mafunzo ya ujuzi wa dijiti.
Luo Translations: Ministry of ICT iko juma mar ICT mar piny mangima mondo okony ji yudo lony e weche mag somo kod tiegruok mag digital skills.

English: Ministry of Education launches a digital portal for school health and nutrition data collection and management.
Swahili Translations: Wizara ya Elimu inazindua portal ya dijiti ya kukusanya na kusimamia data ya afya na lishe ya shule.
Luo Translations: Ofis mar Puonjruok chako tiyo gi intanet e choko kod rito weche mag thieth kod chiemo e skul.

English: Teachers Service Commission conducts nationwide capacity-building sessions for teachers on blended learning methodologies.
Swahili Translations: Tume ya Huduma ya Walimu huendesha vikao vya kujenga uwezo wa kitaifa kwa walimu juu ya mbinu za kujifunza pamoja.
Luo Translations: Komiti mar Tij Jopuonj timo chenro mar konyo jopuonj mondo obed gi lony e wi yore mag puonjruok kanyachiel.

English: Government funds modernization of equipment and lab facilities in STEM resource centers across counties.
Swahili Translations: Serikali inachangia kuboresha vifaa na vifaa vya maabara katika vituo vya rasilimali za STEM katika wilaya zote.
Luo Translations: Sirkal konyo e medo lony e gik ma yudore e laboratori e kuonde ma ji yudoe gik ma kamago e gwenge duto.

English: Ministry of Education launches mobile app to monitor school feeding program activities and ensure transparency.
Swahili Translations: Wizara ya Elimu yatangaza programu ya simu ili kufuatilia shughuli za programu ya kulisha shule na kuhakikisha uwazi.
Luo Translations: Ofis mar Puonjruok chako tiyo gi simo mondo omany kaka chenro mar chiemo mitimo e skul tiyo kendo mondo omi weche obed maler.

English: National Research Fund hosts annual symposium on latest research trends and outcomes in digital education.
Swahili Translations: Mfuko wa Kitaifa wa Utafiti unaandaa mkutano wa kila mwaka juu ya mwenendo wa hivi karibuni wa utafiti na matokeo katika elimu ya dijiti.
Luo Translations: Riwruok mar National Research Fund chano romo mar higa ka higa mar timo nonro e wi dongruok mosetim e digital education.

English: Ministry of ICT launches free online digital literacy courses designed specifically for women entrepreneurs and learners.
Swahili Translations: Wizara ya ICT inazindua kozi za bure za kielektroniki za kusoma na kuandika zilizoundwa hasa kwa wanawake wajasiriamali na wanafunzi.
Luo Translations: Ministry of ICT chako somo kod ndiko e yor kompyuta maonge chudo, kendo olosne mon ma jomisonari kod jopuonjre.

English: Ministry of Education develops a comprehensive e-toolkit to aid career guidance counselors in secondary schools.
Swahili Translations: Wizara ya Elimu inaandaa zana ya elektroniki ya kusaidia washauri wa uongozi wa kazi katika shule za sekondari.
Luo Translations: Ofis mar Puonjruok chiwo gik moko e yor kompyuta mondo okony jopuonj mag tich e skunde madongo.

English: Government partners with NGOs to provide internet access points and digital devices to marginalized children for e-learning.
Swahili Translations: Serikali inashirikiana na mashirika yasiyo ya kiserikali kutoa vituo vya ufikiaji wa mtandao na vifaa vya dijiti kwa watoto walioachwa kando kwa ajili ya kujifunza kwa njia ya elektroniki.
Luo Translations: Sirkal tiyo gi riwruoge maok mag sirkal mondo okony nyithindo ma ok nyal somo e Intanet obed gi kuonde ma ginyalo tudore gi weche mag intanet kod gik mamoko ma nyalo konyogi.

English: Kenya Institute of Curriculum Development establishes a peer review panel for digital content quality assurance.
Swahili Translations: Taasisi ya Kenya ya Maendeleo ya Mafunzo huanzisha jopo la ukaguzi wa wenzao kwa ajili ya kuhakikisha ubora wa maudhui ya digital.
Luo Translations: Kenya Institute for Education Development ochako grup mar nono weche mag digital mondo omi ji ong'e ni gik moko duto manie digital gin mabeyo.

English: Ministry of Education distributes tablets equipped with preloaded curriculum content for youth in community learning centers.
Swahili Translations: Wizara ya Elimu inachangia vibao vilivyo na maudhui ya masomo yaliyowekwa mapema kwa vijana katika vituo vya elimu vya jamii.
Luo Translations: Ofis mar Puonjruok chiwo weche ma yudore e bwo kalatese ma nyiso weche ma rowere nyalo puonjore chon e skul.

English: KICD publishes digital literacy toolkit to help parents support childrenâs ICT learning at home.
Swahili Translations: KICD huchapisha chombo cha zana za uandishi wa digital kusaidia wazazi kusaidia watoto kujifunza ICT nyumbani.
Luo Translations: KICD goyo buk moting'o gik ma nyalo konyo jonyuol mondo okony nyithindgi opuonjre weche mag digital e ot.

English: Teachers Service Commission launches online platform offering modular professional development courses for teachers.
Swahili Translations: Tume ya Huduma ya Walimu inazindua jukwaa la mtandaoni linalotoa kozi za mafunzo ya kitaaluma kwa walimu.
Luo Translations: Kanyakla mar Teacher Services Commission chako chenro mar tiego jopuonj e intanet.

English: Ministry of ICT establishes national helpdesk to provide ICT technical support to public schools nationwide.
Swahili Translations: Wizara ya ICT inaanzisha msaada wa kitaifa wa kutoa msaada wa kiufundi wa ICT kwa shule za umma kote nchini.
Luo Translations: Ministry of ICT chako chenro mar konyo e yore mag ICT e piny mangima e konyo skunde mag sirkal.

English: Ministry of Education launches AI-powered chatbot to provide career advice and guidance to secondary school students.
Swahili Translations: Wizara ya Elimu inazindua chatbot inayoendeshwa na AI kutoa ushauri na mwongozo wa kazi kwa wanafunzi wa shule ya sekondari.
Luo Translations: Ofis mar Puonjruok chako chatbot ma tiyo gi teko mar teko mar dhano mondo ochiw paro kod puonj mag tich ne nyithindo ma nie sekondar.

English: Kenya National Library Service expands mobile e-library access with downloadable books for remote areas.
Swahili Translations: Huduma ya Maktaba ya Kitaifa ya Kenya inaongeza upatikanaji wa maktaba ya elektroniki kwa kutumia vitabu vya kupakua kwa maeneo ya mbali.
Luo Translations: Ofis mar Kenya National Library medo tiyo gi buge mag kompyuta e konyo joma ni kuonde maboyo mondo obed gi buge ma ginyalo download.

English: Teachers Service Commission organizes digital content creation contest for innovative teaching materials.
Swahili Translations: Tume ya Huduma ya Walimu inaandaa mashindano ya uundaji wa maudhui ya dijiti kwa vifaa vya kufundisha vya ubunifu.
Luo Translations: Komiti mar Tij Jopuonj chano piem mar loso gik moko e yor digital mondo otigo e puonjo ji.

English: TVETA provides ICT skills training for administrative staff to improve e-governance in TVET institutions.
Swahili Translations: TVETA hutoa mafunzo ya ujuzi wa ICT kwa wafanyakazi wa utawala ili kuboresha utawala wa elektroniki katika taasisi za TVET.
Luo Translations: TVETA chiwo tiegruok mar ICT ne jotich sirkal mondo omed miyo sirkal mar kompyuta obed maber e riwruoge mag TVET.

English: Ministry of Education deploys interactive online simulations for science experiments to support practical learning.
Swahili Translations: Wizara ya Elimu inatumia simulations za mtandaoni za maingiliano kwa majaribio ya kisayansi kusaidia kujifunza kwa vitendo.
Luo Translations: Ofis mar Puonjruok tiyo gi ranyisi mag tudruok e Intanet e timo nonro mag sayans mondo okonygo ng'eyo gik ma timore e ngima.

English: KICD releases digital textbooks adapted for learners with special educational needs, including audio and braille format.
Swahili Translations: KICD huchapisha vitabu vya kusoma vya digital vinavyofaa kwa wanafunzi wenye mahitaji maalum ya elimu, ikiwa ni pamoja na muundo wa sauti na braille.
Luo Translations: KICD goyo buge mag somo ma yudore e Intanet ma konyo jopuonjre ma nigi dwaro mag somo moriwo koda weche mitiyogo e ndiko weche momaki.

English: Ministry of ICT partners with private sector to launch e-learning platform targeting technical skills acquisition.
Swahili Translations: Wizara ya ICT inafanya kazi na sekta binafsi ili kuzindua jukwaa la e-learning linalolenga upatikanaji wa ujuzi wa kiufundi.
Luo Translations: Ministry of ICT tiyo gi yore mag yuto mag dhano mondo ochak chenro mar somo e yor intanet ma konyo ji yudo lony e weche mag teknoloji.

English: Government allocates funds to expand and equip science resource centres across all counties.
Swahili Translations: Serikali hutoa fedha za kupanua na kuandaa vituo vya rasilimali za kisayansi katika kaunti zote.
Luo Translations: Sirkal chiwo pesa mondo omed yaro kendo loso kuonde ma ji yudoe gik ma sayans dwaro e gwenge duto.

English: Universities collaborate to provide virtual library resources universally accessible to all enrolled students.
Swahili Translations: Vyuo vikuu vinashirikiana kutoa rasilimali za maktaba ya virtual ambazo zinaweza kupatikana kwa wanafunzi wote waliohudhuria.
Luo Translations: Yunivasiti tiyo kanyachiel mondo gimi jopuonjre duto thuolo mar somo e laibrari mar intanet.

English: KNEC conducts national training to equip schools and educators on new online e-assessment tools.
Swahili Translations: KNEC huandaa mafunzo ya kitaifa ya kuwapa shule na walimu vifaa vipya vya tathmini ya elektroniki mtandaoni.
Luo Translations: KNEC iko tiegruok e piny mangima mar chiwo gik manyien mag somo e intanet ne skunde koda jopuonj.

English: National Research Fund unveils scholarship program for digital learning innovation projects by students and researchers.
Swahili Translations: Mfuko wa Kitaifa wa Utafiti unafunua mpango wa usomi wa miradi ya uvumbuzi ya kujifunza digital na wanafunzi na watafiti.
Luo Translations: National Research Fund of America nyiso chenro mar tiegruok mar jopuonjre kod jotim nonro e wi chenro mag digital learning.

English: Ministry of Education launches digital engagement program empowering parents to support childrenâs learning at home.
Swahili Translations: Wizara ya Elimu inazindua mpango wa kushirikiana kwa njia ya dijiti ili kuwawezesha wazazi kusaidia watoto kujifunza nyumbani.
Luo Translations: Ofis mar Puonjruok chako tiyo gi teknoloji mar digital mondo okony jonyuol opuonjre gi nyithindgi e ot.

English: Ministry of ICT initiates targeted e-learning projects promoting girlsâ education in rural communities.
Swahili Translations: Wizara ya ICT inaanzisha miradi ya kujifunza kwa njia ya elektroniki ili kukuza elimu ya wasichana katika jamii za vijijini.
Luo Translations: Ministry of ICT chako chenro mag somo e yor kompyuta mondo okony nyiri opuonjre e mier ma ni e gwenge.

English: Support learning! Provide visual aids for blind students.
Swahili Translations: Kusaidia kujifunza! Toa misaada ya kuona kwa wanafunzi vipofu.
Luo Translations: Konyo jopuonjre ma muofni mondo one.

English: Train staff! Teach fire safety protocols in schools.
Swahili Translations: Wafanyikazi wa treni! Kufundisha itifaki za usalama wa moto katika shule.
Luo Translations: Jotich ma tiyo e gach reru puonjo ji chike mag ritruok e kind mach e skul.

English: Ensure inclusion! Provide digital access for all students.
Swahili Translations: Hakikisha uingizaji! Kutoa upatikanaji wa dijiti kwa wanafunzi wote.
Luo Translations: Bed gadier ni idonjo e skundno!

English: Train students! Teach GBV prevention in schools.
Swahili Translations: Wafundishe wanafunzi kuzuia GBV katika shule.
Luo Translations: Puonj nyithindo geng'o tuo mar GBV e skul.

English: Support schools! Provide resources in drought areas.
Swahili Translations: Kuunga mkono shule!
Luo Translations: Riwo lwedo skul!

English: Train teachers! Prepare for landslide safety in schools.
Swahili Translations: Wafundishe walimu!
Luo Translations: Puonj jopuonj!

English: Support education! Communities, fund school fees.
Swahili Translations: Kuunga mkono elimu! Jumuiya, fedha za shule.
Luo Translations: Riwruok mar oganda, pesa mag skul.

English: Educate students! Teach flood safety in schools.
Swahili Translations: Wafundishe wanafunzi! Wafundishe usalama wa mafuriko katika shule.
Luo Translations: Puonjgi mondo gibed gi yie motegno.

English: Train students! Teach cholera prevention in schools.
Swahili Translations: Wafundishe wanafunzi kuzuia ugonjwa wa kipindupindu katika shule.
Luo Translations: Puonj nyithindo geng'o tuo mar kahera e skul.

English: Secure schools! Install security measures against banditry
Swahili Translations: Weka usalama katika shule!
Luo Translations: Keturu weche mag ritruok e skul!

English: We have made a decision... that we shall close all the learning institutions in the country. These are universities, colleges, primary and secondary schools
Swahili Translations: Tumechukua uamuzi... kwamba tutafunga taasisi zote za elimu nchini.
Luo Translations: Waseng'ado mar tieko skul duto e pinyno.

English: The stakeholders have resolved to reopen all basic education learning institutions in January 2021. This is based on the assumption that the infection curve will have flattened by December, 2020
Swahili Translations: Washiriki wameamua kufungua tena taasisi zote za elimu ya msingi mnamo Januari 2021. Hii inategemea dhana kwamba mzunguko wa maambukizo utakuwa umepungua kufikia Desemba, 2020
Luo Translations: Jo ma ne okawo okang' mar dhi nyime gi somo e skul duto mag sekondar e dwe mar Januar 2021.

English: Schools in Kenya will reopen from 12 October, starting with Grade 4, Class 8 and Form 4
Swahili Translations: Shule nchini Kenya zitafunguliwa tena kuanzia Oktoba 12, kuanzia darasa la 4, darasa la 8 na darasa la 4
Luo Translations: Skul mag Kenya ibiro yaw kendo kochakore Oktoba 12, kochakore e klas mar ang'wen, mar aboro, kod mar ang'wen

English: [Official Circular] This circular should be distributed to all institutions of Basic Education under your jurisdiction. Activities and visits to Secondary Schools in third term remain banned as per the earlier circulars
Swahili Translations: [Kirasi rasmi] Msafara huu unapaswa kusambazwa kwa taasisi zote za elimu ya msingi chini ya mamlaka yako. Shule za sekondari na ziara katika darasa la tatu zinazuiliwa kama ilivyo katika msafara wa awali
Luo Translations: [Klas mar tich] Owadwa moro miluongo ni J. J. J. J. J. J. J. J. J. J. J. J. J. J. J. J. J. J. J. J. J. J. J. J. J. J. J. J. J. J. J. J. J. J. J. J. J. J. J. J. J. J. J. J. J. J. J. J. J. J. J. J. J. J. J. J. J. J. J. J. J. J. J. J. J. J. J. J. J. J. J. J. J. J. J. J. J. J. J. J. J. J. J. J. J. J. J. J. J. J. J. J. J.

English: [DigiSchool Project] Connected 21 schools to the Internet, including 6 schools for children with special educational needs through UNESCO/Huawei partnership
Swahili Translations: [Mradi wa DigiSchool] Uunganisho wa shule 21 kwenye mtandao, ikiwa ni pamoja na shule 6 kwa watoto wenye mahitaji maalum ya elimu kupitia ushirikiano wa UNESCO/Huawei
Luo Translations: [Project DigiSchool] Riwo skunde 21 e intanet, moriwo nyaka skunde 6 mag nyithindo ma nigi dwaro makende mag somo kokalo kuom riwruok mar UNESCO/Huawei

English: [Health Protocols] Comprehensive COVID-19 health and safety protocols for school reopening including mandatory masks and temperature monitoring
Swahili Translations: [Protocol za Afya] Viwango vya afya na usalama vya COVID-19 kwa ajili ya kufungua shule tena ikiwa ni pamoja na kufunika uso na ufuatiliaji wa joto
Luo Translations: [Protokolo mag Tiegruok] COVID-19 chike mag thieth kod ritruok mar chako somo kendo moriwo kata lewni mag uso kod ritruok mar liet

English: [Special Needs Education] Launch of inclusive education programs with assistive technology for learners with disabilities
Swahili Translations: [Elimu kwa Mahitaji ya Maalum] Kuzindua mipango ya elimu ya pamoja na teknolojia ya kusaidia kwa wanafunzi wenye ulemavu
Luo Translations: [Puonjruok ne Joma Nigi Gik Makende] Tiyo gi teknoloji e konyo nyithindo ma nigi midekre

English: Basic Education PS Belio Kipsang has said though the opening of schools has been delayed by at least two weeks owing to the floods witnessed in the country, the Ministry has laid adequate strategies to make up for the lost time
Swahili Translations: Elimu ya Msingi PS Belio Kipsang amesema ingawa kufunguliwa kwa shule kumekuwa kucheleweshwa kwa angalau wiki mbili kutokana na mafuriko yaliyoonekana nchini, Wizara imeweka mikakati ya kutosha ili kulipia wakati uliopotea
Luo Translations: PS Belio Kipsang ma en japuonj maduong ' mar somo, nowacho ni kata obedo ni somo ne odeko kuom jumbe ariyo nikech ataro ma ne otimore e pinyno, sirkal oseloso chenro mar tieko seche ma ne olal.

English: schools to remain closed for the rest of the year and reopen in 2021. All national exams to be taken in 2020 have been canceled ~ CS George Magoha
Swahili Translations: Shule zitakuwa zimefungwa kwa mwaka mzima na kufunguliwa tena mwaka 2021.
Luo Translations: Skunde biro bedo kochung ' kuom higa mangima kendo ibiro yawgi e higa mar 2021.

English: The FBI is encouraging public awareness of cyber threat concerns related to K-12 students.
Swahili Translations: FBI inakuza ufahamu wa umma kuhusu wasiwasi wa vitisho vya mtandao vinavyohusiana na wanafunzi wa K-12.
Luo Translations: FBI jiwo chuny ji kuom wach luoro ma nyithind skul mag K-12 nigo kuom weche mag tiyo gi Intanet.

English: NAMI believes that public policies and practices should promote greater awareness and early identification of mental health conditions.
Swahili Translations: NAMI inaamini kuwa sera na mazoea ya umma inapaswa kukuza ufahamu zaidi na utambuzi wa mapema wa hali za afya ya akili.
Luo Translations: AN AMINO ni chike koda timbe mag oganda onego okony ji ong'e weche mag thieth mar pach chon.

English: Education Cabinet Secretary George Magoha outlined eight critical measures for schools resuming classesÂtargeted initially at Grades 4, Class?8, and Form?4.
Swahili Translations: Katibu wa Baraza la Mafunzo George Magoha alieleza hatua nane muhimu kwa shule zinazoanza tena masomo - ambazo mwanzoni zililenga darasa la 4, darasa la 8, na darasa la 4.
Luo Translations: George Magoha, ma en jagoro mar Bura mar Puonjruok, nolero gik moko aboro madwarore mondo skunde ochak somo kendo - mokwongo ne gin mag klas mar ang'wen, mar aboro, kod mar ang'wen.

English: The Ministry of Education released a comprehensive circular setting minimum reopening conditions for all institutions.
Swahili Translations: Wizara ya Elimu ilitoa mzunguko ulioenea ambao uliweka masharti ya chini ya kufungua tena taasisi zote.
Luo Translations: Ofis mar Puonjruok ne ochiwo chik ma ne nyiso ni onego giduog e skul.

English: UNICEF welcomed the Kenyan GovernmentÂs phased reopening strategy, urging parents and educational stakeholders to support reentry of Grades 4, Class?8, and Form?4 students.
Swahili Translations: UNICEF ilipongeza mkakati wa kufungua upya hatua kwa hatua wa Serikali ya Kenya, ikiwahimiza wazazi na mashirika ya elimu kuunga mkono kuingia tena kwa wanafunzi wa Darasa la 4, Darasa la 8, na Darasa la 4.
Luo Translations: UNICEF ne opwoyo chenro mar sirkal mar Kenya mar chako somo kendo, kendo ne ojiwo jonyuol gi riwruoge mag somo mondo oriw lwedo thuolo mar somo mar nyithindo ma ne nie klas mar ang'wen, mar aboro, kod mar ang'wen.

English: UNICEF announced the delivery of nearly 500 assistive devicesÂBraille typewriters, video magnifiers, screen-reading software, and adapted keyboardsÂfor learners with visual and hearing impairments.
Swahili Translations: UNICEF ilitangaza kutolewa kwa vifaa vya kusaidia karibu 500 - mashine za kuandika kwa Braille, viongezeo vya video, programu za kusoma skrini, na vibao vilivyoboreshwa - kwa wanafunzi wenye matatizo ya kuona na kusikia.
Luo Translations: UNICEF nolando ni ne idhi chiw gik makonyo chiegni 500 - masin mag ndiko gi Braille, vidio mag vidio, program mag somo weche e yor piche, kod tablet mag loso weche - ne jopuonjre ma nigi chandruok mar neno kod winjo wach.

English: The foundation provides free and subsidized artificial limbs for children who cannot afford them
Swahili Translations: Shirika hilo hutoa viungo vya ufundi bila malipo na kwa msaada wa fedha kwa watoto ambao hawawezi kuvipa
Luo Translations: Riwruokno chiwo gik moko ma nyalo konyo nyithindo ma ok nyal yudo gik moko ma ginyalo tiyogo

English: Prepare for fees! Support schools by paying fees on time despite funding delays.
Swahili Translations: Jitayarishe kwa ajili ya ada! Kuunga mkono shule kwa kulipa ada kwa wakati licha ya kuchelewa kwa fedha.
Luo Translations: Ikri ne chudo! Riwo lwedo skul kuom chulo chudo e sa kata obedo ni pesa ok ochopo mapiyo.

English: Know your flood routes! Practice school evacuation drills for safety.
Swahili Translations: Jitahidi kufanya mazoezi ya kuondoa maji ya mafuriko katika shule.
Luo Translations: Tim kinda mondo iti gi yo mar golo pi e skul.

English: Wash hands, stay safe! Use clean water to prevent cholera in schools.
Swahili Translations: Osha mikono, uwe salama! Tumia maji safi ili kuzuia kipindupindu shuleni.
Luo Translations: Luok lweti mondo kik iketh tuo mar koronavirus e skul.

English: Stay vigilant! Report banditry threats near schools to police.
Swahili Translations: Kuwa macho! Ripoti ya vitisho bandia karibu shule kwa polisi.
Luo Translations: Neuru, neuru, neuru, neuru, neuru, neuru, neuru, neuru, neuru, neuru, neuru, neuru, neuru, neuru, neuru, neuru, neuru, neuru, neuru, neuru, neuru, neuru, neuru, neuru, neuru, neuru, neuru, neuru, neuru, neuru, neuru, neuru, neuru, neuru, neuru, neuru, neuru, neuru, neuru, neuru, neuru, neuru, neuru, neuru, neuru, neuru, neuru, neuru, neuru, neuru, neuru, neuru, neuru, neuru, neuru, neuru, neuru, neuru, neuru, neuru, neuru, neuru, neuru, neuru, neuru, neuru,

English: Resolve conflicts peacefully! Report grievances to school boards.
Swahili Translations: Suluhisha migogoro kwa amani!
Luo Translations: Losuru ywaruok e yor kuwe!

English: Feeling stressed? Call 1195 for free mental health support.
Swahili Translations: Je, unahisi umevunjika moyo?
Luo Translations: Be chunyi onyosore?

English: No arson in schools! Keep flammables away from dorms.
Swahili Translations: Hakuna moto katika shule!
Luo Translations: Onge mach e skul!

English: Back to school! Join flood recovery programs for safe learning.
Swahili Translations: Jiunge na programu za kupona mafuriko ili ujifunze kwa usalama.
Luo Translations: Dhi e program mag reso ngima ji mondo ipuonjri weche ma nyalo konyi bedo gi ngima maber.

English: Stay clean! Use school sanitation facilities to prevent cholera.
Swahili Translations: Tumia vifaa vya usafi wa shule ili kuzuia kipindupindu.
Luo Translations: Ti gi gige rito ler e skul mondo ikwed tuo mar kahera.

English: Travel safely! Use designated safe routes to school in conflict zones.
Swahili Translations: Tumia njia zilizowekwa salama za kwenda shuleni katika maeneo yenye vita.
Luo Translations: Ti gi yore ma ok bi kelo hinyruok e alwora ma lweny nitie.

English: Stay safe during protests! Avoid demonstration zones near schools.
Swahili Translations: Epuka maeneo ya maandamano karibu na shule.
Luo Translations: Kik ibed kama ji timoe kampen machiegni gi skul.

English: Itâs okay to talk! Reduce mental health stigma in schools.
Swahili Translations: Ni sawa kuzungumza! Kupunguza stigma ya afya ya akili katika shule.
Luo Translations: Mano e gima ber ma timore e skul!

English: Be alert! Report suspicious activities near schools to authorities.
Swahili Translations: Kuwa macho, ripoti shughuli za mashaka karibu na shule kwa wenye mamlaka.
Luo Translations: Bed motang', kendo inyis jotelo mag sirkal gik ma timore machiegni gi skul.

English: Stay safe! Report strangers near schools to teachers or police.
Swahili Translations: Waambie walimu au polisi kuhusu wageni walio karibu na shule.
Luo Translations: Nyis jopuonj kata polis wach welo ma biro e skul.

English: Say no to FGM! Call 116 to report risks and protect girls.
Swahili Translations: Amua FGM! Piga simu 116 kuripoti hatari na kulinda wasichana.
Luo Translations: Chiw simo ne namba 116 mondo inyisgo ni nyiri nigi hinyruok kendo ritgi.

English: Protect our children! Report trafficking risks to 116.
Swahili Translations: Wape 116 habari kuhusu hatari za biashara ya binadamu.
Luo Translations: Nyis ji 116 weche manyalo miyo gibed gi timbe mag mibadhi.

English: Welcome all! Enroll refugee students in local schools.
Swahili Translations: Karibu wote! Waandikishe wanafunzi wakimbizi katika shule za mitaa.
Luo Translations: Ne giduto giduto! English: Learn anywhere! Join mobile schools for pastoralist children.
Swahili Translations: Jiunge na shule za watoto wa wachungaji.
Luo Translations: Dhi e skul mar jokwath.

English: Include everyone! Ensure schools accommodate students with disabilities.
Swahili Translations: Hakikisha shule zinawaandalia wanafunzi wenye ulemavu.
Luo Translations: Tem neno ni skunde chiwo gik ma dwarore ne nyithindo ma nigi midekre.

English: Be prepared! Conduct regular fire safety drills in schools.
Swahili Translations: Uwe tayari! Fanya mazoezi ya kawaida ya usalama wa moto katika shule.
Luo Translations: Tim tiegruok mapile mar rito mach e skul.

English: Stay safe online! Teach students to avoid cyber threats.
Swahili Translations: Wafundishe wanafunzi kuepuka vitisho vya Intaneti.
Luo Translations: Puonj jopuonjreni mondo kik gibed joma tiyo gi Intanet e yo marach.

English: Stop GBV! Report gender-based violence in schools to 116.
Swahili Translations: Acha GBV! Ripoti unyanyasaji wa kijinsia katika shule kwa 116.
Luo Translations: Geno mar nindruok e skul ne en 116.

English: Save water! Teach students water conservation in drought-prone areas.
Swahili Translations: Wafundishe wanafunzi jinsi ya kuhifadhi maji katika maeneo yenye ukame.
Luo Translations: Puonj jopuonjre kaka ginyalo kano pi kuonde ma onge pi.

English: Know the signs! Train students on landslide evacuation plans.
Swahili Translations: Wafundishe wanafunzi mipango ya kuondoa maporomoko ya ardhi.
Luo Translations: Puonj jopuonjre kaka ginyalo tieko chwerruok.

English: Stay healthy! Ensure schools have clean water and sanitation.
Swahili Translations: Uwe na afya nzuri, na uhakikishe kwamba shule zina maji safi na usafi wa mazingira.
Luo Translations: Bed gi ngima maber, kendo rit ni pi maler kod alwora maler yudore e skunde.

English: Create inclusive spaces! Train teachers to support diverse learners.
Swahili Translations: Kujenga nafasi za kuingiza watu wote! Wazoeze walimu kusaidia wanafunzi mbalimbali.
Luo Translations: Tieg jopuonj mondo okony jopuonjre mopogore opogore.

English: Learn anywhere! Join mobile schools for pastoralist children.
Swahili Translations: Jiunge na shule za watoto wa wachungaji.
Luo Translations: Dhi e skul mar jokwath.

English: All can learn! Use braille and ramps for disabled students.
Swahili Translations: Kila mtu anaweza kujifunza! Tumia maandishi ya vipofu na mifumo ya kuteleza kwa ajili ya wanafunzi wenye ulemavu.
Luo Translations: Ti gi ranyisi mar welo kod gik ma inyalo somo e yo ma ok rumo.

English: Be ready! Practice earthquake drills in schools.
Swahili Translations: Jitayarishe! Fanya mazoezi ya matetemeko ya ardhi katika shule.
Luo Translations: Tim tiegruok mar rito piny e skul.

English: Demand accountability! Ensure school funds are used wisely.
Swahili Translations: Tumia pesa za shule kwa hekima.
Luo Translations: Ti gi pesa ma in-go e skul e yo mariek.

English: Stay safe! Know your schoolâs flood safety zones.
Swahili Translations: Uwe salama, ujue maeneo ya usalama wa mafuriko ya shule yako.
Luo Translations: Bed motang', kendo ng'e kuonde ma yiengni nyalo yudie rit e skul.

English: Clean schools, healthy students! Maintain sanitation to stop cholera.
Swahili Translations: Shule safi, wanafunzi wenye afya, kudumisha usafi wa mazingira ili kuzuia kipindupindu.
Luo Translations: Skunde maler, nyithindo ma nigi ngima maber, rito ler mar alwora mondo kik wadonj e tuo mar korona.

English: Stay alert! Avoid unsafe routes to school in banditry zones.
Swahili Translations: Epuka njia zisizo salama za kwenda shuleni katika maeneo ya uhalifu.
Luo Translations: Kik iluw yore ma ok ler ma inyalo wuothgo e skul.

English: No violence! Report student issues to school management.
Swahili Translations: Hakuna vurugu! Ripoti masuala ya wanafunzi kwa usimamizi wa shule.
Luo Translations: Onge timbe gero! Nyis jotend skul weche ma timore ne jopuonjre.

English: Heal together! Access school counselors after protests.
Swahili Translations: Pata huduma ya washauri wa shule baada ya maandamano.
Luo Translations: Yud kony kuom joma tayo skul bang' timo kampen.

English: Be prepared! Practice school lockdown drills for safety.
Swahili Translations: Jitayarishe! Fanya mazoezi ya shule ya kufungwa kwa usalama.
Luo Translations: Tim tiegruok mar skul ma ok bi yude.

English: Stay cautious! Avoid strangers and report risks to teachers.
Swahili Translations: Uwe mwangalifu, epuka watu wasiowajua na uwaambie walimu kuhusu hatari.
Luo Translations: Bed motang', tang' gi joma ok ing'eyo kendo nyis jopuonj mariek gik manyalo hinyi.

English: Speak up! Report abuse to teachers or call 116.
Swahili Translations: Taja unyanyasaji kwa walimu au piga simu 116.
Luo Translations: Nyis japuonjni gima ne otimoreno, kata itudri gi namba 116.

English: Every child learns! Support refugee students in schools.
Swahili Translations: Kila mtoto hujifunza!
Luo Translations: Nyithindo duto puonjore!

English: Keep learning! Enroll in nomadic schools for pastoralists.
Swahili Translations: Endelea kujifunza! Jiandikishe katika shule za wasafiri wa wanyama.
Luo Translations: Dhi nyime gi puonjruok!

English: Include all! Provide ramps and resources for disabled students.
Swahili Translations: Waandae wanafunzi wenye ulemavu njia za kuteleza na rasilimali.
Luo Translations: Mi jopuonjre ma nigi midekre thuolo mar dhi nyime gi somo.

English: Stay safe! Follow evacuation plans during chemical spills.
Swahili Translations: Fuata mipango ya kuondoka wakati wa kuporomoka kwa kemikali.
Luo Translations: Tim chenro mar wuok e odno ka gimoro otimore.

English: Support education! Pay school fees to keep learning alive.
Swahili Translations: Kuunga mkono elimu! Kulipa ada ya shule ili kuendelea kujifunza.
Luo Translations: Riwo lwedo somo!

English: Be flood-ready! Practice safe evacuation in schools.
Swahili Translations: Uwe tayari kwa mafuriko!
Luo Translations: Ikri ne ataro!

English: Wash hands daily! Prevent cholera with proper hygiene.
Swahili Translations: Osha mikono kila siku! Epuka ugonjwa wa kipindupindu kwa kuwa na usafi wa kiuchumi.
Luo Translations: Rie lweti pile ka pile, kendo ritri kik ibed gi tuo mar kolera.

English: Work together! Communities, ensure safe school environments.
Swahili Translations: Kazi pamoja! Jumuiya, kuhakikisha mazingira salama ya shule.
Luo Translations: Tiuru kanyachiel! Joot, rituru alwora mar skul.

English: Stay in school! Avoid protest zones for safety.
Swahili Translations: Kaa shuleni! Epuka maeneo ya maandamano kwa usalama.
Luo Translations: Bed e skul, kik idhi kuonde ma ji timoe kampen.

English: Youâre not alone! Visit school counselors for support.
Swahili Translations: Usikose peke yako, tembelea washauri wa shule kwa msaada.
Luo Translations: Kik iwe mondo ng'ato okonyi, dhi ir joma chiwo puonj e skul mondo ikonyi.

English: Stay vigilant! Follow school safety protocols during terror alerts.
Swahili Translations: Endelea kuwa macho, fuata kanuni za usalama wa shule wakati wa maonyo ya ugaidi.
Luo Translations: Bed motang', kendo chik chik chikni mag ritruok e skul sama iketo siem kuom weche mag mahundu.

English: Report risks! Call police or teachers to prevent abductions.
Swahili Translations: Piga simu polisi au walimu ili kuzuia unyakuo.
Luo Translations: Nyis polis kata jopuonj mondo kik ikwal ng'ato.

English: Protect kids! Report abuse or trafficking to 116.
Swahili Translations: Wape taarifa ya unyanyasaji au biashara kwa 116.
Luo Translations: Nyisgi ni isando ji kata isando ji gi namba 116.

English: All belong! Enroll refugee children in schools today.
Swahili Translations: Waandikishe watoto wakimbizi katika shule leo.
Luo Translations: Nyis nyithindo ma oringo thuchegi mondo odhi e skul kawuono.

English: Education for all! Join nomadic schools for pastoralist kids.
Swahili Translations: Jiunge na shule za wasafiri wa kijani kibichi kwa ajili ya watoto wa wachungaji.
Luo Translations: Dhi e skunde ma nyithindo ma jokwath tiyogo.

English: Learn equally! Provide braille and aids for disabled students.
Swahili Translations: Wafundishe vivyo hivyo!
Luo Translations: Puonjgi bende!

English: Be cautious! Avoid chemical hazards near schools.
Swahili Translations: Uwe mwangalifu, epuka hatari za kemikali karibu na shule.
Luo Translations: Bed motang' mondo kik ibed gi gik manyalo ketho ngima ji machiegni gi skul.

English: Support schools! Demand timely release of capitation funds.
Swahili Translations: Kuunga mkono shule!
Luo Translations: Riwo lwedo skul!

English: Recover learning! Join remedial classes after floods.
Swahili Translations: Jiunge na madarasa ya kurekebisha baada ya mafuriko.
Luo Translations: Dhi e klas mar konyo joma otho.

English: Drink safe water! Prevent cholera in schools.
Swahili Translations: Kunywa maji safi, kuzuia kipindupindu katika shule.
Luo Translations: Madho pi maler, geng'o tuo mar kahera e skul.

English: Safe schools! Communities, protect schools from banditry.
Swahili Translations: Shule salama! Jumuiya, kulinda shule kutoka banditry.
Luo Translations: Skundego ne gin kuonde ma ji ne nyalo dakie!

English: Ensure safety! Comply with fire standards in school dormitories.
Swahili Translations: Hakikisha usalama! Fuata viwango vya moto katika vyumba vya kulala vya shule.
Luo Translations: Bed motang' kendo ritri gi liet e ute skul.

English: Bridge the gap! Provide digital tools for disabled students.
Swahili Translations: Wape wanafunzi wenye ulemavu vifaa vya digital.
Luo Translations: Mi jopuonjre ma nigi midekre gik ma ginyalo somo e kompyuta.

English: Stop GBV! Report school violence to authorities or call 116.
Swahili Translations: Acha GBV! Ripoti vurugu shule kwa mamlaka au piga simu 116.
Luo Translations: Weuru timbe gero ma timore e skul odonjne sirkal kata luong 116.

English: Keep learning! Enroll in schools despite drought challenges.
Swahili Translations: Endelea kujifunza! Jiandikishe katika shule licha ya matatizo yanayosababishwa na ukame.
Luo Translations: Dhi nyime gi puonjruok! Dhi nyime gi puonjruok kata obedo ni piny ok yot.

English: Be ready! Practice landslide evacuation drills in schools.
Swahili Translations: Jitayarishe, fanya mazoezi ya kuondoa maporomoko ya ardhi katika shule.
Luo Translations: Ikri, tim tiegruok mar golo pi e skul.

English: Support your child! Pay fees on time to avoid school closures.
Swahili Translations: Mtegemeze mtoto wako!
Luo Translations: Kony nyathini!

English: Train teachers! Ensure flood safety protocols in schools.

English: Rift Valley Technical Training Institute leads in competency-based TVET.
Swahili Translations: Rift Valley Technical Training Institute inaongoza katika elimu ya juu ya televisheni.
Luo Translations: Rift Valley Technical Training Institute en riwruok ma tayo somo mag televison.

English: KTTC renamed to focus solely on training TVET instructors.
Swahili Translations: KTTC jina upya ili kuzingatia tu mafunzo ya walimu TVET.
Luo Translations: KTTC noloko nyingno mondo omi otieg jopuonj mag TVET kende.

English: The rise of Technical and Vocational Education and Training (TVET) in Kenya represents a shift toward a more practical and inclusive approach to education. By focusing on skills development that directly responds to the needs of the labor market, TVET programs are helping to bridge the gap between education and employment, reduce youth unemployment, and drive economic growth.
Swahili Translations: Kuongezeka kwa elimu na mafunzo ya kiufundi na kitaaluma (TVET) nchini Kenya inawakilisha mabadiliko kuelekea njia ya mazoezi na ya pamoja zaidi ya elimu. Kwa kuzingatia maendeleo ya ujuzi ambayo hujibu moja kwa moja mahitaji ya soko la kazi, programu za TVET zinasaidia kuziba pengo kati ya elimu na ajira, kupunguza ukosefu wa ajira kati ya vijana, na kuendesha ukuaji wa uchumi.
Luo Translations: Medruok mar tiegruok kod tiegruok e weche mag tiegruok kod tich (TVET) e piny Kenya nyiso lokruok e yo ma tiegruok kod tiegruok oriwogo ji duto. Kuom timo dongruok e lony ma nyalo konyo e chopo dwaro mag piny tich, program mag TVET konyo tieko pogruok mantie e kind tiegruok kod tich, tieko yuto mar rowere, kendo jiwo dongruok mar ohala.

English: Martial arts used to instill discipline and offer career paths.
Swahili Translations: Ufundi wa kupigana uliotumiwa kufundisha nidhamu na kutoa njia za kazi.
Luo Translations: Ne oti gi tim lweny e puonjo ji mondo oriegi kendo mondo gitim gik ma dwarore.

English: Becomes Technical University of Mombasa, offering modern TVET.
Swahili Translations: Inakuwa Chuo Kikuu cha Ufundi cha Mombasa, kutoa TVET kisasa.
Luo Translations: Bang'e, ne olend e skul mar Mombasa, kendo ne olend e pinyno e yo ma ne itiyogo e loso televison.

English: Build your future! Join TVET programs for technical skills.
Swahili Translations: Jenga wakati wako ujao! Jiunge na programu za TVET kwa ujuzi wa kiufundi.
Luo Translations: Tim chenro mar bedo gi kinde mabiro!

English: Learn farming! Enroll in agricultural vocational courses.
Swahili Translations: Jifunze kilimo! Jiandikishe katika kozi za kitaaluma za kilimo.
Luo Translations: Puonjri weche mag pur!

English: Work and learn! Join vocational training at Kiambu Industrial Park.
Swahili Translations: Fanya kazi na ujifunze! Jiunge na mafunzo ya kitaaluma katika Kiambu Industrial Park.
Luo Translations: Tim kendo ipuonjri! Dhi e Kiambu Industrial Park mondo iyud tiegruok.

English: Empower women! Enroll in vocational training for women.
Swahili Translations: Wawezesha wanawake! Jiandikishe katika mafunzo ya kitaaluma kwa wanawake.
Luo Translations: Dhi e tiegruok mar tiego mon.

English: Start your business! Join TVET entrepreneurship courses.
Swahili Translations: Kuanza biashara yako! Jiunge na kozi ya ujasiriamali TVET.
Luo Translations: Tim chenro mar chako ohala!

English: Build skills! Enroll in construction training programs.
Swahili Translations: Jiunge na programu za mafunzo ya ujenzi.
Luo Translations: Dhi e tiegruok mag gedo.

English: Sew your future! Join textile vocational courses in Kitui.
Swahili Translations: Fanya kazi ya kutengeneza nguo katika kitui.
Luo Translations: Tim tich mar loso lewni e dho ot.

English: Code your future! Learn IT skills in vocational programs.
Swahili Translations: Pata ujuzi wa IT katika programu za kitaaluma.
Luo Translations: Yud lony e weche mag teknoloji e program mag somo.

English: Power up! Join vocational courses in renewable energy.
Swahili Translations: Ongeza nguvu! Jiunge na masomo ya kitaaluma katika nishati ya nishati ya kuzaliwa upya.
Luo Translations: Med timo dongruok! Dhi e somo mar somo kuom wach teko mar nyuol manyien.

English: Serve with pride! Enroll in hospitality vocational courses.
Swahili Translations: Utumikie kwa kiburi! Jiandikishe katika kozi za kazi za uangalizi wa wageni.
Luo Translations: Timne kinda gi sunga!

English: Fix the future! Join automotive repair courses.
Swahili Translations: Fanya maendeleo, jiunge na masomo ya kutengeneza magari.
Luo Translations: Tim dongruok, kendo idhi e tiegruok mar loso mtokni.

English: Process for profit! Learn food processing in TVET programs.
Swahili Translations: Jifunze utaratibu wa kutengeneza chakula katika programu za TVET.
Luo Translations: Puonjri kaka inyalo loso chiemo e program mar TVET.

English: Learn on the job! Join apprenticeship programs in industries.
Swahili Translations: Jifunze kazi! Jiunge na programu za mafunzo katika viwanda.
Luo Translations: Puonjri tije moko!

English: Pipe up! Enroll in plumbing vocational courses.
Swahili Translations: Jiandikishe katika kozi za kazi za umeme.
Luo Translations: Dhi e tiegruok mag somo mag sitima.

English: Spark your career! Join electrical vocational programs.
Swahili Translations: Fanya kazi yako iwe rahisi!
Luo Translations: Tem matek mondo tich obed mayot!

English: Grow your business! Join agribusiness vocational courses.
Swahili Translations: Kufanya biashara yako kukua! Jiunge na kozi za kitaaluma ya biashara ya kilimo.
Luo Translations: Dhi e skul mar somo weche mag ohala.

English: The Kenya Universities and Colleges Central Placement Service reopened its portal on February 26 2025 for students to apply for 26 KMTC programs for the March 2025 intake.
Swahili Translations: Huduma ya Mahali pa Kati ya Chuo Kikuu na Chuo Kikuu cha Kenya ilifungua tena portal yake mnamo Februari 26, 2025 kwa wanafunzi kuomba mipango 26 ya KMTC kwa ajili ya kuingia Machi 2025.
Luo Translations: Kenya University-Central Campus Service ne oyawo kendo e dwe mar ariyo tarik 26, 2025 mondo josomo oket chenro mar KMTC 26 mar donjo e dwe mar adek higa mar 2025.

English: The Kenya Universities and Colleges Central Placement Service opened its portal on January 24 2025 for 2024 KCSE students to apply for KMTC and TVET courses with a deadline of February 14 2025.
Swahili Translations: Huduma ya Mahali pa Kati ya Chuo Kikuu na Chuo Kikuu cha Kenya ilifungua lango lake mnamo Januari 24, 2025 kwa wanafunzi 2024 wa KCSE kuomba kozi za KMTC na TVET na tarehe ya mwisho ya Februari 14, 2025.
Luo Translations: Kenya's Ministry of Intermediate and University Studies ne oyawo dhoot mare tarik 24, Januar, 2025 ne jopuonjre 2024 mag KCSE mondo oketgi e KMTC kod TVET kod tarik mogik mar Februar 14, 2025.

English: On April 1 2025 KUCCPS announced 63 support centres across 47 counties to assist 2024 KCSE candidates with applications for degree TVET and TTC programs.
Swahili Translations: Mnamo Aprili 1, 2025, KUCCPS ilitangaza vituo 63 vya msaada katika majimbo 47 kusaidia wagombea 2024 wa KCSE na maombi ya programu za shahada za TVET na TTC.
Luo Translations: E April 1, 2025, KUCCPS nolando kuonde 63 mag konyo e pinje 47 mondo okony jogo madwaro dhi e KCSE 2024 kod kwayo mag program mag digri mag TVET kod TTC.

English: On May 18 2025 KUCCPS opened its portal for course revision for 2025/2026 placement targeting 2024 KCSE candidates and past candidates from 2000 to 2024 for TVET programs.
Swahili Translations: Mnamo Mei 18, 2025, KUCCPS ilifungua portal yake ya marekebisho ya kozi kwa ajili ya nafasi za 2025/2026 ambazo zinawalenga wagombea 2024 wa KCSE na wagombea wa zamani kutoka 2000 hadi 2024 kwa programu za TVET.
Luo Translations: E Mei 18, 2025, KUCCPS ne oyawo chenro mar tiego ji e tiegruok mar tiegruok mar tich mar 2025/2026 ma ne dhi konyo joma ne dhi dhi yudo KCSE 2024 kod joma ne dhi yudo tiegruok e tiegruok mag TVET chakre higa mar 2000 nyaka 2024.

English: On July 9 2025 KUCCPS announced openings for the Diploma in Primary Teacher Education at Eldas Teacher Training College requiring a C plain in KCSE for September 2025 intake.
Swahili Translations: Mnamo Julai 9, 2025, KUCCPS ilitangaza kufunguliwa kwa Diploma katika Elimu ya Mwalimu wa Msingi katika Chuo cha Mafunzo ya Mwalimu cha Eldas ambacho kinahitaji C plain katika KCSE kwa ajili ya kuingia Septemba 2025.
Luo Translations: E dwe mar Julai 9, 2025, KUCCPS nolando ni ibiro chak somo e skul mar Eldas Teacher Training College, ma dwaro ni ng'ato obed gi namba mar C e KCSE mondo odonj e skundno e dwe mar Septemba 2025.

English: On September 1 2025 KUCCPS will open its portal for the September 2025 university and TVET intake targeting 2024 KCSE candidates.
Swahili Translations: Mnamo Septemba 1, 2025, KUCCPS itafungua portal yake kwa ajili ya masomo ya chuo kikuu na TVET ya Septemba 2025 ambayo yanalenga wagombea 2024 wa KCSE.
Luo Translations: E dwe mar Septemba 1, 2025, KUCCPS biro yawo dhoot mar somo mar yunivasiti gi TVET mar Septemba 2025 ma biro konyo jogo madwaro dhi e KCSE mar 2024.

English: On April 18 2025 KUCCPS reopened its portal for limited slots in 26 KMTC programs for the March 2025 intake closing on April 30 2025.
Swahili Translations: Mnamo Aprili 18, 2025, KUCCPS ilifungua tena portal yake kwa nafasi ndogo katika programu 26 za KMTC kwa ajili ya kuingia Machi 2025 kufungwa Aprili 30, 2025.
Luo Translations: E April 18, 2025, KUCCPS ne odwoko thuolo mar tiyo gi program mar KMTC 26 e yo mayot mondo odonj e dwe mar Mach 2025 kendo ne ogoye April 30, 2025.

English: On February 11 2022 KUCCPS urged KCSE candidates from 2000 to 2021 who missed university admission to apply for TVET courses under government sponsorship.
Swahili Translations: Mnamo Februari 11, 2022 KUCCPS iliwahimiza wagombea wa KCSE kutoka 2000 hadi 2021 ambao walikosa kuingia chuo kikuu kuomba kozi za TVET chini ya ufadhili wa serikali.
Luo Translations: E Februar 11, 2022 KUCCPS nojiwo jogo ma ne ok nyal dhi e yunivasiti e higa mar 2000 nyaka 2021 mondo odhi e tiegruok mar TVET ma ne itimo gi pesa mag sirkal.

English: On March 15 2025 KMTC announced that applications for its March 2025 intake must be submitted via the KUCCPS portal closing on March 4 2025.
Swahili Translations: Mnamo Machi 15, 2025, KMTC ilitangaza kwamba maombi ya kuingia kwake Machi 2025 lazima yawasilishwe kupitia portal ya KUCCPS kufungwa Machi 4, 2025.
Luo Translations: Tarik 15 dwe mar Mach 2025, KMTC ne olando ni kwayo mar donjo e dwe mar Mach 2025 ne idhi chiw kokalo kuom KUCCPS portal ma ne olor tarik 4 dwe mar Mach 2025.

English: The Kenya Universities and Colleges Central Placement Service unveiled a list of diploma and certificate programs at KMTC for the March 2025 intake on December 25 2024 including entry grades.
Swahili Translations: Huduma ya Mahali pa Kati ya Vyuo Vikuu na Vyuo Vikuu vya Kenya ilifunua orodha ya diploma na programu za cheti katika KMTC kwa ajili ya kuingia Machi 2025 mnamo Desemba 25, 2024 ikiwa ni pamoja na alama za kuingia.
Luo Translations: Ofis mar Kenya's Ministry of Intermediate and Collegiate Affairs of Kenya osefwenyo ni program mag diploma kod certificate mag KMTC ne dhi dhi donjo e dwe mar Mach 2025 tarik 25, Desemba 2024, moriwo nyaka weche mag donjo.

English: On February 26 2024 KUCCPS extended the deadline for applications to diploma and certificate courses costing below Ksh 60000 at TVET institutions.
Swahili Translations: Mnamo Februari 26, 2024, KUCCPS iliongeza tarehe ya mwisho ya maombi ya maombi ya kozi za diploma na vyeti zenye gharama chini ya Ksh 60000 katika taasisi za Elimu ya Televisheni.
Luo Translations: E dwe mar Februar 26, 2024, KUCCPS nomedo tarik mogik mar kwayo kwayo mag somo mag diploma kod osetifiketi ma nengogi okalo Ksh 60,000 e ute mag somo mag televison.

English: On January 16 2024 KUCCPS announced that students with C- and below in 2023 KCSE can pursue medical diploma and certificate courses at KMTC.
Swahili Translations: Mnamo Januari 16, 2024 KUCCPS ilitangaza kwamba wanafunzi walio na C- na chini katika 2023 KCSE wanaweza kufuata kozi za diploma ya matibabu na vyeti katika KMTC.
Luo Translations: E Januar 16, 2024, KUCCPS nolando ni jopuonjre ma nigi C- kod ma ok gin e KCSE 2023 nyalo dhi e KMTC mondo giyud diplome mag thieth kod gik ma nyiso ni gipuonjore.

English: On January 9 2024 KUCCPS released a list of approved certificate courses for 2023 KCSE students with D+ and D at TVET institutions.
Swahili Translations: Mnamo Januari 9, 2024, KUCCPS ilitoa orodha ya kozi za vyeti vilivyokubaliwa kwa wanafunzi wa 2023 wa KCSE na D + na D katika taasisi za TVET.
Luo Translations: E Januar 9, 2024, KUCCPS nochiwo list mar tiegruok mag KCSE mar 2023 kod D + kod D e riwruoge mag TVET.

English: On July 25 2024 Huawei Kenya partnered with the Ministry of Education to launch the Seed for Future program offering ICT training to TVET students.
Swahili Translations: Mnamo Julai 25, 2024 Huawei Kenya ilifanya ushirikiano na Wizara ya Elimu kuzindua mpango wa Mbegu kwa Baadaye kutoa mafunzo ya ICT kwa wanafunzi wa TVET.
Luo Translations: E dwe mar Julai 25, 2024, Huawei Kenya ne oriwore gi Ministry of Education mondo ochak chenro mar Seed for Future mar tiego jopuonjre mag TVET e yore mag ICT.

English: On August 9 2024 KUCCPS reopened its portal for 2023 KCSE candidates to review and revise TVET and university course applications until August 30 2024.
Swahili Translations: Mnamo Agosti 9, 2024 KUCCPS ilifungua tena portal yake kwa wagombea wa 2023 wa KCSE ili kuchunguza na kurekebisha maombi ya masomo ya TVET na chuo kikuu hadi Agosti 30, 2024.
Luo Translations: E Agost 9, 2024, KUCCPS ne odwoko chenro mar yudo joma biro yudo KCSE mar 2023 mondo onon kendo onon kwayo mag somo mag TVET kod yunivasiti nyaka Agost 30, 2024.

English: On February 13 2022 KUCCPS invited KCSE candidates from 2000 to 2021 who missed university admission to apply for TVET courses under government sponsorship with a deadline of February 20 2022.
Swahili Translations: Mnamo Februari 13, 2022 KUCCPS iliwaalika wagombea wa KCSE kutoka 2000 hadi 2021 ambao walikosa kuingia chuo kikuu kuomba kozi za TVET chini ya ufadhili wa serikali na tarehe ya mwisho ya Februari 20, 2022.
Luo Translations: Tarik 13 dwe mar ariyo 2022 KUCCPS ne ogwelo jogo ma ne ok dhi e KCSE chakre higa mar 2000 nyaka 2021 ma ne ok odhi e yunivasiti mondo odhi okonygi e tiegruok mar TVET e bwo pesa ma sirkal chiwo, kendo tarik mogik ne en tarik 20 dwe mar ariyo, 2022.

English: On August 9 2022 KUCCPS released a list of diploma and certificate courses for the September 2023 KMTC intake including entry requirements for 2022 KCSE candidates.
Swahili Translations: Mnamo Agosti 9, 2022 KUCCPS ilitoa orodha ya kozi za diploma na vyeti kwa kuingia kwa KMTC mnamo Septemba 2023, pamoja na mahitaji ya kuingia kwa wagombea wa 2022 wa KCSE.
Luo Translations: E Agost 9, 2022, KUCCPS nochiwo list mar somo mag diploma kod osetifiketi mag KMTC e dwe mar Septemba 2023, kaachiel gi gik madwarore mondo ng'ato odonj e KCSE 2022.

English: On January 10 2023 KMTC announced applications for its March 2023 intake for diploma and certificate courses via the KUCCPS portal with a deadline of January 31 2023.
Swahili Translations: Mnamo Januari 10, 2023, KMTC ilitangaza maombi ya kuingia kwake Machi 2023 kwa kozi za diploma na cheti kupitia portal ya KUCCPS na tarehe ya mwisho ya Januari 31, 2023.
Luo Translations: E Januar 10, 2023, KMTC nolando kwayo mar donjo e dwe mar Mach 2023 e tiegruok mag diploma kod certificate kokalo kuom KUCCPS portal kod tarik mogik mar Januar 31, 2023.

English: On March 15 2024 the Ministry of Education announced recruitment of 2000 TVET trainers to strengthen vocational training programs across Kenya.
Swahili Translations: Mnamo Machi 15, 2024, Wizara ya Elimu ilitangaza kuajiri walimu 2000 wa TVET ili kuimarisha mipango ya mafunzo ya kitaaluma kote Kenya.
Luo Translations: Tarik 15 dwe mar Mach 2024, Ministry of Education nolando ni ibiro ti gi jopuonj 2,000 mag TVET mondo omed jiwo chenro mag tiegruok e piny Kenya.

English: On August 9 2023 KUCCPS opened its portal for 2023 KCSE candidates to apply for degree TVET and TTC programs with a deadline of August 30 2023.
Swahili Translations: Mnamo Agosti 9, 2023 KUCCPS ilifungua portal yake kwa wagombea wa 2023 wa KCSE kuomba kwa programu za shahada za TVET na TTC na tarehe ya mwisho ya Agosti 30, 2023.
Luo Translations: E Agost 9, 2023, KUCCPS ne oyawo ot mar kwayo mag jogo madwaro dhi e KCSE mar 2023 mondo oketgi e program mag digri mag TVET kod TTC, kendo tarik mogik mar tiegruok ne en Agost 30, 2023.

English: On July 20 2023 Huawei Kenya and the Ministry of Education launched the Seed for Future program offering ICT training to 1000 TVET students.
Swahili Translations: Mnamo Julai 20, 2023 Huawei Kenya na Wizara ya Elimu walizindua mpango wa Mbegu kwa Baadaye kutoa mafunzo ya ICT kwa wanafunzi 1000 wa TVET.
Luo Translations: E Julai 20, 2023, Huawei Kenya kod Ministry of Education ne ochako chenro mar Seed for Future mondo otiegie jopuonjre 1000 mag TVET e yore mag ICT.

English: On June 24 2024 KUCCPS announced the opening of its portal for KMTC September 2024 intake for diploma and certificate courses targeting 2023 KCSE candidates.
Swahili Translations: Mnamo Juni 24, 2024 KUCCPS ilitangaza kufungua portal yake kwa ajili ya kuingia kwa KMTC Septemba 2024 kwa kozi za diploma na cheti kwa ajili ya wagombea wa 2023 KCSE.
Luo Translations: E dwe mar Jun 24, 2024, KUCCPS nolando ni biro yawo dhoot mar KMTC e dwe mar Septemba 2024 mondo giyud diplome kod osetifiket mar jogo madwaro dhi e KCSE 2023.

English: On January 16 2024 KUCCPS announced government scholarships for 2023 KCSE students with C- and below to pursue TVET diploma and certificate courses.
Swahili Translations: Mnamo Januari 16, 2024 KUCCPS ilitangaza udhamini wa serikali kwa wanafunzi wa 2023 wa KCSE walio na C- na chini ya hiyo ili kufuata kozi za diploma na cheti cha TVET.
Luo Translations: E Januar 16, 2024, KUCCPS nolando ni nitie riwruok mar sirkal ma chiwo kony ne jopuonjre mag KCSE 2023 ma nigi C- kod matinne mondo oluw somo mag diploma kod TVET.

English: On February 26 2024 KUCCPS listed diploma and certificate courses costing below Ksh 60000 at TVET institutions with an extended application deadline of March 15 2024.
Swahili Translations: Mnamo Februari 26, 2024, KUCCPS iliorodhesha kozi za diploma na vyeti zenye gharama chini ya Ksh 60000 katika taasisi za TVET na tarehe ya mwisho ya maombi iliyoongezwa ya Machi 15, 2024.
Luo Translations: E dwe mar Februar 26, 2024, KUCCPS ne oketo e bwo kwan mag diploma kod osetifiketi ma nengogi ne okalo Ksh 60000 e riwruoge mag TVET, kendo ne omedo tarik mar kwayo mar kwayo mar dhi e skundno tarik 15, Mach 2024.

English: On January 10 2024 KMTC announced applications for its March 2024 intake for medical diploma and certificate courses via the KUCCPS portal closing February 1 2024.
Swahili Translations: Mnamo Januari 10, 2024 KMTC ilitangaza maombi ya kuingia kwake Machi 2024 kwa kozi za diploma na cheti cha matibabu kupitia portal ya KUCCPS kufungwa Februari 1, 2024.
Luo Translations: E Januar 10, 2024 KMTC nolando kwayo mar donjo e dwe mar Mach 2024 mar somo mag diploma kod weche thieth kokalo kuom dhoot mar KUCCPS ma ibiro lor tarik 1, dwe mar ariyo 2024.

English: On May 21 2024 the Ministry of Education released KUCCPS placement results for 890654 2023 KCSE candidates with 769820 placed in TVET programs.
Swahili Translations: Mnamo Mei 21, 2024, Wizara ya Elimu ilitoa matokeo ya nafasi ya KUCCPS kwa wagombea 890654 wa 2023 wa KCSE na 769820 waliwekwa katika programu za TVET.
Luo Translations: E Mei 21, 2024, Ministry of Education ne ochiwo nyak mar KUCCPS ne joma ne dhi dhi yudo kar tiegruok mar KCSE mar 2023 ma romo 890654 kendo ma ne dhi yudo kar tiegruok mar TVET mar 769820.

English: On March 28 2025 KUCCPS opened its portal for 2024 KCSE candidates to apply for degree TVET and TTC programs with a deadline of April 30 2025.
Swahili Translations: Mnamo Machi 28, 2025, KUCCPS ilifungua portal yake kwa wagombea 2024 wa KCSE kuomba kwa programu za shahada za TVET na TTC na tarehe ya mwisho ya Aprili 30, 2025.
Luo Translations: Tarik 28 dwe mar Mach 2025, KUCCPS ne oyawo ot mar kwayo jogo madwaro dhi e KCSE mar 2024 mondo oketgi e program mag digri mag TVET kod TTC, kendo tarik mogik mar tiegruok ne en April 30, 2025.

English: On February 26 2025 KUCCPS reopened its portal for students to apply for 26 KMTC programs for the March 2025 intake with a deadline of March 15 2025.
Swahili Translations: Mnamo Februari 26, 2025, KUCCPS ilifungua tena portal yake kwa wanafunzi kuomba programu 26 za KMTC kwa ajili ya kuingia Machi 2025, na tarehe ya mwisho ya Machi 15, 2025.
Luo Translations: E dwe mar ariyo tarik 26, 2025, KUCCPS ne odwoko chenro mar somo mar KMTC ne jopuonjre mondo oketgi e program mar 26 mar KMTC mar Donjo e dwe mar adek tarik 15, 2025.

English: On May 18 2025 KUCCPS opened its portal for course revision for 2025/2026 placement targeting 2024 KCSE candidates and past candidates from 2000 to 2024 for TVET programs.
Swahili Translations: Mnamo Mei 18, 2025, KUCCPS ilifungua portal yake ya marekebisho ya kozi kwa ajili ya nafasi za 2025/2026 ambazo zinawalenga wagombea 2024 wa KCSE na wagombea wa zamani kutoka 2000 hadi 2024 kwa programu za TVET.
Luo Translations: E Mei 18, 2025, KUCCPS ne oyawo chenro mar tiego ji e tiegruok mar tiegruok mar tich mar 2025/2026 ma ne dhi konyo joma ne dhi dhi yudo KCSE 2024 kod joma ne dhi yudo tiegruok e tiegruok mag TVET chakre higa mar 2000 nyaka 2024.

English: On July 27 2025 Deputy President Kithure Kindiki announced that TVET enrollment doubled from 297000 in 2022 to over 700000 due to government investment.
Swahili Translations: Mnamo Julai 27, 2025, Makamu wa Rais Kithure Kindiki alitangaza kuwa usajili wa TVET uliongezeka mara mbili kutoka 297000 mnamo 2022 hadi zaidi ya 700000 kwa sababu ya uwekezaji wa serikali.
Luo Translations: E dwe mar Julai 27, 2025, Jatend Bura Maduong' mar piny Kenya, Kithure Kindiki, nolando ni kwan mar joma nie program mar TVET osemedore nyadiriyo kowuok 297,000 e higa mar 2022 nyaka mokalo 700,000 nikech pesa ma sirkal osetimo.

English: On March 5 2019 KUCCPS announced artisan certificate courses for 2018 KCSE candidates with D- and below at TVET institutions with applications open until April 15 2019.
Swahili Translations: Mnamo Machi 5, 2019, KUCCPS ilitangaza kozi za vyeti vya ufundi kwa wagombea wa KCSE 2018 walio na D- na chini katika taasisi za TVET na maombi yamefunguliwa hadi Aprili 15, 2019.
Luo Translations: E Mach 5, 2019, KUCCPS nolando ni nitie tiegruok mag tich ma biro konyo joma dhi e KCSE 2018 ma nigi D- kod Minyalo e skunde mag TVET kendo kwayo mag tiegruok oseyawore nyaka April 15, 2019.

English: On June 12 2018 the Ministry of Education launched a program to expand TVET facilities to increase enrollment in technical courses across Kenya.
Swahili Translations: Mnamo Juni 12, 2018, Wizara ya Elimu ilizindua mpango wa kupanua vifaa vya TVET ili kuongeza usajili katika kozi za kiufundi kote Kenya.
Luo Translations: Tarik 12 dwe mar Jun, 2018, Ministry of Education nochako chenro mar medo chenro mar TVET mondo omed kwan mar joma dhi e tiegruok mag teknoloji e piny Kenya.

English: On May 15 2017 KMTC announced applications for its September 2017 intake for diploma and certificate courses via the KUCCPS portal closing June 30 2017.
Swahili Translations: Mnamo Mei 15, 2017, KMTC ilitangaza maombi ya kuingia kwake mnamo Septemba 2017 kwa kozi za diploma na cheti kupitia portal ya KUCCPS kufungwa Juni 30, 2017.
Luo Translations: E Mei 15, 2017, KMTC nolando kwayo mar donjo e dwe mar Septemba 2017 e tiegruok mag diploma kod certificate kokalo kuom KUCCPS portal ma ne olor tarik 30, Jun 2017.

English: On April 20 2016 KUCCPS opened its portal for 2015 KCSE candidates to apply for TVET diploma and certificate courses with a deadline of May 31 2016.
Swahili Translations: Mnamo Aprili 20, 2016 KUCCPS ilifungua portal yake kwa wagombea wa KCSE 2015 kuomba diploma na kozi za cheti cha TVET na tarehe ya mwisho ya Mei 31, 2016.
Luo Translations: E April 20, 2016, KUCCPS ne oyawo ot mar kwayo joma ne dhi dhi e KCSE 2015 mondo okwa diploma kod tiegruok mag TVET kod tarik mogik mar Mei 31, 2016.

English: On August 10 2015 the Ministry of Education announced recruitment of 5000 vocational teachers to support TVET institutions across Kenya.
Swahili Translations: Mnamo Agosti 10, 2015, Wizara ya Elimu ilitangaza kuajiri walimu 5000 wa kitaaluma kusaidia taasisi za TVET kote Kenya.
Luo Translations: E dwe mar Agost 10, 2015, Ministry of Education nolando ni ibiro ti gi jopuonj 5,000 e konyo riwruoge mag TVET e piny Kenya.

English: On March 15 2021 KUCCPS opened its portal for 2020 KCSE candidates and past candidates from 2000 to 2020 to apply for TVET diploma and certificate courses closing April 30 2021.
Swahili Translations: Mnamo Machi 15, 2021, KUCCPS ilifungua portal yake kwa wagombea 2020 wa KCSE na wagombea wa zamani kutoka 2000 hadi 2020 kuomba diploma na kozi za cheti za TVET ambazo zitafungwa Aprili 30, 2021.
Luo Translations: Tarik 15 dwe mar Mach 2021, KUCCPS ne oyawo ot mar kwayo mag KCSE 2020 kod mag joma ne dhi bedo e KCSE chakre higa mar 2000 nyaka 2020 mondo giketgi e tiegruok mar yudo diploma kod tiegruok mag TVET ma ibiro lor April 30, 2021.

English: On May 10 2016 KMTC announced applications for its September 2016 intake for medical diploma and certificate courses via the KUCCPS portal with a deadline of June 30 2016.
Swahili Translations: Mnamo Mei 10, 2016, KMTC ilitangaza maombi ya kuingia kwake mnamo Septemba 2016 kwa kozi za diploma na vyeti vya matibabu kupitia portal ya KUCCPS na tarehe ya mwisho ya Juni 30, 2016.
Luo Translations: E Mei 10, 2016, KMTC nolando kwayo mar donjo e dwe mar Septemba 2016 e tiegruok mag diploma kod weche thieth kokalo kuom dhoot mar KUCCPS kendo tarik mar giko mar dwe mar Jun 30, 2016.

English: On July 20 2017 the Ministry of Education launched a program to equip 10 TVET institutions with modern tools to enhance vocational training across Kenya.
Swahili Translations: Mnamo Julai 20, 2017, Wizara ya Elimu ilizindua mpango wa kuwapa taasisi 10 za Elimu ya Televisheni vifaa vya kisasa vya kuboresha mafunzo ya kitaaluma nchini Kenya.
Luo Translations: E Julai 20, 2017, Ministry of Education nochako chenro mar chiwo gik manyien ne tiegruok mag televison e pinje apar e piny Kenya.

English: On April 10 2018 KUCCPS announced artisan certificate courses for 2017 KCSE candidates with D- and below at TVET institutions with applications open until May 15 2018.
Swahili Translations: Mnamo Aprili 10, 2018, KUCCPS ilitangaza kozi za vyeti vya ufundi kwa wagombea wa KCSE 2017 walio na D- na chini katika taasisi za TVET na maombi yamefunguliwa hadi Mei 15, 2018.
Luo Translations: E April 10, 2018, KUCCPS nolando ni nitie tiegruok mag tich ma biro konyo joma dhi e KCSE 2017 ma nigi D- kod Minyalo e skunde mag TVET kendo kwayo mag tiegruok oseyawore nyaka Mei 15, 2018.

English: On June 15 2019 the Ministry of Education announced recruitment of 3000 vocational teachers to support TVET programs across Kenya.
Swahili Translations: Mnamo Juni 15, 2019, Wizara ya Elimu ilitangaza kuajiri walimu wa kitaaluma 3000 kusaidia mipango ya TVET kote Kenya.
Luo Translations: Tarik 15 Jun 2019, Ministry of Education nolando ni ibiro ti gi jopuonj 3000 e konyo chenro mag TVET e piny Kenya.

English: On August 25 2020 KUCCPS released placement results for 2019 KCSE candidates with 125000 placed in TVET diploma and certificate courses.
Swahili Translations: Mnamo Agosti 25, 2020, KUCCPS ilitoa matokeo ya kuajiri kwa wagombea wa KCSE wa 2019 na 125000 waliwekwa katika kozi za diploma na cheti cha TVET.
Luo Translations: E Agost 25, 2020, KUCCPS nochiwo nonro mar joma ne dhi dhi yudo KCSE e higa mar 2019 kendo ji 125,000 ne omi thuolo mar dhi e tiegruok mag diploma kod TVET.

English: On January 15 2021 KMTC announced applications for its March 2021 intake for medical diploma and certificate courses via the KUCCPS portal closing February 28 2021.
Swahili Translations: Mnamo Januari 15, 2021, KMTC ilitangaza maombi ya kuingia kwake mnamo Machi 2021 kwa kozi za diploma na cheti cha matibabu kupitia portal ya KUCCPS kufungwa Februari 28, 2021.
Luo Translations: E Januar 15, 2021, KMTC nolando kwayo mar donjo e dwe mar Mach 2021 e somo mag diploma kod weche thieth kokalo kuom dhoot mar KUCCPS ma ibiro lor tarik 28, 2021.

English: On January 20 2022 KUCCPS announced applications for TVET courses for 2021 KCSE candidates and past candidates from 2000 to 2021 with a deadline of February 15 2022.
Swahili Translations: Mnamo Januari 20, 2022 KUCCPS ilitangaza maombi ya kozi za TVET kwa wagombea 2021 wa KCSE na wagombea wa zamani kutoka 2000 hadi 2021 na tarehe ya mwisho ya Februari 15, 2022.
Luo Translations: E Januar 20, 2022 KUCCPS nolando kwayo mag tiegruok mag TVET ne joma ne dhi dhi yudo KCSE 2021 kod joma ne dhi yudo tiegruok machon chakre higa mar 2000 nyaka 2021 kendo tarik mogik ne en Februar 15, 2022.

English: On September 10 2022 the Ministry of Education partnered with Huawei to launch digital skills training for 5000 TVET students across Kenya.
Swahili Translations: Mnamo Septemba 10, 2022, Wizara ya Elimu ilishirikiana na Huawei kuzindua mafunzo ya ujuzi wa dijiti kwa wanafunzi 5000 wa TVET kote Kenya.
Luo Translations: E Septemba 10, 2022, Ministry of Education noriwore gi Huawei e chako tiego jopuonjre 5000 mag TVET e piny Kenya duto.

English: On February 10 2023 KUCCPS opened its portal for 2022 KCSE candidates to apply for degree TVET and TTC programs with a deadline of March 20 2023.
Swahili Translations: Mnamo Februari 10, 2023, KUCCPS ilifungua portal yake kwa wagombea 2022 wa KCSE kuomba kwa programu za shahada za TVET na TTC na tarehe ya mwisho ya Machi 20, 2023.
Luo Translations: E dwe mar Februar 10, 2023, KUCCPS ne oyawo ot mar kwayo mar joma biro yudo KCSE mar 2022 mondo oketgi e program mag digri mag TVET kod TTC, kendo tarik mogik en Mach 20, 2023.

English: On June 15 2023 KMTC announced applications for its September 2023 intake for diploma and certificate courses via the KUCCPS portal closing July 31 2023.
Swahili Translations: Mnamo Juni 15, 2023 KMTC ilitangaza maombi ya kuingia kwake mnamo Septemba 2023 kwa kozi za diploma na cheti kupitia portal ya KUCCPS kufungwa Julai 31, 2023.
Luo Translations: E Jun 15, 2023, KMTC nolando kwayo mar donjo e dwe mar Septemba 2023 e tiegruok mag diploma kod certificate kokalo kuom KUCCPS portal ma ibiro lor tarik 31, 2023.

English: On April 20 2023 the Ministry of Education announced recruitment of 1500 TVET trainers to enhance vocational training programs across Kenya.
Swahili Translations: Mnamo Aprili 20, 2023 Wizara ya Elimu ilitangaza kuajiri walimu 1500 wa TVET ili kuongeza mipango ya mafunzo ya kitaaluma kote Kenya.
Luo Translations: E April 20, 2023, Ministry of Education nolando ni ibiro ti gi jopuonj 1500 mag TVET mondo omed tiego jopuonj e piny Kenya duto.

English: On January 9 2024 KUCCPS released a list of approved certificate courses for 2023 KCSE students with D+ and below at TVET institutions.
Swahili Translations: Mnamo Januari 9, 2024, KUCCPS ilitoa orodha ya kozi za vyeti vilivyokubaliwa kwa wanafunzi wa 2023 wa KCSE walio na D + na chini katika taasisi za TVET.
Luo Translations: E Januar 9, 2024, KUCCPS nochiwo list mar tiegruok mag yudo oseti kod weche mag tiegruok ma ne oyie ne jopuonjre mag KCSE 2023 ma nigi D + kod matin e skunde mag TVET.

English: On January 20 2025 KMTC announced applications for its March 2025 intake for medical diploma and certificate courses via the KUCCPS portal closing February 28 2025.
Swahili Translations: Mnamo Januari 20, 2025, KMTC ilitangaza maombi ya kuingia kwake Machi 2025 kwa kozi za diploma na cheti cha matibabu kupitia portal ya KUCCPS kufungwa Februari 28, 2025.
Luo Translations: E Januar 20, 2025, KMTC nolando kwayo mar donjo e dwe mar Mach 2025 mar somo mag diploma kod weche thieth kokalo kuom dhoot mar KUCCPS ma ibiro lor tarik 28, 2025.

English: On May 21 2024 KUCCPS released placement results for 2023 KCSE candidates with 769820 placed in TVET programs across Kenya.
Swahili Translations: Mnamo Mei 21, 2024 KUCCPS ilitoa matokeo ya kuajiri kwa wagombea wa 2023 wa KCSE na 769820 waliwekwa katika programu za TVET kote Kenya.
Luo Translations: E Mei 21, 2024, KUCCPS nochiwo nonro mar joma ne dhi dhi yudo KCSE e higa mar 2023 kendo 769820 ne omi thuolo mar dhi e program mag TVET e piny Kenya.

English: On December 9 2020 the Ministry of Education launched a project to equip 12 TVET institutions with modern labs under the AfDB TVET Phase II project.
Swahili Translations: Mnamo Desemba 9, 2020, Wizara ya Elimu ilizindua mradi wa kuwapa taasisi 12 za TVET maabara za kisasa chini ya mradi wa Awamu ya Pili ya AfDB TVET.
Luo Translations: E dwe mar Desemba 9, 2020, Ministry of Education ne ochako chenro mar chiwo laboratori mag teknoloji ne skunde 12 mag TVET e bwo chenro mar AfDB TVET Phase 2.

English: On July 14 2025 KUCCPS announced the opening of its portal for inter-institutional transfers for 2025/2026 placements targeting TVET and university students.
Swahili Translations: Mnamo Julai 14, 2025, KUCCPS ilitangaza kufunguliwa kwa portal yake ya uhamisho wa kati ya taasisi kwa ajili ya uhamisho wa 2025/2026 kwa wanafunzi wa TVET na vyuo vikuu.
Luo Translations: E dwe mar Julai 14, 2025, KUCCPS nolando ni ibiro yaw chenro mar somo e kind skunde mag TVET kod yunivasiti e higa mar 2025/2026.

English: On June 11 2019 the Kenya Institute of Curriculum Development announced reforms to TVET curricula to align with industry needs for 2019/2020.
Swahili Translations: Mnamo Juni 11, 2019, Taasisi ya Maendeleo ya Mafunzo ya Kenya ilitangaza mageuzi ya programu za masomo ya TVET ili kuendana na mahitaji ya tasnia kwa 2019/2020.
Luo Translations: Tarik 11 Jun, 2019, Kenya Institute for Training Development nolando lokruok e program mag somo mag TVET mondo omed chopo dwaro mag ohala e higa mar 2019/2020.

English: On May 5 2015 KUCCPS opened its portal for 2014 KCSE candidates to apply for TVET diploma and certificate courses with a deadline of June 15 2015.
Swahili Translations: Mnamo Mei 5, 2015, KUCCPS ilifungua portal yake kwa wagombea wa KCSE 2014 kuomba diploma na kozi za cheti cha TVET na tarehe ya mwisho ya Juni 15, 2015.
Luo Translations: E Mei 5, 2015, KUCCPS ne oyawo websaitne ne joma ne dhi dhi yudo KCSE 2014 mondo okwa diploma kod tiegruok mag TVET kod tarik mogik mar Jun 15, 2015.

English: On August 15 2016 the Ministry of Education announced revitalization of youth polytechnics to enhance vocational training access across Kenya.
Swahili Translations: Mnamo Agosti 15, 2016, Wizara ya Elimu ilitangaza kuhamasisha shule za vijana za polytechnics ili kuongeza upatikanaji wa mafunzo ya kitaaluma kote Kenya.
Luo Translations: E Agost 15, 2016, Ministry of Education nolando ni ibiro jiwo rowere ma dhi e skunde mag polytechnics mondo omed yudo tiegruok e piny Kenya.

English: On July 20 2015 KUCCPS released placement results for 2014 KCSE candidates with 67231 placed in TVET diploma and certificate courses across Kenya.
Swahili Translations: Mnamo Julai 20, 2015 KUCCPS ilitoa matokeo ya nafasi kwa wagombea wa KCSE 2014 na 67231 waliwekwa katika kozi za diploma na cheti cha TVET kote Kenya.
Luo Translations: E Julai 20, 2015, KUCCPS nochiwo nyak mar thuolo ne joma ne dhi yudo KCSE 2014 kendo 67231 ne omi thuolo mar dhi e tiegruok mag diploma kod TVET e piny Kenya.

English: On May 15 2015 KMTC announced applications for its September 2015 intake for medical diploma and certificate courses via the KUCCPS portal closing June 30 2015.
Swahili Translations: Mnamo Mei 15, 2015, KMTC ilitangaza maombi ya kuingia kwake mnamo Septemba 2015 kwa kozi za diploma na vyeti vya matibabu kupitia portal ya KUCCPS kufungwa Juni 30, 2015.
Luo Translations: E Mei 15, 2015, KMTC nolando kwayo mar donjo e dwe mar Septemba 2015 e somo mag diploma kod weche thieth kokalo kuom dhoot mar KUCCPS ma ne olor tarik 30, Jun 2015.

English: On September 10 2017 the Ministry of Education announced plans to upgrade 15 youth polytechnics to enhance vocational training access across Kenya.
Swahili Translations: Mnamo Septemba 10, 2017, Wizara ya Elimu ilitangaza mipango ya kuboresha shule 15 za vijana ili kuongeza upatikanaji wa mafunzo ya kitaaluma nchini Kenya.
Luo Translations: E Septemba 10, 2017, Ministry of Education nolando chenro mar loso skunde 15 mag rowere mondo omi rowere mang'eny e piny Kenya oyud tiegruok momedore.

English: On April 15 2016 KUCCPS announced artisan certificate courses for 2015 KCSE candidates with D- and below at TVET institutions with applications open until May 31 2016.
Swahili Translations: Mnamo Aprili 15, 2016 KUCCPS ilitangaza kozi za vyeti vya ufundi kwa wagombea wa KCSE 2015 wenye D- na chini katika taasisi za TVET na maombi yamefunguliwa hadi Mei 31, 2016.
Luo Translations: E April 15, 2016, KUCCPS nolando ni joma dhi e KCSE 2015 ma nigi D- kod matin e skunde mag TVET biro yudo tiegruok mag tich ma biro konyogi e weche mag tiegruok nyaka Mei 31, 2016.

English: On May 20 2018 the Ministry of Education announced recruitment of 2500 TVET trainers to support vocational training programs across Kenya.
Swahili Translations: Mnamo Mei 20, 2018, Wizara ya Elimu ilitangaza kuajiri walimu 2500 wa TVET kusaidia mipango ya mafunzo ya kitaaluma kote Kenya.
Luo Translations: E Mei 20, 2018, Ministry of Education nolando ni ibiro ti gi jopuonj 2500 mag TVET e konyo chenro mag tiegruok e piny Kenya.

English: On March 10 2019 KUCCPS opened its portal for 2018 KCSE candidates and past candidates from 2000 to 2018 to apply for TVET courses closing April 30 2019.
Swahili Translations: Mnamo Machi 10, 2019, KUCCPS ilifungua portal yake kwa wagombea 2018 wa KCSE na wagombea wa zamani kutoka 2000 hadi 2018 kuomba kozi za TVET ambazo zitafungwa Aprili 30, 2019.
Luo Translations: Tarik 10 dwe mar Mach 2019, KUCCPS ne oyawo ot mar kwayo joma ne dhi dhi yudo KCSE 2018 kod joma ne dhi yudo tiegruok e kind higa mar 2000 nyaka 2018 mondo oketgi e tiegruok mag TVET ma ibiro lor April 30, 2019.

English: On January 10 2020 KMTC announced applications for its March 2020 intake for medical diploma and certificate courses via the KUCCPS portal closing February 15 2020.
Swahili Translations: Mnamo Januari 10, 2020, KMTC ilitangaza maombi ya kuingia kwake mnamo Machi 2020 kwa kozi za diploma na cheti cha matibabu kupitia portal ya KUCCPS kufungwa Februari 15, 2020.
Luo Translations: E Januar 10, 2020, KMTC nolando kwayo mar donjo e dwe mar Mach 2020 e somo mag diploma kod weche thieth kokalo kuom dhoot mar KUCCPS ma ne olor tarik 15, Februar 2020.

Swahili Translations: Mnamo Agosti 15, 2021, Wizara ya Elimu ilishirikiana na Cisco kuzindua mafunzo ya ujuzi wa dijiti kwa wanafunzi 3000 wa TVET kote Kenya.
Luo Translations: E Agost 15, 2021, Ministry of Education noriwore gi Cisco e chako tiego jopuonjre 3000 mag TVET e piny Kenya duto.

English: On September 10 2021 KUCCPS released placement results for 2020 KCSE candidates with 130000 placed in TVET diploma and certificate courses.

Swahili Translations: Mnamo Januari 15, 2023 KMTC ilitangaza maombi ya kuingia kwake Machi 2023 kwa kozi za diploma na cheti cha matibabu kupitia portal ya KUCCPS kufungwa Februari 28, 2023.

English: On March 10 2024 KUCCPS opened its portal for 2023 KCSE candidates to apply for TVET diploma and certificate courses with a deadline of April 15 2024.
Swahili Translations: Mnamo Machi 10, 2024, KUCCPS ilifungua portal yake kwa wagombea 2023 wa KCSE kuomba diploma na kozi za cheti za TVET na tarehe ya mwisho ya Aprili 15, 2024.

Swahili Translations: Mnamo Aprili 18, 2025, KUCCPS ilifungua tena portal yake kwa wanafunzi kuomba programu 26 za KMTC kwa ajili ya kuingia Machi 2025, na tarehe ya mwisho ya Aprili 30, 2025.

Swahili Translations: Mnamo Mei 18, 2025, KUCCPS ilifungua portal yake ya marekebisho ya kozi kwa ajili ya nafasi za 2025/2026 ambazo zinawalenga wagombea 2024 wa KCSE na wagombea wa zamani kutoka 2000 hadi 2024.
Luo Translations: E Mei 18, 2025, KUCCPS ne oyawo chenro mar tiego ji e tiegruok mar tich mar 2025/2026 ma ne dhi konyo joma ne dhi dhi yudo somo mar KCSE e higni 2024 kod joma ne dhi yudo somo e higni mag 2000 nyaka 2024.

English: KUCCPS released placement results for 2014 KCSE candidates with 67231 students placed in TVET diploma and certificate courses across Kenya.
Swahili Translations: KUCCPS ilitoa matokeo ya nafasi kwa wagombea wa KCSE 2014 na wanafunzi 67231 waliojitolea katika kozi za diploma na cheti cha TVET kote Kenya.

Luo Translations: KMTC ne okwayo mondo okony ji e tiegruok mag diploma kod weche thieth e dwe mar Septemba 2015 kokalo kuom KUCCPS kod tarik mogik mar dwe mar Jun 30, 2015.

Swahili Translations: Wizara ya Elimu ilitangaza kuboresha shule 10 za vijana ili kuongeza upatikanaji wa mafunzo ya kitaaluma nchini Kenya.
Luo Translations: Ofis mar Puonjruok ne olando ni ibiro med skul apar mag rowere mondo omi rowere mang'eny oyud tiegruok e piny Kenya.
