English: KMTC invited applications for its September 2023 intake for medical diploma and certificate courses via the KUCCPS portal closing July 31 2023.
Swahili Translations: KMTC iliomba maombi ya kuingia kwake mnamo Septemba 2023 kwa kozi za diploma na cheti cha matibabu kupitia portal ya KUCCPS kufungwa Julai 31, 2023.
Luo Translations: KMTC ne okwayo mondo odonj e dwe mar Septemba 2023 mondo giyud diploma kod oseti mar thieth kokalo kuom KUCCPS portal ma ne olor tarik 31, Julai 2023.

English: The Ministry of Education announced recruitment of 1500 TVET trainers to enhance vocational training programs across Kenya.
Swahili Translations: Wizara ya Elimu ilitangaza kuajiri walimu 1500 wa TVET ili kuongeza mipango ya mafunzo ya kitaaluma nchini Kenya.
Luo Translations: Ofis mar Puonjruok ne olando ni ibiro ti gi jopuonj 1500 e TVET mondo omed tiego jopuonj e piny Kenya.

English: KUCCPS released a list of approved certificate courses for 2023 KCSE students with D+ and below at TVET institutions.
Swahili Translations: KUCCPS ilitoa orodha ya kozi za vyeti vilivyokubaliwa kwa wanafunzi wa 2023 wa KCSE walio na D + na chini katika taasisi za TVET.
Luo Translations: KUCCPS nochiwo list mar tiegruok mag tiegruok ma ne oyie ne jopuonjre mag KCSE 2023 ma nigi D + kod matin e tige mag TVET.

English: KUCCPS announced the opening of its portal for inter-institutional transfers for 2025/2026 placements targeting TVET and university students.
Swahili Translations: KUCCPS ilitangaza kufunguliwa kwa portal yake kwa ajili ya uhamisho wa kati ya taasisi kwa ajili ya kazi za muda wa 2025/2026 zinazolenga wanafunzi wa TVET na vyuo vikuu.
Luo Translations: KUCCPS ne olando ni koro oseyawo chenro mar kwayo joma biro dhi e skul e kind higni mag 2025/2026 mondo oti gi thuolo mar tiegruok e kind jopuonjre mag TVET kod yunivasiti.

English: KUCCPS released placement results for 2015 KCSE candidates placing 74320 students in TVET diploma and certificate courses across Kenya.
Swahili Translations: KUCCPS ilitoa matokeo ya nafasi kwa wagombea wa KCSE wa 2015 ambao waliweka wanafunzi 74320 katika kozi za diploma na cheti cha TVET kote Kenya.
Luo Translations: KUCCPS ne ochiwo nyak mar thuolo ne jogo ma ne dhi yudo KCSE e higa mar 2015 ma ne oketo jopuonjre 74320 e tiegruok mag diploma kod TVET e piny Kenya duto.

English: KMTC invited applications for its September 2016 intake for medical diploma and certificate courses through the KUCCPS portal with a deadline of July 15 2016.
Swahili Translations: KMTC iliomba maombi ya kuingia kwa Septemba 2016 kwa ajili ya mafunzo ya diploma ya matibabu na vyeti kupitia portal ya KUCCPS na tarehe ya mwisho ya Julai 15, 2016.
Luo Translations: KMTC ne okwayo mondo odonj e tiegruok mar thieth kod yudo diploma e dwe mar Septemba 2016 kokalo kuom KUCCPS kod tarik mogik mar Julai 15, 2016.

English: The Ministry of Education upgraded 12 youth polytechnics to enhance access to vocational training programs across Kenya.
Swahili Translations: Wizara ya Elimu iliboresha shule 12 za vijana ili kuongeza upatikanaji wa programu za mafunzo ya kitaaluma nchini Kenya.
Luo Translations: Ofis mar Puonjruok e piny Kenya, ne oloso skunde 12 mag rowere mondo omi giyud thuolo mar tiego rowere e weche mag somo.

English: KUCCPS opened applications for artisan certificate courses for 2016 KCSE candidates with D- and below at TVET institutions closing May 31 2017.
Swahili Translations: KUCCPS ilifungua maombi ya kozi za vyeti vya ufundi kwa wagombea wa 2016 wa KCSE wenye D- na chini katika taasisi za TVET zilizofungwa Mei 31, 2017.
Luo Translations: KUCCPS ne oyawo kwayo mar somo mag weche mag tiegruok ne jogo ma ne dhi yudo KCSE mar 2016 ka gin gi D- kod matin e riwruoge mag TVET ma ne olor tarik 31, Mei 2017.

English: The Ministry of Education recruited 2500 TVET trainers to support vocational training programs across Kenya.
Swahili Translations: Wizara ya Elimu imeajiri walimu 2500 wa TVET kusaidia mipango ya mafunzo ya kitaaluma kote Kenya.
Luo Translations: Ministry of Education oseyudo jopuonj 2500 mag TVET mondo okony e tiego jopuonj e piny Kenya duto.

English: KMTC invited applications for its March 2019 intake for medical diploma and certificate courses via the KUCCPS portal closing February 28 2019.
Swahili Translations: KMTC iliomba maombi ya kuingia kwa Machi 2019 kwa kozi za diploma na cheti cha matibabu kupitia portal ya KUCCPS kufungwa Februari 28, 2019.
Luo Translations: KMTC ne okwayo mondo okony ji donjo e dwe mar Mach 2019 e somo mag diploma kod weche thieth kokalo kuom dhoot mar KUCCPS ma ne olor tarik 28, Februar 2019.

English: KUCCPS released placement results for 2018 KCSE candidates placing 105000 students in TVET diploma and certificate courses across Kenya.
Swahili Translations: KUCCPS ilitoa matokeo ya nafasi kwa wagombea wa KCSE wa 2018 ambao waliweka wanafunzi 105000 katika kozi za diploma na cheti cha TVET kote Kenya.

English: The Kenya Institute of Curriculum Development revised TVET curricula to align with industry needs for the 2019/2020 academic year.
Swahili Translations: Taasisi ya Kenya ya Maendeleo ya Mafunzo ilibadilisha programu za masomo za TVET ili kuendana na mahitaji ya tasnia kwa mwaka wa masomo wa 2019/2020.
Luo Translations: Kenya Institute for Training Development oseloso chenro mag somo mag TVET mondo oluw dwaro mag ohala e higa mar somo mar 2019/2020.

Swahili Translations: KUCCPS imefungua portal yake kwa wagombea wa KCSE 2019 kuomba diploma na kozi za cheti za TVET na tarehe ya mwisho ya Aprili 30, 2020.
Luo Translations: KUCCPS oseyawo dhoot mar kwayo joma dhi e KCSE 2019 mondo okwa diploma kod tiegruok mag TVET gi giko tarik 30, April 2020.

Swahili Translations: KUCCPS ilifungua portal yake kwa marekebisho ya kozi kwa ajili ya nafasi za 2024/2025 ambazo zinawakilisha wagombea 2023 wa KCSE na wagombea wa zamani kutoka 2000 hadi 2023.
Luo Translations: KUCCPS oseyawo dhoot mar tiegruok mar tiegruok mar tiegruok mar tich mar 2024/2025 ma ochung' ne joma biro yudo thuolo mar tiegruok mar KCSE 2023 kod joma nosetieko tiegruok mar KCSE chakre higa mar 2000 nyaka 2023.

English: TVETA reported a 10.4 percent increase in TVET enrollment to 709885 students with Eldoret National Polytechnic leading at 7.9 percent.
Swahili Translations: TVETA iliripoti ongezeko la asilimia 10.4 la usajili wa TVET kwa wanafunzi 70,9885 na Eldoret National Polytechnic inaongoza kwa asilimia 7.9.
Luo Translations: TVETA nowacho ni kwan mar jopuonjre ma ne dhi e skundno nomedore gi pasent 10.4 kuom jopuonjre 70,9885 to Eldoret National Polytechnic ne otelo gi pasent 7.9.

English: KUCCPS opened its portal for 2023 KCSE candidates to apply for Teacher Training College diploma programs with a deadline of April 21 2024.
Swahili Translations: KUCCPS imefungua portal yake kwa wagombea 2023 wa KCSE kuomba programu za diploma za Chuo cha Mafunzo ya Walimu na tarehe ya mwisho ya Aprili 21, 2024.
Luo Translations: KUCCPS oseyawo dhoot mar kwayo jogo madwaro dhi e KCSE 2023 mondo okonygi e kwayo mag diploma mag Teacher Training College, kendo mano biro timore tarik 21 dwe mar April 2024.

English: The Ministry of Education rolled out the Competency-Based Education and Training curriculum in TVET institutions to enhance practical skills.
Swahili Translations: Wizara ya Elimu ilizindua programu ya Elimu na Mafunzo ya Ufanisi katika taasisi za Elimu ya Televisheni ili kuongeza ujuzi wa vitendo.
Luo Translations: Ofis mar Puonjruok nochako chenro mar Puonjo e Tuke mag Televisheni mondo okony ji obed gi lony.

English: KMTC invited applications for its September 2024 intake for medical diploma and certificate courses via the KUCCPS portal closing July 31 2024.
Swahili Translations: KMTC iliomba maombi ya kuingia kwake mnamo Septemba 2024 kwa kozi za diploma na vyeti vya matibabu kupitia portal ya KUCCPS kufungwa Julai 31, 2024.
Luo Translations: KMTC ne okwayo mondo odonj e dwe mar Septemba 2024 mondo giyud diplome kod weche thieth kokalo kuom KUCCPS portal ma ne olor tarik 31 dwe mar Julai 2024.

English: KUCCPS placed 246391 students from the 2023 KCSE cohort in TVET and university programs across Kenyan institutions.
Swahili Translations: KUCCPS iliweka wanafunzi 246391 kutoka kwa kundi la 2023 KCSE katika programu za TVET na vyuo vikuu katika taasisi za Kenya.
Luo Translations: KUCCPS ne oketo jopuonjre 246391 e klas mar 2023 KCSE e program mag TVET kod e yunivasiti e Kenya.

English: The Ministry of Education promoted maritime courses in TVET institutions to support the Blue Economy and address unemployment.
Swahili Translations: Wizara ya Elimu iliendeleza kozi za baharini katika taasisi za Elimu ya Televisheni kusaidia uchumi wa bluu na kukabiliana na ukosefu wa ajira.
Luo Translations: Ofis mar Puonjruok ne ochako tiego ji e pinje mamoko e ute mag tiego ji e televison mondo okony piny obed gi ngima maber kendo mondo okonygi loyo pek mag yuto.

English: KUCCPS opened its portal for a second course revision for 2024/2025 placement targeting 2023 KCSE candidates with a deadline of June 15 2024.
Swahili Translations: KUCCPS ilifungua portal yake kwa marekebisho ya pili ya kozi kwa ajili ya nafasi ya 2024/2025 kwa walengwa 2023 KCSE na tarehe ya mwisho ya Juni 15, 2024.
Luo Translations: KUCCPS oseyawo dhoot mar somo mar ariyo mar somo mar 2024/2025 ne jopuonjre 2023 KCSE kod giko tarik 15 dwe mar Jun 2024.

English: The Ministry of Education elevated 19 TVET colleges to national polytechnic status to enhance vocational training capacity.
Swahili Translations: Wizara ya Elimu imeongeza nafasi ya vyuo 19 vya elimu ya juu ya kitaifa kuwa vyuo vikuu vya kitaifa vya kiufundi ili kuongeza uwezo wa mafunzo ya kitaaluma.
Luo Translations: Ministry of Education osechiwo chenro mar loso skunde 19 mag tiegruok e piny mangima obed skunde mag tiegruok mag teknoloji mondo omi tiegruok obed mayot.

English: KMTC invited applications for its March 2025 intake for medical diploma and certificate courses via the KUCCPS portal closing February 28 2025.
Swahili Translations: KMTC iliomba maombi ya kuingia kwake Machi 2025 kwa digrii za matibabu na kozi za cheti kupitia portal ya KUCCPS kufungwa Februari 28, 2025.
Luo Translations: KMTC ne okwayo mondo oket kwayo mar donjo e dwe mar Mach 2025 e weche thieth kod somo mar chati kokalo kuom KUCCPS portal ma ne olor tarik 28, Februar 2025.

English: KUCCPS opened its portal for 2024 KCSE candidates to apply for TVET diploma and certificate courses with a deadline of April 21 2025.
Swahili Translations: KUCCPS imefungua portal yake kwa wagombea 2024 wa KCSE kuomba diploma na kozi za cheti cha TVET na tarehe ya mwisho ya Aprili 21, 2025.
Luo Translations: KUCCPS oseyawo dhoot mar kwayo jogo madwaro dhi e KCSE 2024 mondo oketgi e tiegruok mar TVET kod tiegruok mar yudo diploma kod tich mar tich ma ibiro tim April 21, 2025.

English: The Ministry of Education increased funding for TVET institutions to support 2 million youth enrollments by the end of 2025.
Swahili Translations: Wizara ya Elimu imeongeza fedha kwa taasisi za Elimu ya Televisheni kusaidia uandikishaji wa vijana milioni 2 ifikapo mwisho wa 2025.
Luo Translations: Ministry of Education osechiwo pesa momedore ne chenro mag somo e televison mondo okony joma tindo ma dirom milion 2 e higa mar 2025.

English: KUCCPS opened its portal for 2024 KCSE candidates to apply for Teacher Training College diploma programs with a deadline of April 21 2025.
Swahili Translations: KUCCPS imefungua portal yake kwa wagombea 2024 wa KCSE kuomba programu za diploma za Chuo cha Mafunzo ya Walimu na tarehe ya mwisho ya Aprili 21, 2025.
Luo Translations: KUCCPS oseyawo chenro mar kwayo jogo madwaro dhi e KCSE mar 2024 mondo odhi e Skul mar Tiego Jopuonj e Skul mar Tiego Jopuonj gi giko tarik 21, April 2025.

English: KUCCPS opened its portal for course revision for 2025/2026 placement targeting 2024 KCSE candidates and past candidates from 2000 to 2024.
Swahili Translations: KUCCPS ilifungua portal yake kwa marekebisho ya kozi kwa ajili ya nafasi za 2025/2026 ambazo zina lengo la wagombea 2024 wa KCSE na wagombea wa zamani kutoka 2000 hadi 2024.
Luo Translations: KUCCPS oseyawo dhoot mar somo mar lokruok mar somo mar tich mar 2025/2026 ma biro konyo jogo madwaro dhi e KCSE 2024 kod jogo ma nosedonjo e KCSE chakre higa mar 2000 nyaka 2024.

English: KUCCPS opened its portal for inter-institutional transfers for 2025/2026 placements targeting TVET and university students.
Swahili Translations: KUCCPS ilifungua portal yake ya uhamisho wa kati ya taasisi kwa ajili ya kazi za uhamisho za 2025/2026 zinazolenga wanafunzi wa TVET na vyuo vikuu.
Luo Translations: KUCCPS oseyawo chenro mar kwayo ji e pinje mamoko mondo odhi e pinje mamoko e higa mar 2025/2026 ka gitiyo gi chenro mar konyo jopuonjre mag TVET kod yunivasiti.

English: The Ministry of Education launched innovation hubs in 10 TVET institutions to foster industry-driven skills and product development.
Swahili Translations: Wizara ya Elimu ilizindua vituo vya uvumbuzi katika taasisi 10 za Elimu ya Televisheni ili kukuza ujuzi unaotokana na sekta na maendeleo ya bidhaa.
Luo Translations: Ofis mar Puonjruok osechako loso kuonde ma ji timoe dongruok e weche mag televison e pinje apar mondo omi ji ong'e gik ma ginyalo timo e tijno.
